#Text:Jaiminīyabrāhmaṇa
#Edition:Book 1 and 2 edited by G. Ehlers; book 3 edited by M. Kobayashi.
#Notes:Book 1 is taken from the DCS (with corrections), books 2 and 3 are modified versions of the texts by Ehlers and Kobayashi. Translation: 1.67-346 aligned with Bodewitz (1990); some parts are missing because the pages were not OCRed.



1.1.1	tad āhuḥ kena juhoti kasmin hūyata iti
1.1.2	prāṇenaiva juhoti prāṇe hūyate
1.1.3	tad yad etad agnīn manthanti prāṇāñ janayanti
1.1.4	tad yāvad vai manthanti na tarhi prāṇiti
1.1.5	araṇyor evāsya tarhi prāṇā bhavanti
1.1.6	tasya vai mathyamānasya bhasmāvaśīyate
1.1.7	annam evāsya taj jāyate
1.1.8	annaṃ ma etad ajanīty eva tad vidyāt
1.1.9	dhūmo 'nu ninardati
1.1.10	mana evāsya taj jāyate
1.1.11	mano ma etad ajanīty eva tad vidyāt
1.1.12	aṅgāro 'nu nirvartate
1.1.13	cakṣur evāsya taj jāyate
1.1.14	cakṣur ma etad ajanīty eva tad vidyāt
1.1.15	sa eṣo 'ṅgāra etāni bhasmāni grasate
1.1.16	yathā kumāro jātaḥ stanam abhipadyeta tathā tiryaṅ visarpati
1.1.17	śrotram evāsya taj jāyate
1.1.18	śrotraṃ ma etad ajanīty eva tad vidyāt
1.1.19	upari tṛṇāni dhunoti
1.1.20	prāṇa evāsya sa jāyate
1.1.21	prāṇo ma eṣo 'janīty eva tad vidyāt
1.1.22	bhā ity uddīpyate
1.1.23	vāg evāsya sā jāyate
1.1.24	vāṅ ma eṣājanīty eva tad vidyāt
1.1.25	sa etān pañca prāṇāñ janayate
1.1.26	tāṃs tredhā vyūhya devān kṛtvā teṣu juhvad āste
1.1.27	devā haivāsya devā bhavanti
1.1.28	ime tv evāsya devā bhavanti yeṣu juhvad āste
1.2.1	tad yad āhuḥ kena juhoti kasmin hūyata iti prāṇenaiva juhoti prāṇe hūyate tad etad annaṃ prāṇe juhoti
1.2.2	sa eṣo 'nakāmamāra imān hi prāṇān abhivardhayamānas teṣu juhvad āste
1.2.3	athaitaddha vāva brāhmaṇasya svaṃ yaddhaviḥ
1.2.4	tad ātman nidhatta eṣv amṛteṣu prāṇeṣu
1.2.5	tad asyātman nihitaṃ na pramīyate
1.2.6	tad yadā vai mana utkrāmati yadā prāṇo yadā cakṣur yadā śrotraṃ yadā vāg etān evāgnīn abhigacchati
1.2.7	athāsyedaṃ śarīram eteṣv evāgniṣv anupravidhyanty asmād vai tvam ajāyathā eṣa tvaj jāyatāṃ svāheti
1.2.8	so 'ta āhutimayo manomayaḥ prāṇamayaś cakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayo vāṅmaya ṛṅmayo yajurmayaḥ sāmamayo brahmamayo hiraṇmayo 'mṛtaḥ sambhavati
1.2.9	amṛtā haivāsya prāṇā bhavanti
1.2.10	amṛtaśarīram idaṃ kurute
1.2.11	so 'mṛtatvaṃ gacchati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.3.1	prajāpatiḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaram āsta
1.3.2	sa sapta śatāni varṣāṇāṃ samāpyemām eva jitim ajayad yāsyeyaṃ jitis tāṃ
1.3.3	sa svargaṃ lokam ārohan devān abravīd etāni yūyaṃ trīṇi śatāni varṣāṇāṃ samāpayātheti
1.3.4	tatheti
1.3.5	te trīṇi śatāni varṣāṇāṃ samāpya tām u eva jitim ajayan yāṃ prajāpatir ajayat
1.3.6	ta ete sarva eva prajāpatimātrā ayā3m ayā3m iti
1.3.7	te 'bruvan devaśarīrair vā idam amṛtaśarīraiḥ samāpāma
1.3.8	na vā idaṃ manuṣyāḥ samāpsyanti
1.3.9	etemaṃ yajñaṃ saṃbharāmeti
1.3.10	taṃ saṃvatsaram abhisamabharan
1.3.11	te 'bruvan mahad vā idaṃ sam eva bharāmeti
1.3.12	taṃ dvādaśāham abhisamabharan
1.3.13	te 'bruvan mahad vā idaṃ sam eva bharāmeti
1.3.14	taṃ pṛṣṭhyaṃ ṣaḍaham abhisamabharan
1.3.15	te 'bruvan mahad vā idaṃ sam eva bharāmeti
1.4.1	taṃ trirātraṃ taṃ dvirātraṃ tam aptoryāmaṃ tam atirātraṃ taṃ vājapeyaṃ taṃ ṣoḍaśinaṃ tam ukthyaṃ tam agniṣṭomaṃ tam iṣṭipaśubandhāṃs taṃ cāturmāsyāni taṃ darśapūrṇamāsau tam ete agnihotrāhutī abhisamabharan
1.4.2	so 'to na parājayata
1.4.3	etad vā aparājitaṃ yad agnihotraṃ
1.4.4	na ha vai parājayate ya evaṃ veda
1.4.5	sa yat purastād apa upaspṛśati satyaṃ vā āpaḥ satyaṃ dīkṣā dīkṣaivāsya sā
1.4.6	agnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāhety aṣṭākṣareṇa juhoti
1.4.7	aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī
1.4.8	tad eva prātassavanaṃ
1.4.9	manasā niṣkevalyenottarām āhutiṃ juhoti
1.4.10	tad eva mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam
1.4.11	upamṛṣṭe prāśnāti
1.4.12	tad eva tṛtīyasavanaṃ
1.4.13	lelihitam iva hi tat tṛtīyasavanam
1.4.14	upariṣṭād apa upaspṛśati
1.4.15	avabhṛtha evāsya sa
1.4.16	sa yad ete sāyamāhutī juhoty etābhyām evāsyāhutibhyāṃ sarvair etair yajñakratubhir iṣṭaṃ bhavati
1.4.17	atha yad ete prātarāhutī juhoty etābhyām evāsyāhutibhyāṃ sarvair etair yajñakratubhir iṣṭaṃ bhavati
1.4.18	tad etad aparyantaṃ yad agnihotram
1.5.1	atha paśukāmaḥ sāyaṃ paśuṣu sameteṣv agnihotraṃ juhuyāt
1.5.2	brahma vā agnihotram
1.5.3	brahmaṇaivaitat paśūn parigṛhṇāti
1.5.4	avisṛṣṭeṣu prātar
1.5.5	brahma vā agnihotram
1.5.6	brahmaṇaivaitat paśūn parigṛhṇāti
1.5.7	sa etān brahmaṇobhayataḥ paśūn parigṛhṇīte
1.5.8	ava paśūn runddhe
1.5.9	bahupaśur bhavati
1.5.10	atha svargakāmaḥ
1.5.11	dvau samudrāvacaryau vitatau mahāntāvāvarīvartete patheva padāviti
1.5.12	dvau haiva samudrāv acaryāv ahaś caiva rātriś ca
1.5.13	te ye naktaṃ juhvati rātrim eva te samudraṃ praviśanti
1.5.14	atha ya udite juhvaty ahar eva te samudraṃ praviśanti
1.5.15	tayor vā etayor atyayanam asti yathā vaiṣacaṃ vā syāt setor vā saṃkramaṇam astamite purā tamisrāyai suvyuṣṭāyāṃ purodayāt
1.6.1	atho haitau śyāmaśabalāv eva yad ahorātre
1.6.2	ahar vai śabalo rātriḥ śyāmaḥ
1.6.3	te ye naktaṃ juhvati rātrim eva te śyāmaṃ praviśanti
1.6.4	atha ya udite juhvaty ahar eva te śabalaṃ praviśanti
1.6.5	tayor etad evātyayanam astamite purā tamisrāyai suvyuṣṭāyāṃ purodayāt
1.6.6	atho haiṣu savitaiva dyumnaḥ
1.6.7	savitā vai prajāpatiḥ
1.6.8	prajāpatir viśve devāḥ
1.6.9	prajāpatāv evāsya tad viśveṣu deveṣu hutaṃ bhavati
1.6.10	tad etat prājāpatyaṃ yad agnihotram
1.6.11	atha yad etat prātaḥ prabhāty etasmin vai dyumne prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ prajanayāṃcakāra
1.6.12	savitā vai prajāpatiḥ
1.6.13	prajāpatir viśve devāḥ
1.6.14	prajāpatāv evāsya tad viśveṣu deveṣu hutaṃ bhavati
1.6.15	tad etad vaiśvadevaṃ yad agnihotram
1.6.16	atho haitad ahorātre evaṃ mukhaṃ saṃdhattaḥ
1.6.17	annaṃ vā agnihotram
1.6.18	annādyam evaitad ahorātrayor mukhato 'pidadhāti
1.6.19	evam eva punaḥ prātaḥ saṃdhattaḥ
1.6.20	annaṃ vā agnihotram
1.6.21	annādyam evaitad ahorātrayor mukhato 'pidhāyaitau punarmṛtyū atimucyate yad ahorātre
1.7.1	asau vā ādityo 'staṃ yan ṣoḍhā vimrocati
1.7.2	vyamrucad iti ha sma vā etaṃ pūrve purāṇina ācakṣate
1.7.3	athaitarhi nyamrucad iti
1.7.4	sa vā eṣo 'staṃ yan brāhmaṇam eva śraddhayā praviśati payasā paśūṃs tejasāgnim ūrjauṣadhī rasenāpas svadhayā vanaspatīn
1.7.5	sa yad brāhmaṇo 'gnihotrapātrāṇi nirṇenekti yat pariceṣṭati yayaivainaṃ śraddhayā praviṣṭo bhavati tām evāsmiṃs tat saṃbharati
1.7.6	atha yat payo duhanti yena payasā paśūn praviṣṭo bhavati tad evāsmiṃs tat saṃbharati
1.7.7	atha yad aṅgārān nirūhati yena tejasāgniṃ praviṣṭo bhavati tad evāsmiṃs tat saṃbharati
1.7.8	atha yat tṛṇenāvadyotayati yayorjauṣadhīḥ praviṣṭo bhavati tām evāsmiṃs tat saṃbharati
1.7.9	atha yad apaḥ pratyānayati yena rasenāpaḥ praviṣṭo bhavati tam evāsmiṃs tat saṃbharati
1.7.10	atha yat samidham abhyādadhāti yayā svadhayā vanaspatīn praviṣṭo bhavati tām evāsmiṃstat saṃbharati
1.8.1	tam evaṃ saṃbhṛtya sāyaṃ juhoti
1.8.2	sa tāṃ garbhakṛto rātriṃ vasati
1.8.3	evam eva punaḥ saṃbhṛtya prātar juhoti
1.8.4	taṃ janayati
1.8.5	so 'sya jāyamāna eva sarvaṃ pāpmānam apahanti
1.8.6	devā vai prajāpater ajāyanta
1.8.7	eṣa u evaṃvido jāyate
1.8.8	sa yāvantaṃ prajāpatir lokam ajayat tāvantaṃ jayati
1.8.9	atho hekṣate 'yaṃ vāva mām anuṣṭhyā saṃbharati hantāyaṃ sāṅgaḥ satanur avihruto jarasaṃ gacchatv iti
1.8.10	sa ha sāṅga eva satanur avihruto jarasaṃ gacchati
1.8.11	atho hekṣate 'yaṃ vāva mām anuṣṭhyā veda hantemam evāviśānīti
1.8.12	sa haivaṃvidam evāviśati
1.8.13	sa eṣa vā eko vīro ya eṣa tapaty eṣa indra eṣa prajāpatiḥ
1.8.14	etasmin hāsya taddhutaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.9.1	yaddha vā ahnā pāpaṃ kriyata ādityas tat kārayati
1.9.2	yad rātryāgnis tat
1.9.3	tāvabrūtām itthaṃ ced vai bhaviṣyāvo na vai tarhi śakṣyāvaḥ prajā bhartuṃ hantānnam evāsāvānyonyasminn evātmānaṃ juhavāveti
1.9.4	sa yad ādityo 'stam ety agnāv eva tad ātmānaṃ juhoti
1.9.5	sa yat kiṃ cādityo 'hnā pāpaṃ karoti tad asyāgnī rātryāpahanti
1.9.6	ādityam udyantam agnir anūdeti
1.9.7	āditya eva tad ātmānaṃ juhoti
1.9.8	sa yat kiṃ cāgnī rātryā pāpaṃ karoti tad asyādityo 'hnāpahanti
1.9.9	sa yathāhir ahicchavyai nirmucyeta yathā muñjād iṣīkāṃ vivṛhed evam eva sarvasmāt pāpmano nirmucyete sa ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.10.1	sāyamāhutyaiva yat kiṃ cāhnā pāpaṃ karoti tad asyāgnī rātryāpahanti
1.10.2	prātarāhutyaiva yat kiṃ ca rātryā pāpaṃ karoti tad asyādityo 'hnāpahanti
1.10.3	sa yathāhir ahicchavyai nirmucyeta yathā muñjād iṣīkāṃ vivṛhed evam eva sarvasmāt pāpmano nirmucyate
1.10.4	tad yathā hiraṇye dhmāte na kaścana nyaṅgaḥ pāpmā pariśiṣyata evaṃ haivāsmin na kaścana nyaṅgaḥ pāpmā pariśiṣyate ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.11.1	atha ha smāha nagarī jānaśruteyo 'sau vā ādityo 'staṃ yann agnim eva yoniṃ praviśatīti
1.11.2	sa yad ete sāyamāhutī juhoty etasyaiva tad ādityasya pṛṣṭhe pratitiṣṭhati yathobhayapadī pratitiṣṭhet tādṛk tat
1.11.3	atha yad ete prātarāhutī juhoty utthāpayatyevainaṃ tābhyām
1.11.4	sa yathā hastī hastyāsanam uparyāsīnam ādāyottiṣṭhed evam evaiṣā devataitad vidvāṃsaṃ juhvatam ādāyodeti
1.11.5	sainaṃ taṃ lokaṃ gamayati ya etasyai yataḥ paraṃ nāsti
1.11.6	sa yat kiṃ ca parācīnam ādityāt tad amṛtaṃ tad abhijayati
1.11.7	atha yad arvācīnam ādityād ahorātre tad upamathnīto yathā reṣmopamathnīyād evam
1.11.8	bahavo ha vā ādityāt parāñco lokāḥ
1.11.9	te 'sya sarva āptā bhavanti te jitāḥ
1.11.10	teṣvasya sarveṣu kāmacāro bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.12.1	devā vai mṛtyunā samayatanta
1.12.2	sa yo ha sa mṛtyur agnir eva sa
1.12.3	te 'bruvann etemaṃ jigīṣāmeti
1.12.4	te 'bruvann ājyāhutiṃ juhavāma tayainaṃ jigīṣāmeti
1.12.5	tatheti
1.12.6	ta ājyāhutim ajuhavuḥ
1.12.7	tām annam akuruta tāṃ pratyudadīpyata
1.12.8	tasmād yatrājyāhutiṃ juhvati pratyuddīpyata eva
1.12.9	te 'bruvan paśvāhutiṃ juhavāma tayainaṃ jigīṣāmeti
1.12.10	tatheti
1.12.11	te paśum ālabhya medas samavadāya paśvāhutim ajuhavuḥ
1.12.12	tām annam akuruta tāṃ pratyudadīpyata
1.12.13	tasmād yatra paśvāhutiṃ juhvati pratyuddīpyata eva
1.12.14	te 'bruvan kṣīrāhutiṃ juhavāma tayainaṃ jigīṣāmeti
1.12.15	tatheti
1.12.16	te kṣīrāhutim ajuhavuḥ
1.12.17	tayainam ajayan
1.12.18	tasmād yatra kṣīrāhutiṃ juhvaty aṅgārā eva bhavanti
1.12.19	te 'bruvann ajeṣma vā enam annena hantānapajayyaṃ jigīṣāmeti
1.13.1	te 'bruvan somāhutiṃ juhavāma tayainaṃ jigīṣāmeti
1.13.2	tatheti
1.13.3	te somenāyajanta
1.13.4	te somāhutim ajuhavuḥ
1.13.5	tayainaṃ prājayan
1.13.6	tasmād yatra somāhutiṃ juhvaty aṅgārā eva bhavanti
1.13.7	sa ya evaṃ vidvān ājyāhutiṃ ca paśvāhutiṃ ca juhoti priyam evāsya tena dhāmopagacchati
1.13.8	atha yat kṣīrāhutiṃ juhoti jayaty evainaṃ tena
1.13.9	atha yat somāhutiṃ juhoti yathā jitvā prajayet tādṛk tat
1.13.10	sa etau punarmṛtyū atimucyate yad ahorātre
1.14.1	prāṇāya tveti samidham abhyādadhāti
1.14.2	apāne 'mṛtam adhāṃ svāheti juhoti
1.14.3	atha srucam abhimṛśati hṛdayaṃ pretir manaḥ saṃtatiś cakṣur ānatiḥ śrotram upanatir vāg āgatiḥ
1.14.4	pratītaṃ devebhyo juṣṭaṃ havyam asthāt
1.14.5	amṛte mām adhāt
1.14.6	ā māṃ prāṇā viśantu bhūyase sukṛtāyeti
1.14.7	sa ha bhūya eva sukṛtaṃ karoti
1.14.8	atho hainam amuṣmin loke na pāpī vāg āgacchati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.15.1	tad āhur yaj jīvan puruṣaḥ karoty eva sādhu karoti pāpaṃ kā tayor duṣkṛtasukṛtayor vyāvṛttir iti
1.15.2	yaddha vai jīvan puruṣaḥ sādhu karoti prāṇāṃs tad abhisaṃpadyate
1.15.3	atha yad duṣkṛtaṃ śarīraṃ tat
1.15.4	sa yad asmāl lokād evaṃvit praiti tasya prāṇena saha sukṛtam utkrāmati śarīreṇa saha duṣkṛtaṃ hīyate
1.15.5	tad āhur durviditaṃ vai tad yadā martyavān duṣkṛtena saha vasāt
1.15.6	yo vā etena jīvann eva vyāvartate tat suviditam iti
1.15.7	tad vā etad agnihotram evābhisaṃpadyate
1.16.1	mano vā anu prāṇā vācam anv ātmā
1.16.2	sa yad vācā pūrvām āhutiṃ juhoti manasottarāṃ tad duṣkṛtasukṛte vyāvartayati
1.16.3	tasmād āhur naite āhutī saṃsṛjye
1.16.4	duṣkṛtasukṛte hy etābhyāṃ vyāvartayatīti
1.16.5	sa yat sāyamāhutyor vācā pūrvām āhutiṃ juhoti yad evāhnā pāpaṃ karoti tasmād eva tayā vyāvartate
1.16.6	atha yan manasottarāṃ yad eva rātryā pāpaṃ karoti tasmād eva tayā vyāvartate
1.16.7	atha yat prātarāhutyor vācā pūrvām āhutiṃ juhoti yad eva rātryā pāpaṃ karoti tasmād eva tayā vyāvartate
1.16.8	atha yan manasottarāṃ yad evāhnā pāpaṃ karoti tasmād eva tayā vyāvartate
1.16.9	sa eṣo 'har ahar duṣkṛtena vyāvartamāna eti ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.17.1	dve ha vāva yonī
1.17.2	devayonir haivānyā manuṣyayonir anyā
1.17.3	dvā u haiva lokau
1.17.4	devaloko haivānyo manuṣyaloko 'nyaḥ
1.17.5	sā yā manuṣyayonir manuṣyaloka eva sa
1.17.6	tat striyai prajananam
1.17.7	ato 'dhi prajāḥ prajāyante
1.17.8	tasmād u kalyāṇīṃ jāyām iccheta kalyāṇe ma ātmā saṃbhavād iti
1.17.9	tasmād u jāyāṃ jugupsen nen mama yonau mama loke 'nyaḥ saṃbhavād iti
1.17.10	tasya vai sambhaviṣyataḥ prāṇā agre praviśanty atha retaḥ sicyate
1.17.11	sa imān prāṇān ākāśān abhinirvartate
1.17.12	tasmād u samānasyaiva retasaḥ sato yādṛśa eva bhavati tādṛśo jāyate
1.17.13	athaiṣā devayonir devaloko yad āhavanīyaḥ
1.17.14	eṣā ha vai devayonir devalokaḥ
1.17.15	tasmād yo gārhapatye juhuyād akṛtaṃ karotīty evainaṃ manyeran
1.17.16	sa yaj juhoti yaḥ sādhu karoty etasyām evainad devayonāv ātmānaṃ siñcati
1.17.17	so 'syātmāmuṣminn āditye sambhavati
1.17.18	sa haivaṃ vidvān dvyātmā dviyoniḥ
1.17.19	ekātmā haivaikayonir etad avidvān
1.17.20	sa yad asmāl lokād evaṃvit praiti
1.18.1	tasya prāṇaḥ prathama utkrāmati / sa heyattāṃ devebhya ācaṣṭa iyad asya sādhu kṛtam iyat pāpam iti
1.18.2	atha hāyaṃ dhūmena sahordhva utkrāmati / tasya haitasyartavo dvārapāḥ
1.18.3	tebhyo haitena prabruvīta / vicakṣaṇād ṛtavo reta ābhṛtam ardhamāsyaṃ prasutāt pitryāvatas taṃ mā puṃsi kartary erayadhvaṃ puṃsaḥ kartur mātary āsiṣikta
1.18.4	sa upajāyopajāyamāno dvādaśena trayodaśopamāsaḥ saṃ tad vide prati tad vide 'haṃ taṃ mā ṛtavo 'mṛta ānayadhvam iti / taṃ hartava ānayante
1.18.5	yathā vidvān vidvāṃsaṃ yathā jānañ jānantam evaṃ hainam ṛtava ānayante / taṃ hātyarjayante
1.18.6	sa haitam āgacchati tapantaṃ / taṃ hāgataṃ pṛcchati kas tvam asīti
1.18.7	sa yo ha nāmnā vā gotreṇa vā prabrūte taṃ hāha yas te 'yaṃ mayy ātmābhūd eṣa te sa iti / tasmin hātman pratipatta ṛtavaḥ saṃpalāyya padgṛhītam apakarṣanti
1.18.8	tasya hāhorātre lokam āpnutaḥ / tasmā u haitena prabruvīta ko 'ham asmi suvas tvaṃ
1.18.9	sa tvāṃ svargyaṃ svar agām iti / ko ha vai prajāpatiḥ
1.18.10	atha haivaṃvid eva suvargaḥ / sa hi suvar gacchati
1.18.11	taṃ hāha yas tvam asi so 'ham asmi / yo 'ham asmi sa tvam asy ehīti
1.18.12	sa etam eva sukṛtarasam apyeti / tasya putrā dāyam upayanti pitaraḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ
1.18.13	sa haivaṃ vidvān dvyātmā dvidāyaḥ / ekātmā haivaikadāya etad avidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.19.1	vāg vā agnihotrī
1.19.2	tasyai mana eva vatsaḥ
1.19.3	manasā vai vācaṃ prattāṃ duhre
1.19.4	vatsena vai mātaraṃ prattāṃ duhre
1.19.5	tad vā idaṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ yat paścād vāg anveti
1.19.6	tasmād vatsaṃ pūrvaṃ yantaṃ paścān mātānveti
1.19.7	hṛdayam eva methy upadohanī prāṇo rajjuḥ
1.19.8	prāṇenaiva vāk ca manaś cābhihite
1.19.9	rajjvā vai vatsaṃ ca mātaraṃ cābhidadhāti
1.19.10	taddha janako vaideho yājñavalkyaṃ papraccha vetthāgnihotraṃ yājñavalkyā3 iti
1.19.11	vedeti hovāca
1.19.12	kim iti
1.19.13	paya iti
1.19.14	yat payo na syāt kena juhuyā iti
1.19.15	vrīhiyavābhyām iti
1.19.16	yad vrīhiyavau na syātāṃ kena juhuyā iti
1.19.17	yad anyad dhānyaṃ teneti
1.19.18	yad anyad dhānyaṃ na syāt kena juhuyā iti
1.19.19	āraṇyābhir oṣadhībhir iti
1.19.20	yad āraṇyā oṣadhayo na syuḥ kena juhuyā iti
1.19.21	adbhir iti
1.19.22	yad āpo na syuḥ kena juhuyā iti
1.19.23	sa hovāca na vā iha tarhi kiṃcanāsīd athaitad u hūyata iva satyaṃ śraddhāyām iti
1.19.24	taṃ hovāca vetthāgnihotraṃ yājñavalkya namas te 'stu sahasraṃ bhagavo dadma iti
1.19.25	atha hainam upajagau
1.20.1	kiṃ nu vidvān pravasaty agnihotrī gṛhebhyaḥ kathā tad asya kāvyaṃ kathā saṃtato 'gnibhir iti
1.20.2	yad agnīn ādhāyāthāpapravasati katham asyānapaproṣitaṃ bhavatīti
1.20.3	sa hovāca vājasaneyaḥ
1.20.4	yo javiṣṭho bhuvaneṣu sa vidvān pravasan vide tathā tad asya kāvyaṃ tathā saṃtato 'gnibhir iti
1.20.5	mana iti hovāca
1.20.6	mano vāva bhuvaneṣu javiṣṭhaṃ
1.20.7	manasaivāsyānapaproṣitaṃ bhavatīti ha tad uvāca
1.20.8	atha hainam upajagau
1.20.9	yat sa dūraṃ paretyātha tatra pramādyati kasmin sāsya hutāhutir gṛhe yām asya juhvatīti
1.20.10	sa hovāca vājasaneyaḥ
1.20.11	yo jāgāra bhuvaneṣu sa vidvān pravasan vide tasmin sāsya hutāhutir gṛhe yām asya juhvatīti
1.20.12	prāṇa iti hovāca
1.20.13	prāṇo vāva bhuvaneṣu jāgaraḥ
1.20.14	prāṇa evāsya sā hutāhutir bhavati
1.20.15	tasmād āhuḥ prāṇo 'gnihotram iti
1.20.16	yāvaddhy eva prāṇena prāṇiti tāvad agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.21.1	raudraṃ gavi vāyavyam upasṛṣṭam āśvinaṃ duhyamānam agnīṣomīyaṃ dugdhaṃ vāruṇam adhiśritaṃ vaiśvadevā bindavaḥ pauṣṇam udantaṃ sārasvataṃ viṣyandamānaṃ maitraṃ śaro dhātur udvāsitaṃ bṛhaspater unnītaṃ savituḥ prakrāntaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyor hriyamāṇam indrāgnyor upasannam agneḥ pūrvāhutiḥ prajāpater uttaraindraṃ hutam
1.21.2	tad etat saptadaśam agnihotram
1.21.3	saptadaśa u eva vājapeyaḥ
1.21.4	sa ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoty ubhāv eva lokāv abhijayati yaś cāgnihotrahuto yaś ca vājapeyayājinaḥ
1.21.5	trayo 'gnihotre sthāṇava iti ha smāha śāṇḍilyaḥ
1.21.6	yad apradīptāyāṃ samidhi juhoti sa sthāṇuḥ
1.21.7	yad enām aparādhnoti sa sthāṇuḥ
1.21.8	yad ene saṃsṛjati sa sthāṇuḥ
1.21.9	ādīptāyai samidhaḥ samunmukhe juhoti
1.21.10	atihāyottarām āhutiṃ juhoti
1.21.11	pra ha saptadaśa saptadaśa sahasrapoṣān puṣyati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.22.1	āruṇir vājasaneyo prakur vārṣṇaḥ priyo jānaśruteyo buḍila āśvatarāśvir vaiyāghrapadya ity ete ha pañca mahābrahmā āsuḥ
1.22.2	te hocur janako vā ayaṃ vaideho 'gnihotre 'nuśiṣṭaḥ sa no 'tivadann iva manyata eta tam agnihotre kathāṃ vādayiṣyāma iti
1.22.3	te hājagmuḥ
1.22.4	te ha brahmacāriṇam ūcuḥ pra ṇo brūhīti
1.22.5	tān ha provāca
1.22.6	tebhyo ha proktebhyaḥ pṛthag āsanāni pṛthag udakāni pṛthaṅ madhuparkān pṛthag āvasathān pṛthak pañcabhyaḥ pañcāpacitīś cakāra
1.22.7	atha haiṣāṃ sabhāga āvavrājoptvā keśaśmaśrūṇi nakhān nikṛtyājyābhyajya daṇḍopānahaṃ bibhrat
1.22.8	tān hovāca brāhmaṇāḥ kathā bhagavanto no 'nusaṃvādayatheti
1.22.9	ati no 'vādīr iti hocuḥ
1.22.10	atha hainān pūrvaḥ papraccha brāhmaṇāḥ kathā bhagavanto yūyam agnihotraṃ juhutheti
1.22.11	ati vai no 'vādīr iti hocur yo no bhūyasaḥ sataḥ pūrvo 'prākṣīr gautama pratibrūhīti
1.23.1	sa hovāca yaśa ity eva samrāḍ aham agnihotraṃ juhomi tasmād ahaṃ yaśo 'smi yaśo vāva me prajāyām antato bhaviteti
1.23.2	taṃ hovāca gautama kiṃ yaśa iti
1.23.3	agnim upadiśann uvācedaṃ yaśa ity ado yaśa ity ādityaṃ so 'ham ado yaśo 'smin yaśasi sāyaṃ juhomīdaṃ yaśo 'muṣmin yaśasi prātar juhomyetāveva mā tad gamayiṣyato yatra sarve kāmā etau me punarmṛtyum apajeṣyata iti
1.23.4	suhutaṃ devān rādhayānīti ha praśaśaṃsa
1.23.5	atha hāparaṃ papraccha kathā bhagavas tvam agnihotraṃ juhoṣīti
1.23.6	sa hovāca vājasaneyaḥ satyam ity eva samrāḍ aham agnihotraṃ juhomi tasmād ahaṃ satyam asmi tasmān mama satyam iva vadataḥ prakāśa iti
1.23.7	taṃ hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ kiṃ satyam iti
1.23.8	agnim upadiśann uvācedaṃ satyam ity adaḥ satyam ity ādityaṃ so 'ham adaḥ satyam asmin satye sāyaṃ juhomīdaṃ satyam amuṣmin satye prātar juhomyetāveva mā tad gamayiṣyato yatra sarve kāmā etau me punarmṛtyum apajeṣyata iti
1.23.9	suhutaṃ devān rādhayānīti haiva praśaśaṃsa
1.23.10	atha hāparaṃ papraccha kathā bhagavas tvam agnihotraṃ juhoṣīti
1.24.1	sa hovāca prakur vārṣṇo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām ity eva samrāḍ aham agnihotraṃ juhomi tasmād ahaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām asmi bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vāva me śreṣṭhaṃ vittānāṃ prajāyām antato bhaviteti
1.24.2	taṃ hovācāgniveśya kiṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām iti
1.24.3	agnim upadiśann uvācedaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām ity ado bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām ity ādityaṃ so 'ham ado bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām asmin bhūyiṣṭhe śreṣṭhe vittānāṃ sāyaṃ juhomīdaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vittānām amuṣmin bhūyiṣṭhe śreṣṭhe vittānāṃ prātar juhomy etāv eva mā tad gamayiṣyato yatra sarve kāmā etau me punarmṛtyum apajeṣyata iti
1.24.4	suhutaṃ devān rādhayānīti haiva praśaśaṃsa
1.24.5	atha hāparaṃ papraccha kathā bhagavas tvam agnihotraṃ juhoṣīti
1.24.6	sa hovāca priyo jānaśruteyas teja ity eva samrāḍ aham agnihotraṃ juhomi tasmād ahaṃ tejo 'smi tejo vāva me prajāyām antato bhaviteti
1.24.7	taṃ hovāca kāṇḍvīya kiṃ teja iti
1.24.8	agnim upadiśann uvācedaṃ teja ity adas teja ity ādityaṃ so 'ham adas tejo 'smiṃs tejasi sāyaṃ juhomīdaṃ tejo 'muṣmiṃs tejasi prātar juhomy etāv eva mā tad gamayiṣyato yatra sarve kāmā etau me punarmṛtyum apajeṣyata iti
1.24.9	suhutaṃ devān rādhayāni iti haiva praśaśaṃsa
1.24.10	atha hāparaṃ papraccha kathā bhagavas tvam agnihotraṃ juhoṣīti
1.25.1	sa hovāca buḍila āśvatarāśvir vaiyāghrapadyo 'rkāśvamedhāvity eva samrāḍ aham agnihotraṃ juhomy annaṃ hy etad devānāṃ yad arko 'śvo medho medhya iti
1.25.2	taṃ hovāca vaiyāghrapadya ko 'rkaḥ ko 'śvo medho medhya iti
1.25.3	agnim upadiśann uvācāyam arka ityasāvaśvo medho medhya ity ādityaṃ so 'ham amum aśvaṃ medhaṃ medhyam asminn arke sāyaṃ juhomīmam arkam amuṣminn aśve medhe medhye prātar juhomy etāveva mā tad gamayiṣyato yatra sarve kāmā etau me punarmṛtyum apajeṣyata iti
1.25.4	suhutam iti ha praśasyovāca yo ha kila mahyam agnihotra itiṃ ca gatiṃ ca brūyāt tasmā ahaṃ varaṃ dadyām iti
1.25.5	te hocur na nvai vayam agnihotra itiṃ ca gatiṃ cānūcimahe tvam asmabhyam agnihotra itiṃ ca gatiṃ ca brūhi vayaṃ tubhyaṃ pṛthak pañca varān dadma iti
1.25.6	agnim upadiśann uvāceyam itir ity asau gatir ity ādityaṃ so 'ham amūṃ gatim asyām itau sāyaṃ juhomīmām itim amuṣyāṃ gatau prātar juhomy etāv eva mā tad gamayiṣyato yatra sarve kāmā etau me punarmṛtyum apajeṣyata iti
1.25.7	suhutam iti ha praśasyocur varān vṛṇīṣva yān adāmeti
1.25.8	sa hovācaiṣa eva me varo 'ham eva yuṣmabhyaṃ pṛthak pañca sahasrāṇi śatāśvāni dadānīti
1.25.9	etāni vā agnihotra upāsanāny ete kāmāḥ
1.25.10	etān eva kāmān avarunddhe ya evaṃ vedātho yasyaivaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.26.1	agnīn ādadhānaḥ prātar evoddharet
1.26.2	tad dviḥ sāyaṃ dviḥ prātar juhoti
1.26.3	catasra āhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.26.4	catuṣpadā vai paśavo ye ca grāmyā ye cāraṇyāḥ
1.26.5	teṣām evaitat pratyāśaṃ pratyapacayati
1.26.6	eṣa vai mṛtyur yad agnī rihann eva nāma
1.26.7	tam eva tābhir āhutibhiḥ śamayitvā pṛthivīṃ lokānāṃ jayaty agniṃ devaṃ devānām
1.26.8	agner devasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.26.9	sa tato dhūmam eva rathaṃ samāsthāya vāyoḥ salokatām abhiprayāti
1.26.10	dvyahaṃ juhoti
1.26.11	aṣṭāv āhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.26.12	aṣṭāśaphā ha vai paśavo ye ca grāmyā ye cāraṇyāḥ
1.26.13	teṣām evaitat pratyāśaṃ pratyapacayati
1.26.14	eṣa vai mṛtyur yad vāyur ajira eva nāma
1.26.15	tam eva tābhir āhutibhiḥ śamayitvāntarikṣaṃ lokānāṃ jayati vāyuṃ devaṃ devānām
1.26.16	vāyor devasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.27.1	sa tato reṣmāṇam eva rathaṃ samāsthāyādityasya salokatām abhiprayāti
1.27.2	tryahaṃ juhoti
1.27.3	dvādaśāhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.27.4	dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
1.27.5	saṃvatsaro vā idaṃ sarvaṃ
1.27.6	sa yad ihāśnāti yat pibati yasmai kasmaicana prativyādadāti sarvaṃ tad asyānaśitaṃ bhavati yāvajjīvānāśakavratī bhavati
1.27.7	eṣa vai mṛtyur yad ādityo mrocann eva nāma
1.27.8	tam eva tābhir āhutibhiḥ śamayitvā divaṃ lokānāṃ jayaty ādityaṃ devaṃ devānām
1.27.9	ādityasya devasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.28.1	sa tato raśmīn eva rathaṃ samāsthāya candramasaḥ salokatām abhiprayāti
1.28.2	caturahaṃ juhoti
1.28.3	ṣoḍaśāhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.28.4	ṣoḍaśakalaṃ vai brahma
1.28.5	ṣoḍaśakalā devāḥ
1.28.6	ṣoḍaśakalam idaṃ sakṛt sarvam
1.28.7	sa yad iha ripraṃ pāpaṃ karma karoty ekayaiva tataḥ kalayā
1.28.8	yathā suvarṇaḥ pravṛttas tapyamānaḥ suvarṇatām abhiniṣpadyata evam eva dviṣatsu bhrātṛvyeṣu malaṃ pāpmānaṃ pratyūhya svargaṃ lokam abhipraiti
1.28.9	eṣa vai śaśo ya eṣo 'ntaś candramasi
1.28.10	eṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ śāsti
1.28.11	eṣa vai yamo ya eṣo 'ntaś candramasi
1.28.12	eṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ yamayati
1.28.13	eṣa vai mṛtyur yad yamo 'tsyann eva nāma
1.28.14	tam eva tābhir āhutibhiḥ śamayitvorjaṃ lokānāṃ jayati yamaṃ devaṃ devānāṃ
1.28.15	yamasya devasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.29.1	sa tataḥ svadhām eva hiraṇmayīṃ nāvaṃ samāruhya prajāpateḥ salokatām abhiprayāti
1.29.2	pañcāhaṃ juhoti
1.29.3	viṃśatir āhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.29.4	saviṃśo vai prajāpatiḥ
1.29.5	eṣa vai mṛtyur yat prajāpatiḥ prabhūmān eva nāma
1.29.6	tam eva tābhir āhutibhiḥ śamayitvā nabho lokānāṃ jayati prajāpatiṃ devaṃ devānāṃ
1.29.7	prajāpater devasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.30.1	tad yad vai tan nabho nāmābhīr vai sā
1.30.2	na hi tat prāpya kasmāccana bibheti

1.30.4	ṣaḍahaṃ juhoti

1.30.6	caturviṃśatyakṣarā vai gāyatrī
1.30.7	caturviṃśatir vasavo devāḥ
1.30.8	te gāyatrīm anvāyattāḥ
1.30.9	tebhyo gāyatrī vasubhyo devebhya ekaikenākṣareṇa kāmān nikāmān duhe
1.30.10	evam asmai juhvate duhe

1.30.12	vasūnāṃ devānāṃ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti

1.31.2	aṣṭāviṃśatir āhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.31.3	aṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarā vā uṣṇik

1.31.5	ta uṣṇiham anvāyattāḥ
1.31.6	tebhya uṣṇig bhṛgvaṅgirobhyo devebhya ekaikenākṣareṇa kāmān nikāmān duhe

1.32.3	dvātriṃśadakṣarā vā anuṣṭup

1.32.5	te 'nuṣṭubham anvāyattāḥ

1.34.1	daśāhaṃ juhoti

1.34.4	catvāriṃśan maruto devāḥ
1.34.5	te paṅktim anvāyattāḥ
1.34.6	tebhyaḥ paṅktir marudbhyo devebhya ekaikenākṣareṇa kāmān nikāmān duhe
1.34.7	evam asmai juhvate duhe
1.34.8	paṅktiṃ vai sa chandasāṃ jayati maruto devān devānām
1.34.9	marutāṃ devānāṃ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.35.1	ekādaśāhaṃ juhoti
1.35.2	catuścatvāriṃśad āhutayaḥ sampadyante
1.35.3	catuścatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai triṣṭup
1.35.4	catuścatvāriṃśad rudrā devāḥ
1.35.5	te triṣṭubham anvāyattāḥ
1.35.6	tebhyas triṣṭub rudrebhyo devebhya ekaikenākṣareṇa kāmān nikāmān duhe

1.36.3	aṣṭācatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai jagatī

1.36.5	te jagatīm anvāyattāḥ
1.36.6	tebhyo jagaty ādityebhyo devebhya ekaikenākṣareṇa kāmān nikāmān duhe

1.36.9	ādityānāṃ devānāṃ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ samabhyārohati ya evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti
1.37.1	atra vai brahma na virājaty anātham aparāyaṇam anuttaram
1.37.2	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ dvādaśāhaṃ brahma juhavāṃcakāra
1.37.3	tad dvādaśāhaṃ hutvā kīrtiṃ yaśaḥ prajātim amṛtaṃ tad udājahāra
1.37.4	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ dvādaśāhaṃ brahma hutvā prajāpataye pratyūhya svargaṃ lokam abhyuccakrāma
1.37.5	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ dvādaśāhaṃ prajāpatir juhavāṃcakāra
1.37.6	tad dvādaśāhaṃ hutvā prajñāṃ medhāṃ mīmāṃsāṃ tapas tad udājahāra
1.37.7	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ dvādaśāhaṃ prajāpatir hutvā devebhyaś carṣibhyaś ca pratyūhya svargam eva lokam abhyuccakrāma
1.37.8	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ dvādaśāhaṃ devāś carṣayaś ca juhavāṃcakruḥ
1.37.9	tad dvādaśāhaṃ hutvā pūrvebhyo manuṣyebhyaḥ pratyūhya svargamveva lokam abhyuccakramuḥ
1.37.10	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ dvādaśāhaṃ brahma juhavāṃcakāra dvādaśāhaṃ prajāpatir dvādaśāhaṃ devāścarṣayaśca
1.37.11	tad dvādaśāhaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ hutvā kāmān nikāmān āpuḥ
1.37.12	kimu ya enad yāvajjīvaṃ juhuyāt
1.38.1	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ tryaham eva payasā juhuyāt
1.38.2	tad vā agniṣṭomasya rūpam

1.38.4	tad vai tad agnihotraṃ tryaham eva dadhnā juhuyāt

1.38.15	yathā sāvasān kṛtvā prārjayet tādṛk tat

1.38.17	tasmāt teṣāṃ duhe dhenur vahaty anaḍvān ādhānapratihito 'śvo 'śvatara upatiṣṭhaty adhikakṣyo hastī vahati
1.39.1	upasṛjāgnihotrīm ity āha
1.39.2	upasṛṣṭe dyāvāpṛthivī rudrā upagṛhṇanti vasūnāṃ dugdhaṃ bhūtakṛtaḥ stha nirūḍhaṃ janyaṃ bhayam ity aṅgārān nirūhati
1.39.3	athādhiśrayati vaiśvānarasyādhiśritam asy agnis te tejo mā pratidhākṣīt satyāya tveti
1.39.4	athāvadyotayati saṃ jyotiṣā jyotir iti

1.39.9	bhūtakṛtaḥ stha pratyūḍhaṃ janyaṃ bhayam ity aṅgārān pratyūhati

1.39.11	atha srucaṃ saṃmārṣṭi sajūr devebhyaḥ sāyaṃyāvabhya iti sāyam
1.39.12	sajūr devebhyaḥ prātaryāvabhya iti prātaḥ

1.39.15	athāhonneṣyāmīti

1.40.1	sa yaṃ prathamaṃ sruvam unnayati tad vai darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpam
1.40.2	darśapūrṇamāsābhyām evāsyeṣṭaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān prathamaṃ sruvam unnayati
1.40.3	atha yaṃ dvitīyaṃ sruvam unnayati tad vai cāturmāsyānāṃ rūpam
1.40.4	cāturmāsyair evāsyeṣṭaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān dvitīyaṃ sruvam unnayati
1.40.5	atha yaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sruvam unnayati tad vā iṣṭipaśubandhānāṃ rūpam
1.40.6	iṣṭipaśubandhair evāsyeṣṭaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ vidvāṃs tṛtīyaṃ sruvam unnayati

1.40.11	atha samidham abhyādadhāti svargasya tvā lokasya saṃkramaṇaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ vaṃśaṃ dadhāmi svāheti
1.40.12	atha juhoti
1.40.13	sa yāṃ prathamāṃ juhoti devāṃs tayāpnoti
1.40.14	atha yāṃ dvitīyāṃ juhoty ṛṣīṃs tayāpnoti
1.41.1	athopamārṣṭi
1.41.2	sa yat prathamam upamārṣṭi tena gandharvāpsarasaḥ prīṇāti
1.41.3	taṃ gandharvāpsarasa āhuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti
1.41.4	atha yad dvitīyam upamārṣṭi tena grahāṃś ca pitṝṃś ca prīṇāti
1.41.5	taṃ grahāś ca pitaraś cāhuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti
1.41.6	atha yad dvir aṅgulyā prāśnāti sa yat prathamaṃ prāśnāti tena prāṇāpānau tṛpyataḥ
1.41.7	taṃ prāṇāpānāv āhatuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti
1.41.8	atha yad dvitīyaṃ prāśnāti tenodānāpānau tṛpyataḥ
1.41.9	tam udānāpānāv āhatuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti
1.41.10	atha yat srucā prāśnāti tena samānavyānau ca garbhāṃś ca prīṇāti
1.41.11	taṃ samānavyānau garbhāś cāhuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti
1.41.12	atha yat srucaṃ niraśnāti tena devajanān prīṇāti
1.41.13	taṃ devajanā āhuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti
1.41.14	atha yat srucaḥ saṃkṣālanaṃ ninayati tena vayāṃsi prīṇāti
1.41.15	taṃ vayāṃsy āhuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti

1.41.17	tam ṛṣaya āhuḥ śraddhā te mā vigāt sarvaiḥ kāmais tṛpya svargaṃ lokam āpnuhīti

1.60.1	tad āhur yad etasya dīrghasattriṇo 'gnihotraṃ juhvato 'gnihotrīvatso naśyet kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.60.2	tad u hovācāruṇir dyaur vā agnihotrī tasyā āditya eva vatsa iyam evāgnihotrasthālī
1.60.3	na ha vā evaṃvido 'gnihotrīvatso naśyati
1.60.4	kva hy eṣa naśyet
1.60.5	no vā evaṃvido 'gnihotraṃ duhyamānaṃ skandati
1.60.6	asyāṃ hy eva pratitiṣṭhati
1.60.7	no vā evaṃvido 'gnihotrī duhyamānopaviśati
1.60.8	yadā vā eṣā suspṛṣṭaṃ varṣaty abhiniṣadyeva batāvarṣīd ity enām āhuḥ
1.60.9	atho khalv āhur yad eṣā lohitaṃ duhīta kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.60.10	avṛttiṃ vā eṣā yajamānasya pāpmānaṃ pratidṛśya duhe yā lohitaṃ duhe
1.60.11	sa vyutkrāmatety uktvānvāhāryapacanaṃ paricchādayitavai brūyāt
1.60.12	tad adhiśritya mekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā śrapayet

1.60.14	anirukto vai prajāpatiḥ
1.60.15	prājāpatyam agnihotram
1.60.16	atho bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ity etābhir vyāhṛtibhiḥ
1.60.17	etā vai vyāhṛtayaḥ sarvaprāyaścittayaḥ
1.60.18	tad anena sarveṇa prāyaścittiṃ kurute
1.60.19	'tho khalv āhuḥ
1.61.1	yad agnayo 'nugaccheyuḥ kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.61.2	tam u haika ulmukād eva nirmanthanti yato vai manuṣyasyāntato naśyati tato vāva sa tasya prāyaścittim icchata iti vadantaḥ
1.61.3	tad u tathā na vidyāt
1.61.4	ulmukaṃ hy eva tata ādāya cared ulmukasya vāvavraścam
1.61.5	ittham eva kuryāt
1.61.6	ulmukād evāpacchidyāraṇyor abhivimanthet
1.61.7	upāha taṃ kāmam āpnoti ya ulmukamathya upo taṃ yo 'raṇyoḥ
1.61.8	atho khalv āhur yad āhavanīya uddhṛto 'nugacchet kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.61.9	ananugato vā eṣa tāvad bhavati yāvad gārhapatyo nānugacchati
1.61.10	sa yady api bahv iva kṛtvo 'nugacchet punaḥpunar evainam uddharet
1.61.11	etad evātra karma
1.61.12	atho khalv āhur yad āhavanīya uddhṛte gārhapatyo 'nugacchet kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.61.13	tam u haike tata eva prāñcam uddharanti
1.61.14	tad u tathā na kuryāt
1.61.15	yo ha tatra brūyāt prāco nvā ayaṃ yajamānasya prāṇān prāvṛkṣan mariṣyaty ayaṃ yajamāna iti tathā haiva syāt
1.61.16	tam u haike tata eva pratyañcam āharanti
1.61.17	prāṇo vai gārhapatyo 'pāna āhavanīyaḥ
1.61.18	saṃvidānau vā imau prāṇāpānāv annam atta iti vadantaḥ
1.61.19	atho gṛho vai gārhapatyaḥ
1.61.20	pratiṣṭho vai gṛhāḥ
1.61.21	sa ya enaṃ tatra brūyāt pra nvā ayam asyai pratiṣṭhāyā acyoṣṭa mariṣyaty ayaṃ yajamāna iti tathā haiva syāt
1.61.22	tam u haike gārhapatya eva mathitvopasamādadhati
1.61.23	tad u tathā na kuryāt
1.61.24	yo ha tatra brūyād agnāv adhy agnim ajījanat kṣipre 'sya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo janiṣyata iti tathā haiva syāt
1.61.25	tam u haike 'nugamayya manthanti
1.61.26	tad u tathā na kuryāt
1.61.27	yo ha tatra brūyād api yat pariśiṣṭam abhūt tad ajījasan nāsya dāyādaś cana pariśekṣyata iti tathā haiva syāt
1.61.28	ittham eva kuryāt
1.61.29	araṇyor eva samārohayeta ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathās taṃ jānann agna ārohāthā no vardhayā rayim athā no vardhayā gira iti vā
1.61.30	sa udavasāya juhvad vaset
1.61.31	navāvasāne hāsyobhayatorātraṃ hutaṃ bhavati no kāṃcana paricakṣāṃ kurute
1.61.32	sa prātar bhasmoddhṛtya śakṛtpiṇḍena parilipya yathāyatham agnīn ādadhīta
1.61.33	etad evātra karma
1.62.1	atho khalv āhur yad āhavanīyam anuddhṛtam abhy astamiyāt kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.62.2	etasmāddha vai viśve devā apakrāmanti yasyāhavanīyam anuddhṛtam abhy astam eti
1.62.3	sa darbheṇa suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ prabadhya paścāddharet
1.62.4	tad etasya rūpaṃ kriyate ya eṣa tapati
1.62.5	ahno vā etad rūpam
1.62.6	tad ahno rūpaṃ kriyate

1.62.8	tam upasamādhāya caturgṛhītam ājyaṃ gṛhītvā viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ svāheti juhuyāt
1.62.9	tad yathā vā ada āvasathavāsinaṃ kruddhaṃ yantam ukṣavehatā vānumantrayetānyena vā priyeṇa dhāmnaivam eva tad viśvān devān anumantrayate

1.62.11	atho khalv āhur yad āhavanīyam anuddhṛtam

1.64.1	yad agnayaḥ saṃsṛjyeran kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti
1.64.2	sa yadi parastād anyo 'bhidahann eyāt sa vidyāt parastān mā śukram āgāt prajātir me bhūyasy abhūcchreyān bhaviṣyāmīti
1.64.3	tathā haiva syāt
1.64.4	yadi tv asya hṛdayaṃ vilikhed agnaye vivicaya iṣṭiṃ nirvapet
1.64.5	etā eva pañcadaśa sāmidhenīr vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye

1.64.8	atho hainayā pāpmanā vyāvṛtsyamāno yajeta

1.64.11	etā eva pañcadaśa sāmidhenīr vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye
1.64.12	athaite yājyāpuronuvākye
1.65.1	mā no asmin mahādhane parā varg bhārabhṛd yathā saṃ vargaṃ saṃ rayiṃ jayeti
1.65.2	atha yājyā parasyā adhi saṃvato 'varaṃ abhy ā tara yatrāham asmi taṃ aveti

1.65.5	atho khalv āhur yad agnāvagnim abhyuddharet kiṃ tatra karma kā prāyaścittir iti

1.65.7	etā eva pañcadaśa sāmidhenīr vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye

1.65.14	etā eva pañcadaśa sāmidhenīr vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye

1.67.1	asthūrir vā eṣa yajñaḥ puruṣasammitaḥ

1.68.1	prajāpatir vāvedam agra āsīt

1.68.4	sa śīrṣata eva mukhatas trivṛtaṃ stomam asṛjata gāyatrīṃ chando rathantaraṃ sāmāgniṃ devatāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manuṣyam ajaṃ paśum
1.68.5	tasmād brāhmaṇo gāyatrīcchandā āgneyo devatayā

1.96.11	agninaivainam āgneyān muñcanti varuṇena vāruṇāt
1.96.12	yasyāṃ varṣīyasyām ṛci hrasīyo hrasīyasyāṃ vā varṣīyas tām ānāyakāmaḥ pratipadaṃ kurvīta
1.96.13	varṣīyasā vā eṣa hrasīyaḥ prepsatīti hrasīyasā vā varṣīyaḥ
1.96.14	pra hrasīyasā varṣīya āpnoti ya evaṃ veda
1.96.15	eṣa devo amartya iti pratipadaṃ kurvīta yaḥ kāmayetāham evaikadhā śreṣṭhaḥ svānāṃ syāṃ rucam aśnuvīyeti
1.96.16	eṣa eṣa ity evaināñ jyaiṣṭhyāya śraiṣṭhyāyābhivadati
1.96.17	ekadhaiva śreṣṭhaḥ svānāṃ bhavati rucam aśnute
1.96.18	īśvaro ha tv asyāparaḥ prajāyām etādṛṅ vīro 'nājanitoḥ
1.96.19	eṣa eva nāto 'nya itīva hy enaṃ vāg abhivadati

1.96.21	devo amartya iti vā āha

1.98.1	svapnaṃ tandrīṃ manyum aśanayām akṣakāmyāṃ strīkāmyām iti

1.101.1	tad āhur hiṃkāreṇa vai prajāpatiḥ prajābhyo 'nnādyam asṛjata

1.102.1	gāyatrīṃ gāyati

1.229.1	tad āhū rathantaram eva prathame tṛce syād vāmadevyaṃ dvitīye bṛhat tṛtīya eṣāṃ lokānāṃ samārohāyeti
1.229.2	ime vai lokā etāni sāmāni
1.229.3	ayam eva loko rathantaram antarikṣaṃ vāmadevyam asāv eva bṛhat
1.229.4	tasmād evam eva kāryam eṣāṃ lokāṇāṃ samārohāyeti
1.229.5	prāṇavyānodānā ha khalu vā etāni sāmāni

1.230.1	tad āhur yat trivṛd eva stomānāṃ laghiṣṭho rathantaraṃ sāmnām āśvinam u vai śastrāṇāṃ gariṣṭham atha kasmāt trivṛd eva stomānāṃ rathantaraṃ sāmnām āśvinasya śastraṃ pratyudyantum arhata iti

1.232.1	tad āhur yad ekaviṃśam anu sarve yajñakratavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante 'ty u vā ekaviṃśāny ukthāni rātrir ety atha kenaiṣām ekaviṃśam anu rātriḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti
1.232.2	sa brūyād yad evaita ekaviṃśatiś ca trivṛto bhavanti nava caikaviṃśā iti
1.232.3	atha ha smāha bhāllabeyaḥ ka u svid adyobhayatojyotiṣā yajñakratunā yakṣyata iti

1.240.1	śaśvaddha te parābhūtā devānām aśanayā
1.240.2	atha ya enam anvāyatanta ta ima etarhi pariśiṣṭāḥ
1.240.3	ta u evāparyuṣitā bhavitāraḥ
1.240.4	sa haiṣa vaiśvadevaḥ stomaḥ
1.240.5	viśveṣāṃ haiva devānāṃ purā stoma āsa
1.240.6	tena yad agnim astuvan sāsyāgniṣṭomatā
1.240.7	agniṃ hainenāstuvan
1.240.8	stuvate hainena svās stuvate 'raṇāḥ
1.240.9	stuvate hainena jane svā ya evaṃ veda
1.240.10	sa haiṣa navaikaviṃśān abhisaṃpadyate
1.240.11	dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśaḥ
1.240.12	ekā stotriyātiricyate
1.240.13	yajamāno haiva so 'tiricyate yo vaivaṃ veda
1.240.14	yathā ha girau jyotir bhāyād evaṃ tasyāṃ janatāyāṃ bhāti yasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
1.240.15	sa u evaikaviṃśatiṃ trivṛto 'bhisaṃpadyate
1.240.16	agnir vai trivṛt
1.240.17	tad yad vai kiṃ ca trivṛt tat sarvam agnim evābhisaṃpadyate
1.240.18	yāś ca ha mahatyaḥ sampado yāś ca kṣullikās tā ha sarvā evaṃvidam abhisaṃpadyante
1.240.19	sarva enaṃ kāmā abhisaṃpadyante ya evaṃ veda
1.240.20	sa eṣa ekaviṃśatyā trivṛdbhir amuṣminn āditye pratiṣṭhito navabhir asāv ekaviṃśair asmin
1.240.21	tāv etāv evam anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau
1.240.22	pratitiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
1.241.1	nāsāv astam eti nāyam anugacchati
1.241.2	imam evāsāv abhy astam eti
1.241.3	tad asyāstatvam
1.241.4	imaṃ hy evāsāv abhy astam eti
1.241.5	amum evāyam abhy anugacchati
1.241.6	tad amuṣyāmutvam
1.241.7	amuṃ hy evāyam abhy anugacchati
1.241.8	na hāstam eti nānugacchati ya evaṃ veda
1.241.9	te haite savāsinyau devate
1.241.10	gacchati haitābhyāṃ savāsitvam
1.241.11	atho hāsyaite eva devate eṣu lokeṣu sarvapāpmānam apaghnatyau tiṣṭhataḥ
1.241.12	yāvad u ha vā ayam agnir asmin loke dīpyate tāvad amuṣmin loka ādityaḥ
1.241.13	na haiva tāvad evaṃvido lokaḥ kṣayyaḥ
1.241.14	yathā ha vā idam āyatanam āyatanī prepsed evam imaṃ lokam āpaḥ prepsanti yāś cāmūr yāś cemāḥ
1.241.15	tā yan na sambhindanty etasyaiva stomasya kratoḥ
1.241.16	eṣa evaināḥ stomo vidadate
1.241.17	sa yo nvāvaikasya rājyasya trātā syād yo dvayor yas trayāṇāṃ lokī vāva sa tena manyeta
1.241.18	antye tu sa loky asad yas teṣām eko 'sad ye 'sya lokasya trātāraḥ
1.241.19	asya ha sa lokasya trātṝṇām eko bhavati ya evaṃ veda
1.241.20	tena lokī sa
1.241.21	yāvaddha vā apy evaṃvido brāhmaṇā bhavitāro na haiva tāvad yāś cāmūr āpo yaś cemās tā ubhayīḥ sampadyemaṃ lokaṃ nirmraṣṭāraḥ
1.242.1	tasya vā etasyāgniṣṭomasya gāyatrīm eva prātassavanaṃ sampadyate triṣṭubhaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ jagatīṃ tṛtīyasavanam
1.242.2	tad etat svayaṃ sampannaṃ prātassavanam
1.242.3	gāyatram eva sarvam
1.242.4	atha catvāri chandāṃsi mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ gāyatrī bṛhatī kakup triṣṭup
1.242.5	tasyā etasyai kakubho 'ṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarāyai viṃśatim akṣarāṇi gāyatryām upadadhāti
1.242.6	sā triṣṭup sampadyate
1.242.7	atha yāny aṣṭāv atiricyante tāni bṛhatyām upadadhāti
1.242.8	sā triṣṭup sampadyate
1.242.9	triṣṭub eva triṣṭup
1.242.10	atha ṣaṭ chandāṃsi tṛtīyasavanaṃ gāyatry uṣṇikkakubhāv anuṣṭub jagatī bṛhatī
1.242.11	tasyā etasyai gāyatryai caturviṃśatyakṣarāyai viṃśatim akṣarāṇi kakubhy upadadhāti
1.242.12	sā jagatī sampadyate
1.242.13	atha yāni catvāry atiricyante tāny uṣṇihy upadadhāti
1.242.14	sā dvātriṃśadakṣarānuṣṭup sampadyate
1.242.15	anuṣṭub evānuṣṭup
1.242.16	tāṃ dvedhā vyūhati
1.242.17	tasyai ṣoḍaśākṣarāṇy anuṣṭubhy upadadhāti
1.242.18	sā jagatī sampadyate
1.242.19	svayam eva parastāj jagatī
1.242.20	atha yāni ṣoḍaśātiricyante tāni yajñāyajñīyasya bṛhatyām upadadhāti
1.242.21	sā dvāpañcāśadakṣarā jagatī sampadyate
1.242.22	catvāry akṣarāṇi jagatīm atiyanti
1.242.23	ta eva catuṣpadāḥ paśavaḥ
1.242.24	atho stanā eva virājo dohaḥ
1.242.25	atho pratiṣṭhaiva
1.242.26	yathā catuṣpadī pratitiṣṭhet tathā
1.242.27	tad v atraivānuvyeti
1.242.28	na kiṃcanātiricyate
1.242.29	vāmadevyasya nyūne trīṇy upadadhāti
1.243.1	yajñāyajñīya ekam
1.243.2	gāyatraṃ vai prātassavanaṃ traiṣṭubhaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanam
1.243.3	brahmaṇo 'sya sataḥ kṣatrasyeva prakāśo bhavati vaiśyasyeva rayiḥ puṣṭir ya evaṃ veda
1.243.4	tasyo evākṣaraśo gāyatrīm eva prātassavanaṃ sampadyate triṣṭubhaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ jagatīṃ tṛtīyasavanam
1.243.5	ekānnasaptatiḥ prātassavanasya stotriyāṣ ṣaṣṭis triṣṭubho mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ caturviṃśatiś ca jagatīs tṛtīyasavanam ekā ca kakup
1.243.6	puruṣo vai kakup
1.243.7	sa ha sa yajamāna evaitasyāṃ sampady adhyūḍhaḥ
1.243.8	tad v atraivānuvyeti
1.243.9	na kiṃcanātiricyate
1.243.10	ekasyai kakubho 'ṣṭāviṃśatyakṣarāyai catvāry akṣarāṇy ādāya vāmadevyasya nyūne trīṇy upadadhāti yajñāyajñīya ekam
1.243.11	atha yā gāyatrī pariśiṣyate tām ada ekānnasaptatyāṃ prātassavanasya stotriyāsu pratyupadadhāti
1.243.12	tad u hānantam
1.243.13	anantāṃ śriyaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda
1.244.1	tasyo eva dve savane bṛhatīṃ sampadyete
1.244.2	yathaiva purā tṛtīyasavanaṃ tathā tṛtīyasavanam
1.244.3	ekānnasaptatiḥ prātassavanasya stotriyāḥ
1.244.4	tāṣ ṣaṭcatvāriṃśad bṛhatyaḥ sampadyante
1.244.5	yā hi tisro gāyatryas te dve bṛhatyau
1.244.6	tāṣ ṣaṭcatvāriṃśad bṛhatyaḥ sampadyante
1.244.7	tad etad āyad eva prātassavanaṃ bṛhatīm abhisaṃpadyate
1.244.8	yasmād āyad eva prātassavanaṃ bṛhatīm abhisaṃpadyate tasmād brāhmaṇo jāyamāna eva lokī jāyate
1.244.9	taṃ vā tvai caraṇena bhūyāṃsaṃ kurute taṃ vā kanīyāṃsam
1.244.10	athaitad dvau mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ sampādayata udgātā ca hotā ca
1.244.11	catvāri chandāṃsy udgātā yunakti
1.244.12	tāni ca hotānuśaṃsaty upa ca trīṇy āharaty anuṣṭubhaṃ paṅktiṃ jagatīm
1.244.13	gāyatrī ca jagatī ca te dve bṛhatyau
1.244.14	uṣṇik ca triṣṭup ca te dve bṛhatyau
1.244.15	anuṣṭup ca paṅktiś ca te dve bṛhatyau
1.244.16	bṛhaty eva bṛhatī
1.244.17	yasmād etad dvau mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ sampādayatas tasmād rājanyasya kāryo loka iṣṭāpūrtena śraddhayā brahmaṇyatayā
1.244.18	atha yasmād yathaiva purā tṛtīyasavanaṃ tathā tṛtīyasavanaṃ tasmād u brāhmaṇāc ca rājanyāc ca vaiśyo lokītaraḥ
1.244.19	na hi tathā lokī yathā brāhmaṇaś ca rājanyaś ca
1.245.1	kﾱptaṃ ha vai lokaṃ yajamāno 'bhijāyate
1.245.2	paśūn eva prathamasya tṛcasya prathamayā stotriyayā jayati bhūmiṃ dvitīyayāgniṃ tṛtīyayā
1.245.3	antarikṣam eva dvitīyasya tṛcasya prathamayā stotriyayā jayati vāyuṃ dvitīyayā prāṇaṃ tṛtīyayā
1.245.4	divam eva tṛtīyasya tṛcasya prathamayā stotriyayā jayaty ādityaṃ dvitīyayā nakṣatrāṇi tṛtīyayā
1.245.5	navaitā bahiṣpavamānyo bhavanti nava devalokāḥ
1.245.6	tān evaitābhir āpnoti
1.245.7	tā etās tisro virājo daivī yajñiyā mānuṣī
1.245.8	etāsu ha sucittaś śailano janakaṃ vaidehaṃ samūde
1.245.9	sa hovāca śraddhā māvidad ṛtvijo me hvayantv iti
1.245.10	tasmai ha kurupañcālān ṛtvija ūhuḥ
1.245.11	teṣu hāgateṣu śailano bibhayāṃcakārāgacchan brāhmaṇā ivodantā yān vā ayam iha na laghūyed iti
1.245.12	sa hovāca saṃrāḍ vākyaṃ me 'stīti
1.245.13	tisro vā imā virājo 'tṛṣyantīḥ sarvakāmā annābhidhānāḥ
1.245.14	tāsu sma tvā yo 'ntar avadadhāti taṃ smaivodgātāraṃ vṛṇīṣva
1.245.15	sa vāva teṣāṃ kāmānām abhivoḍhā ya etāsu kāmāḥ
1.245.16	sa u eva punarmṛtyor ativoḍhā ya evaṃ vedeti
1.246.1	atha ha pradhāvayāṃcakāra
1.246.2	tasmin ha praiṣyan
1.246.3	imān ha sma pṛcchaty āsāṃ virājām ṛddhim
1.246.4	te ha sma nābhyāpayanti
1.246.5	ya u ha smābhyāpayati yāṃ ha smaikām abhyāpayati sa ha smāste
1.246.6	brāhmaṇaṃ batāhaṃ brāhmaṇam etāsu mīmāṃsamānam apaśyam accha dhāvata śailanam iti
1.246.7	tad viyajanaṃ hāsa yathā śailana iyeṣa
1.246.8	tā etās tisro virājo daivī yajñiyā mānuṣī

1.246.32	sa yo ha sa mṛtyuḥ saṃvatsara eva sa
1.246.33	tasya hartava eva mukhāni

1.246.35	na hāsyānṛtau mriyate ya evaṃ veda
1.246.36	ṛtuṣu vāva prajāyate prajayā paśubhir ya evaṃ veda
1.247.1	tā etā nava bahiṣpavamānyaḥ
1.247.2	tāṣ ṣaḍ bṛhatyaḥ
1.247.3	ṣaḍ u mṛtyor mukhāny ṛtava eva
1.247.4	atha ha vā etāni mṛtyor mukhāni bṛhaty eva prativibhavitum arhati nānyac chandaḥ
1.247.5	sa bṛhatyaivartor mukham apidadhāti bṛhatyartor bṛhatyartoḥ
1.247.6	sa yathā samena viṣamam atītya pratyavekṣetaivam evaitaṃ mṛtyuṃ parāṅ atītya pratyavekṣate
1.247.7	tam etaṃ trivṛtaṃ vajram upapravartayanti
1.247.8	sa eṣo 'har ahar imān lokān anuvartate
1.247.9	taddha smāha nagarī jānaśruteyo na haiva tāvad daivāsuraṃ bhavitā yāvad eṣa trivṛd vajro 'har ahar imān lokān anuvartiteti
1.247.10	ūrdhvo hy ayam agnir dīpyate tiryaṅṅ ayaṃ vāyuḥ pavate 'rvāṅ asāv ādityas tapati
1.247.11	ta ete 'nimeṣam anyonyam īkṣante
1.247.12	katham eteṣv evaṃ satsu daivāsuraṃ syād iti

1.248.1	tad āhuḥ sa vādya yajeta sa vānyaṃ yājayed yaś catuṣṭomena yājayan sarvastomena yājayati
1.248.2	navaitā bahiṣpavamānyo bhavanti
1.248.3	tāsāṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ padāni
1.248.4	tena triṇavaṃ stomaṃ nāntaryanti
1.248.5	navaivaitā bahiṣpavamānyo bhavanti
1.248.6	caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī

1.248.8	tena trayastriṃśaṃ stomaṃ nāntaryanti
1.248.9	etad vai catuṣṭomena yājayan sarvastomena yājayati

1.248.11	trivṛd vāva stomānām avamas trivṛt paramaḥ

1.248.15	atha ha smāhāruṇiḥ kiṃ so 'bhicaret kiṃ vābhicāryamāṇa ādriyeta ya etaṃ trivṛtaṃ vajraṃ tribhṛṣṭim acchidram acchambaṭkāriṇam ahar ahar imān lokān anuvartamānaṃ veda

1.249.1	tad u ha smāhopajīvaḥ khāḍāyano 'ham evaitaṃ trivṛtaṃ vajraṃ pratyakṣaṃ veda

1.250.1	tad āhur yat puruṣo yoṣāṃ sambhaviṣyan parokṣaṃ nilayanam icchate 'nta evānye paśavo 'nyonyasya skandanti kiṃ tad yajñe kriyate yasmāt tat tatheti
1.250.2	sa brūyād yasmāt trivṛt stomo bahiṣpavamāne prāṅ ivotkramya dhiṣṇyebhyo nilīya gāyatrīṃ skandati madhya evānya ṛtvijo dhiṣṇyānāṃ yad anta āsate tasmāt tat tatheti
1.250.3	trivṛtaṃ hi stomaṃ puruṣo 'nvāyatto dhiṣṇyān anye paśava iti

1.250.7	sā puronuvākyāṃ prajanayati puronuvākyā yājyāṃ yājyā vaṣaṭkāraṃ vaṣaṭkāra āhutīr āhutayo dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇāḥ svargaṃ lokam
1.250.8	tad yathā vittaṃ pravāhaṃ kṣipraṃ pravahed evam evainam etā devatāḥ svargāya lokāya pravahanti

1.270.31	na haivaṃvit punar mriyate
1.270.32	devatāsv ātmānam upasaṃdadhāti
1.271.1	athaiteṣāṃ mahatāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ samuditam āruṇer jīvalasya kārīrāder aṣāḍhasya sāvayasasyendradyumnasya bhāllabeyasyeti
1.271.2	jīvalaś ca ha kārīrādir indradyumnaś ca bhāllabeyas tau hāruṇer ācāryasya sabhāgāv ājagmatuḥ
1.271.3	te hāṣāḍhasya gṛheṣu śiśyire
1.271.4	sa hovācāṣāḍha ām āruṇe yat sahaiva brahmacaryam acarāva sahānvabravīvahy atha kenedaṃ tvam asmān atyanūciṣe
1.271.5	yad idaṃ tvam iyatpriyaḥ kīrter iyatpriyaś cakṣuṣa iyatpriyaḥ saner asi kena tvam idaṃ prāpitheti
1.271.6	sa hovāca dhūrṣv evāhaṃ tad upāsa iti
1.271.7	kiṃ tvaṃ tad dhūrṣūpāssa iti
1.271.8	priyam iti
1.271.9	ya āsāṃ priyam upāste kiṃ sa bhavatīti
1.271.10	priya eva sa kīrteḥ priyaś cakṣuṣaḥ priyaḥ saner bhavatīti
1.271.11	evam eva tvam asīti hocuḥ
1.271.12	atha hocur jīvalaṃ kārīrādiṃ yad idaṃ tvam eva tasyārdhasya śreṣṭho 'si yasminn asy api tvā rājāno 'dhastād upāsate kena tvam idaṃ prāpitheti
1.271.13	sa hovāca dhūrṣv evāhaṃ tad upāsa iti
1.271.14	kiṃ tvaṃ tad dhūrṣūpāssa iti
1.271.15	śriyam iti
1.271.16	ya āsāṃ śriyam upāste kiṃ sa bhavatīti
1.271.17	yasminn evārdhe bhavati tasya śreṣṭho bhavaty apy enaṃ rājāno 'dhastād upāsata iti
1.271.18	evam eva tvam asīti hocuḥ
1.271.19	atha hocur aṣāḍhaṃ sāvayasaṃ yad idaṃ tvaṃ śārkarākṣāṇāṃ vāva grāmaṇy evāsi kena tvam idaṃ prāpitheti
1.271.20	sa hovāca dhūrṣv evāhaṃ tad upāsa iti
1.271.21	kiṃ tvaṃ tad dhūrṣūpāssa iti
1.271.22	jātam iti
1.271.23	ya āsāṃ jātam upāste kiṃ sa bhavatīti
1.271.24	yatraiva sajāto bhavati tad grāmaṇīr bhavatīti
1.271.25	evam eva tvam asīti hocuḥ
1.271.26	atha hocur indradyumnaṃ bhāllabeyaṃ yad idaṃ tavoparyupary anyān kīrtiś carati vivacanam evāsi kena tvam idaṃ prāpitheti
1.271.27	sa hovāca dhūrṣv evāhaṃ tad upāsa iti
1.271.28	kiṃ tvaṃ tad dhūrṣūpāssa iti
1.271.29	yaśa iti
1.271.30	ya āsāṃ yaśa upāste kiṃ sa bhavatīti
1.271.31	uparyupary evāsyānyān kīrtiś carati vivacanam eva bhavatīti
1.271.32	evam eva tvam asīti hocuḥ
1.271.33	te hocur itthaṃ ced idam abhūt
1.271.34	eta idaṃ saṃprabravāmahā iti
1.272.1	te hāruṇim ūcus tvaṃ vai na ācāryo 'si
1.272.2	tvaṃ prathamo brūṣveti
1.272.3	sa hovāca gāyatrīm evāhaṃ priyam upāsa iti
1.272.4	prāṇo vai gāyatrī
1.272.5	prāṇo vai priyam
1.272.6	na vai prāṇāt preyaḥ kiṃ canāsti
1.272.7	sa ya evam etāṃ gāyatrīṃ priyam upāste yathā priya eva prāṇa ātmana evaṃ priya eva sa kīrter evaṃ priyaś cakṣuṣa evaṃ priyaḥ saner bhavatīti
1.272.8	atha hovāca jīvalaḥ kārīrādis triṣṭubham evāhaṃ śriyam upāsa iti
1.272.9	kṣatraṃ vai triṣṭup
1.272.10	kṣatraṃ vai śrīḥ
1.272.11	sa ya evam etāṃ triṣṭubhaṃ śriyam upāste yasminn evārdhe bhavati tasya śreṣṭho bhavaty apy enaṃ rājāno 'dhastād upāsata iti
1.272.12	atha hovācāṣāḍhaḥ sāvayaso jagatīm evāhaṃ bhūmānaṃ prajātim upāsa iti
1.272.13	bhūmā vai prajātir jagatī chandasām
1.272.14	sa ya evam etāṃ jagatīṃ bhūmānaṃ prajātim upāste bhūmānam eva prajayā paśubhir gacchati yatraiva sajāto bhavati tad grāmaṇīr bhavatīti
1.272.15	atha hovācendradyumno bhāllabeyo 'nuṣṭubham evāhaṃ yaśa upāsa iti
1.272.16	vāg vā anuṣṭup
1.272.17	vāg u vai yaśaḥ
1.272.18	vāg upary upary anyān kīrtiś carati
1.272.19	sa ya evam etām anuṣṭubhaṃ yaśa upāsta eṣaivāsya vāg anuṣṭub upary upary evānyān kīrtir viharanty eti vivacanam eva bhavatīti
1.273.1	te ha vai te tathaikaikenaivāsuḥ
1.273.2	atha ya evam etāni sarvāṇy ekadhā vedaivaṃ haitāni sarvāṇy ekadhā bhavanty ekadhaiva śreṣṭhaḥ svānāṃ bhavati
1.273.3	tad u hovāca vāsiṣṭhaś caikitāneyaḥ paścevānubudhya dhuro ha vā ime brāhmaṇā mīmāṃsamānās tām eva dhuraṃ nāvāgman yasyām etā dhuri sarvā adhīti
1.273.4	retasyāṃ ha vai sa tad uvāca
1.273.5	yāṃ ha vā āhur ekā dhūr iti retasyā ha vai sā dhurāṃ dhūḥ
1.273.6	annaṃ tat
1.273.7	dhurām alaṃkaraṇam
1.273.8	surabhir gandho gāyatryai
1.273.9	darśanīyas triṣṭubhaḥ
1.273.10	śravaṇīyo jagatyai
1.273.11	yadaiva vācā puṇyaṃ vadati tad anuṣṭubhaḥ
1.273.12	sa ha vā enā annam ādadhāti ya enā etaiḥ samardhayati
1.273.13	tā enam annādyamānā annādaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ svānāṃ kurvanti
1.273.14	annādaś śreṣṭhaḥ svānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
1.274.1	trayo ha vā ete samudrā yat pavamānā agnir vāyur asāv ādityaḥ
1.274.2	taiś channair udgāyet
1.274.3	sa yarhi vai prajāpatiḥ prajābhyo vṛṣṭim annādyaṃ prayacchati chādyanta ete tarhi
1.274.4	prajāpatir eṣa yad udgātā
1.274.5	sa yat pavamānaiś channair udgāyati chādayaty eva yajamānam annādyena chādayaty ātmānaṃ chādayati prajāḥ
1.274.6	bahuvarṣī tatra parjanyo bhavatīti ha smāha kūṭaś śailano yatrāham udgāyāmīti
1.274.7	yatra vai bahuvarṣī parjanyo bhavati kalyāṇo vai tatra balīvardo 'śvataro hastī niṣkaḥ puruṣaḥ
1.274.8	rūpaṃ rūpaṃ vāva tatra kalyāṇam ājāyata ity etaddha tad vidvān uvāca
1.274.9	yo vai devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca vyāvartayati vi pāpmanāvartate
1.274.10	devā vai pavamānāḥ
1.274.11	prajāḥ pṛṣṭhokthāni
1.274.12	taiś channaiḥ parokṣam aniruktaiḥ pavamānair udgāyet
1.274.13	channā iva hi parokṣam aniruktā iva devāḥ
1.274.14	prajāḥ pṛṣṭhokthāni
1.274.15	tair acchannaiḥ pratyakṣaṃ niruktair udgāyet
1.274.16	acchannā iva hi pratyakṣaṃ niruktā iva manuṣyāḥ
1.274.17	etad vai devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca vyāvartayati vi pāpmanāvartate ya evaṃ veda
1.275.1	daivīṃ ha vā eṣa saṃsadam eti yaḥ pavamānair udgāyati
1.275.2	sa yathā śreyāṃsam abhyāyann evaṃ śikṣann ivopanamasyann iva saṃsiddhaiś śaknuvann upahanyamāna udgāyet
1.275.3	yathāyantam āmīved yathā yad yācet tad dadyāt tādṛk tat
1.275.4	atha ya etair asaṃsiddhair aśaknuvann anupahanyamāna udgāyed yathāyantaṃ pratimīved yathā yad yācet tan na dadyāt tādṛg u tat
1.275.5	tad u hātraiva yajñasya samṛddhaṃ ca vyṛddhaṃ ca vijñāyate
1.275.6	atihāryā ha vā eṣā yat pavamānāḥ
1.275.7	yo vā atihāryām asaṃvīto 'tigāhate mṛdā vai sa lipyate nāyati vai
1.275.8	atha yaḥ saṃvīto 'tigāhate na mṛdā lipyate na nāyati
1.275.9	evam iva vai pavamānā upacaryāḥ
1.275.10	tad āhur yad anyāni stotrāṇi stotriyapratipado 'tha kasmāt pavamānā astotriyapratipada iti
1.275.11	sa brūyāt prāṇā vai pavamānāḥ
1.275.12	prāṇā u pāvamānyaḥ
1.275.13	tad yat pavamānān pāvamānībhir evānupratipadyeran parāñca eva prāṇān nirmṛjyur iti
1.275.14	tān yad anuṣṭubhānupratipadyante vāg vā anuṣṭub vācy apāno niyato vācaiva tad apānaṃ dadhāra
1.276.1	tad āhur aśāntam iva vā etat stotraṃ yat stotriyeṇa nānupratipadyante
1.276.2	kenaiṣāṃ stotriyapratipado 'nitaṃ bhavatīti
1.276.3	sa brūyād vāg vā anuṣṭup
1.276.4	vācy u vai sarvāṇi chandāṃsi
1.276.5	yad āgneyam aindraṃ pavamānaṃ tenaiṣāṃ stotriyapratipado 'nitaṃ bhavati
1.276.6	jayā ha vai nāmaite stomā yat pavamānāḥ
1.276.7	pavamānair vai devā asurān parāñca eva jayanta āyan
1.276.8	tad yat pavamānāḥ parāñca eva bhavanti yathā parāṅ eva jayann iyāt tādṛk tat
1.276.9	tān yad anuṣṭubhānupratipadyante vāg vā anuṣṭub vāg u vai vācayitrī vācā vā āha prehi jayābhikrāma māpakramīr iti
1.276.10	sa yathā vācā brūyāt prehi jayābhikrāma māpakramīr iti tādṛk tat
1.276.11	devā vai pavamānāḥ
1.276.12	tāni devānāṃ stotrāṇi
1.276.13	tāni devā anvāyattāḥ
1.276.14	prajāḥ pṛṣṭhokthāni
1.276.15	tāni prajānāṃ stotrāṇi
1.276.16	tāni prajā anvāyattāḥ
1.276.17	tad yat pavamānaiḥ parācīnair eva stuvate tasmāt parāñco devāḥ
1.276.18	parāṅ āditya eti parāṅ candramāḥ parāñci nakṣatrāṇi parāṅ agnir dahann eti
1.276.19	atha yasmāt pṛṣṭhokthaiḥ parācīnaiś cārvācīnaiś ca stuvate tasmād u parācīś cārvācīś ca prajāḥ
1.276.20	parāñcaḥ prātaḥ prerate te sāyaṃ samāvartante
1.276.21	parāg retaḥ siktaṃ tad arvāk prajāyate
1.277.1	pṛthur ha vainyo divyān vrātyān papraccha
1.277.2	yajñasya dhāma paramaṃ guhāyāṃ nirmitaṃ mahato 'ntarikṣāt kasmād yanti pavamānāḥ parāñcaḥ kasmād ukthyāḥ punar abhyākanikradatīti
1.277.3	devā anyāṃ vartanim adhvarasya mānuṣāsa upajīvanty anyāṃ tasmād yanti pavamānāḥ parāñcas tasmād ukthyāḥ punar abhyākanikradatīti ha pratyūcuḥ
1.277.4	yo vai devān manuṣyeṣv ābhaktān veda manuṣyān u deveṣv ābhakta eva deveṣu bhavaty ābhakto manuṣyeṣu
1.277.5	gacchati taṃ lokaṃ yatra devāḥ
1.277.6	nāsmād devatā apakrāmanti
1.277.7	devā vai pavamānāḥ
1.277.8	prajāḥ pṛṣṭhokthāni
1.277.9	sāma vai devāḥ
1.277.10	prajāś chandāṃsi
1.277.11	tad yat pavamānasāmāni parāñcy eva bhavanty atheyam ṛg anuniveṣṭate tena devā manuṣyeṣv ābhaktāḥ
1.277.12	atha yad abhyāvartiṣv ṛcaṃ niveṣṭamānāṃ sāmānuniveṣṭate teno manuṣyā deveṣv ābhaktāḥ
1.277.13	sa ya etad evaṃ vedābhakta eva deveṣu bhavaty ābhakto manuṣyeṣu
1.277.14	gacchati taṃ lokaṃ yatra devāḥ
1.277.15	nāsmād devatā apakrāmanti
1.278.1	yo vai devarūpaṃ ca manuṣyarūpaṃ ca vyāvartayati vi pāpmanāvartate
1.278.2	devā vai pavamānāḥ
1.278.3	prajāḥ pṛṣṭhokthāni

1.278.5	atha yasmāt pṛṣṭhokthair nānārūpāsu nānādevatyāsu stuvate tasmād u prajā nānārūpāś śveto rohitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ
1.278.6	etad vai devarūpaṃ ca manuṣyarūpaṃ ca vyāvartayati vi pāpmanāvartate ya evaṃ veda

1.278.14	tam etaṃ yajñasya rasaṃ pravṛhya purānyasmāt prajāpataye prayacchati tasmād bahiṣpavamānena stoṣyantaḥ prahvārā iva prakupitā iva sarpanti
1.278.15	evam iva vai śreyasa upacāraḥ
1.278.16	tasmād u tasya stotre na vyāharet
1.278.17	ko hi śreyasaḥ pariveṣaṇam avavaditum arhati

1.278.20	tenāsyāpīnena rasavatā stutaṃ bhavati
1.279.1	yo vai devayaśasaṃ ca manuṣyayaśasaṃ ca veda yaśa eva deveṣu gacchati yaśo manuṣyeṣu

1.280.1	yo vai savanānāṃ jyaiṣṭhyaṃ veda gacchati jyaiṣṭhyaṃ na jyaiṣṭhyād avarohati
1.280.2	gāyatrī vai prātassavanasya jyaiṣṭhyam

1.325.17	tad dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ pātayitvā sarvasminn eva sāmann ātmānaṃ dadhyāt

1.325.19	so 'pahatya pāpmānaṃ svargaṃ lokam eti
1.325.20	etat tad yat kṛtvā śreyān manyata iti
1.326.1	yo vā ṛksāmābhyām āyatanavadbhyām ārtvijyaṃ karoty āyatanavān bhavati
1.326.2	prastāva evarcaḥ sāmann āyatanam
1.326.3	yad ūrdhvaṃ prastāvāc channaṃ gāyati tat sāmna ṛcy āyatanam
1.326.4	pratihāra evarcaḥ sāmann āyatanam
1.326.5	yad ūrdhvaṃ pratihārāc channaṃ gāyati tat sāmna ṛcy āyatanam
1.326.6	nidhanam evarcaḥ sāmann āyatanam
1.326.7	yan nidhanam atisvarati tat sāmna ṛcy āyatanam
1.326.8	sa ya evam etābhyām ṛksāmābhyām āyatanavadbhyām ārtvijyaṃ karoty āyatanavān eva bhavati
1.326.9	tad vā etad dvayam evark caiva sāma ca
1.326.10	tayor yat satyaṃ prajāsu bhavati jayati taṃ lokaṃ yaḥ satyena jeyaḥ
1.326.11	vāg vā ṛcaḥ satyam
1.326.12	manaḥ sāmnaḥ
1.326.13	ete ha vā ṛksāmayoḥ satye
1.326.14	satyaṃ prajāsu bhavati jayati taṃ lokaṃ yaḥ satyena jeyaḥ
1.326.15	ṛcaḥ satyena sāma gāyāt
1.326.16	sāmnaḥ satyenarcam
1.326.17	ṛksāmne u ha vai svargasya lokasyeśāte
1.326.18	taṃ ha vā ete svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayataḥ

1.326.20	tasmād evam eva geye
1.327.1	rathantareṇa stoṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthivīm abhimṛśati namo mātre pṛthivyai rathantara mā mā hiṃsīr iti
1.327.2	atha mahimnaḥ saṃbharati yas te agnau mahimā yas te apsu rathe yas te mahimā stanayitnau ya u te vāte yas te mahimā tena saṃbhava rathantara draviṇasvan na edhīti
1.327.3	atha vāmadevyaṃ purastāc chāntim abhivyāharati prajāpatir asi vāmadevya brahmaṇaś śaraṇa tan mā pāhīti
1.327.4	athaitā amṛtavyāhṛtīr abhivyāharati bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ ka idam udgāsyati sa idam udgāsyatīti
1.327.5	prajāpatir vai kaḥ
1.327.6	tam evādāv ārtvijyāya vṛṇīte

1.327.9	athābhyaniti

1.327.13	atha ye 'śānte bṛhadrathantare gāyanti te haite yuvānaś śrotriyāḥ pramīyante svayam upariṣṭād vāmadevyam
1.328.1	sa yathā gharmaṃ taptaṃ śaphābhyāṃ parigṛhya hared evam evaitad bṛhadrathantare vāmadevyābhyāṃ parigṛhya harati
1.328.2	te enaṃ nodoṣataḥ
1.328.3	sa sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃ vidvān bṛhadrathantare gāyati
1.328.4	iyaṃ vai rathantaram
1.328.5	tasyā asau vatso yo 'sau tapati
1.328.6	sa yad bhā bhā iti stobdhy etam eva tad ādityaṃ mukha ādhāya gāyati
1.328.7	sa yathā dhenuṃ vatsenopasṛjya prattāṃ duhītaivam evaitena gītena rathantaraṃ duhe yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate
1.328.8	śrīr vai rathantaram
1.328.9	tasyā ime stobhā yad asyāṃ pṛthivyām adhi
1.328.10	saiṣā śrīr nānyatrākṣarebhya āptavyā
1.328.11	sa yad akṣareṣu stobdhy etām eva tacchriyam āptvaitasyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati
1.328.12	sā haiṣaikasthā śrīr yad akṣareṣu
1.328.13	tasmād akṣareṣu stobdhavyam
1.329.1	tad etad amūlaṃ rathantaraṃ yad anyatrākṣarebhyaḥ
1.329.2	etasmāddhīdam āyatanāt pracyavante ye 'nyatrākṣarebhyaḥ stobhanti
1.329.3	atha yo 'kṣareṣu stobdhi sva eva tad āyatane pratitiṣṭhati
1.329.4	tasmād akṣareṣv eva stobdhavyam
1.329.5	devatāgāyinaḥ kurupañcālā āyatanād acyavanteti ha smāha śāṭyāyaniḥ
1.329.6	mano vai pūrvam atha vāk
1.329.7	mano vai bṛhad vāg rathantaram
1.329.8	tad yatra bṛhadrathantare ājim aitāṃ tad bṛhad udajayat
1.329.9	rathantaraṃ hīyamānam amanyata
1.329.10	tad yat kṣipraṃ rathantaraṃ gāyati manaś caiva tad vācaṃ ca same karoti
1.329.11	tad idaṃ rathantaram īkṣate yo mām anena samam akṛddhantāyaṃ kṣipre pāpmānaṃ vijahātv iti

1.331.1	ṣoḍaśākṣarāṇi stobhati
1.331.2	ṣoḍaśakalo vai puruṣaḥ

1.331.5	caturdaśa caturdaśottarayoḥ

1.331.9	tac catuṣpadaḥ paśūn avarunddhe
1.331.10	ṣoḍaśākṣarāṇi stobhati

1.331.18	tad udgātā yajamānasya bhrātṛvyāyatane bhrātṛvyaṃ vitakṣṇoti bhrātṛvyāyatane bhrātṛvyaṃ vināśaṃ nayati

1.331.20	ṣoḍaśākṣarāṇi stobhati

1.331.25	sa ha sa indraś chandasāṃ madhyataḥ prāvasito bahūni chandāṃsi purastād bahūny upariṣṭāt
1.332.1	chandāṃsi vai sarve stomāḥ sarve paśavaḥ sarve devāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve kāmāḥ
1.332.2	tat sarvān stomān sarvān paśūn sarvān devān sarvān lokān sarvān kāmān āpnoti

1.332.6	atha yo 'kṣareṣu stobdhy annam u vai stobhas stobhena stobhenaiva mṛtyor āsyam apidhāyaitaṃ mṛtyum atitarati
1.332.7	atho samudra eṣa yad rathantaram
1.332.8	atha yo 'nyatrākṣarebhyaḥ stobdhi sa evaitaṃ samudraṃ praviśati
1.332.9	atha yo 'kṣareṣu stobdhi yathā nāvā vā plavena vā dvīpād dvīpaṃ saṃkrāmed evam evaitaṃ samudram atitarati

2.1.5	iyam eva pṛthivī
2.1.6	vāg vai rathantaram
2.1.7	saiṣāvadati
2.1.8	sā dvitīyam ahaḥ prāpya bṛhatī bhavati yām imāṃ śreṣṭhī vācaṃ vadatīty avocad iti
2.1.9	sā hi dūrāc chrūyate
2.1.10	sā tṛtīyam ahaḥ prāpya vairūpā bhavati yad idaṃ tiryag vāca ehi prehy āharopāharāśaya pāyayeti
2.1.11	sā caturtham ahaḥ prāpya virāḍ bhavati
2.1.12	tūṣṇīṃ niṣadyam
2.1.13	etad dha vai vairājyaṃ vāco yat tūṣṇīṃniṣadyaṃ yām imāṃ śreṣṭhinas tūṣṇīm āsīnasyaiva jijñāsante
2.1.14	sā pañcamam ahaḥ prāpya śakvarī bhavati yayā praśiṣṭaś śaknoti
2.1.15	sā ṣaṣṭham ahaḥ prāpya revatī bhavati yayānnādyaṃ pradīyate
2.1.16	sā na māsimāsy āttavyā
2.1.17	lelibhasyaitad ājānaṃ yām imāṃ lelibhā vācaṃ vadanti
2.1.18	imāṃ vā ayaṃ hyo 'vadad imāṃ pūrvedyur imāṃ pūrvasamām
2.1.19	samānīṃ bata vācaṃ vadati na batainaṃ paryetīti
2.1.20	evaṃ tad yan māsimāsi pṛṣṭhāny upayanti
2.2.1	atha yathā tūṣṇīm āsitvā yad eva kalyāṇaṃ yat puṇyaṃ tad vyāharet
2.2.2	sā vyāhṛtaṃ bata vyāhārṣīd vyāhartā bateti
2.2.3	evaṃ tad yad upariṣṭāt saṃvatsarasya pṛṣṭhāny upayanti
2.2.4	abhy eva rathantareṇa krandati reta eva bṛhatā siñcati garbhān eva vairūpeṇa dadhāti janayaty eva vairājena vardhayaty eva śakvarībhir annādyam eva revatībhiḥ pradīyate
2.2.5	tat kuto māsimāsi janiṣyate
2.2.6	yo vai māsyo garbho 'vapadyate 'srāvīd iti vai tam āhuḥ
2.2.7	sa yathā sāmi garbhāḥ pateyur yathā vāmā oṣadhīr dāyus tāḥ kiṃ ditā syuś śuṣyeyur evaivaṃ tad yan māsimāsi pṛṣṭhāny upayanti
2.3.1	atha yatho saṃvatsaraṃ bhṛtvā garbhaṃ janayed ṛtau pakvā oṣadhīḥ pracinuyus tāsāṃ kāmān kurvīrann evaṃ tad yad upariṣṭāt saṃvatsarasya pṛṣṭhāny upayanti
2.3.2	atha ha smāha citro gāṅgyāyani spandanaiṣā bahudohinī yat pṛṣṭhāni
2.3.3	ko 'haraha spandanāyai dhārayitṝn eṣiṣyati
2.3.4	na vā etāny avyūḍhe duhre no vā etāny upariṣṭād vyūḍhe daśarātre gāyatryā parihṛtāni duhre
2.3.5	sa yathā spandanāṃ rajjubhir vyapatatya duhyur evam etāny upariṣṭād vyūḍhe daśarātre gāyatryā parihṛtāni duhre
2.3.6	sa yathā upasṛjed evaṃ tad yad gāyatramukhas tryaho yathābhidadhyād evaṃ tad yad gāyatramadhyo yathāpahṛtya duhyād evaṃ tad yad gāyatrottamaḥ
2.3.7	tasmād upariṣṭād evopetyānīti
2.3.8	tad u hovāca śāṭyāyanir yo vā eṣa candramā eṣa vāva saṃvatsara eṣa prajāpatir eṣa māsa iti
2.3.9	etāvān vāvaiṣa yāvān māsaḥ
2.3.10	etaṃ vāvaiṣa āptvā punaḥ palyayate
2.3.11	sa pañcadaśa rātrīr ūrdhva eti pañcadaśārvāṅ
2.3.12	yā āpūryate tā ūrdhva ety atha yā apochaṃs tā arvāṅ
2.3.13	sa āpūryamāṇo 'muṃ lokaṃ gacchati
2.3.14	so 'munā lokena saṃspṛśyānnaṃ bhavati
2.3.15	sa yad asya tatra svadyaṃ tat svada ity apochann imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchati
2.3.16	sa imā apa oṣadhīḥ praviśati
2.3.17	sa imā apa oṣadhīḥ praviśyāsv apsv oṣadhīṣv ātmānaṃ nyudyāpūryamāṇo 'muṃ lokaṃ gacchati
2.4.1	sa evam eva punaḥ palyayamānas saṃvatsaram āpnoti
2.4.2	sa yāvaddha vai dvādaśabhis saṃvatsarair avarunddhe tāvad ekenaiva saṃvatsareṇāvarunddhe ya evaṃ vidvān māsimāsi pṛṣṭhāny upaiti
2.4.3	tān etāṃś caturo 'bhiplavān upayanti
2.4.4	teṣāṃ caturviṃśatī rātryaḥ
2.4.5	caturviṃśatyardhamāsas saṃvatsaraḥ
2.4.6	tad eṣām upariṣṭāt saṃvatsarasya māsimāsi saṃvatsara āpto bhavati
2.4.7	pṛṣṭyaṃ pañcamam upayanti
2.4.8	tad eṣāṃ upariṣṭāt saṃvatsarasya māsimāsi pṛṣṭhāny upetāni bhavanti
2.4.9	atha ha smāha mahitthaś śainmiṣir yaṃ vā imam āhur apṛṣṭo 'dhuvakoṣṇīṣaḥ kulasya kulasyodbhidā veṣṭata ity eṣa ha vāva so 'pṛṣṭho 'dhuvakoṣṇīṣo ya eva nirhṛtapṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ
2.4.10	te kiṃ tat pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya stomān eva kurvanta ādriyeran
2.4.11	abhiplavān evaitān pañcopetyopariṣṭād eva pṛṣṭhāny upetyānīti
2.5.1	asau vā ādityo 'trāgra āsīd yatraitac cātvālam
2.5.2	sa idaṃ sarvaṃ prātapat
2.5.3	tasya devāḥ pradāhād abibhayuḥ
2.5.4	te 'bruvan sarvaṃ vā ayam idaṃ pradhakṣyati
2.5.5	etem ūrdhvam udūhāmeti
2.5.6	taṃ ṣaḍbhir māsair ūrdhvam udauhan
2.5.7	tam ekaviṃśe viṣuvaty adhyādadhuḥ
2.5.8	sa eṣa ekaviṃśe viṣuvaty adhyāhitas tapati
2.5.9	tad ye ca ha vā ita ūrdhvā lokā ye cāmuto 'rvāñcas teṣām eṣa etad ubhayeṣāṃ viṣuvati
2.5.10	tad yad ubhayeṣāṃ viṣuvati tasmād viṣuvān saḥ
2.5.11	yathā vai rathanābhāv arās samagrā evaṃ haitasmin sarve lokās samagrāḥ
2.5.12	tān vā etān eke parastād viṣuvata ūrdhvān eva ṣaḍahān upayanti
2.5.13	yathaivaita ā viṣuvata upayanty evam evāpi parāñcaḥ
2.5.14	parāṅ vai svargo lokaḥ
2.5.15	parāñca etaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ rohāma
2.5.16	pratyavarohas sa yad arvāñca upeyāma
2.5.17	athaivam apratyavarūḍham iti vadantas te ye ha te tathopayanti ya evaṃ tasmād ādityād arvāñco lokās tān evāpnuvanti
2.5.18	yady api bahūn saṃvatsarān upayanty atha tān evāpnuvanti
2.5.19	atha ya evaitān parācaś cārvācaś ca ṣaḍahān upayanti ta evaitān ubhayān lokān āpnuvanti parāṅ iyān arvāṅ iti
2.6.1	sa imaṃ lokam antikād abhyatapat
2.6.2	te vāyum avastāt paryauhan
2.6.3	tenainam aśamayan
2.6.4	apo ha vā eṣa etad bibharti
2.6.5	te 'dbhir evainaṃ tad aśamayan
2.6.6	so 'muṃ paraṃ lokaṃ prātapat
2.6.7	te candramasaṃ parastāt paryauhan
2.6.8	tenainam aśamayan
2.6.9	prajāpatir vai candramāḥ
2.6.10	prajāpatinaivainaṃ tad aśamayan
2.6.11	triṣu ha vā ayam idaṃ lokeṣu pavate
2.6.12	triṣu tata ādityas triṣu nakṣatrāṇi tasmāt tāny aṇiṣṭhāṇi parārdhyāni hy ete ha vāva dvādaśa devalokāḥ
2.6.13	atha yathoṣaso vā yad vaivam evānye lokāḥ
2.6.14	sa imaṃ lokam okaṃ prajānann abhyavāvidhyat tantribhiḥ
2.6.15	svarasāmabhir avastād upādadhuḥ
2.6.16	so 'muṃ paraṃ lokaṃ prāpaśyat
2.6.17	tam ud evāvidhyat tantribhiḥ
2.6.18	svarasāmabhiḥ parastād upādadhuḥ
2.6.19	tam etad atrāspṛṇvan
2.6.20	yad aspṛṇvaṃs tat svarāṇāṃ svaratvam
2.6.21	saptadaśā svarasāmāno bhavanti
2.6.22	annaṃ vai saptadaśam
2.6.23	annādya evainaṃ tad adhyādadhuḥ
2.6.24	atho prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ
2.6.25	prajāpatinaivainaṃ tad annādye 'dhyādadhuḥ
2.6.26	sa eṣo hi pūrve 'nnādye 'dhyāhitas tapati
2.6.27	te vā ete svarasāmāna ekapañcāśat satriṃśinīr virājas saṃpadyante pañcaviṃśatir avastāt pañcaviṃśatiḥ parastāt
2.6.28	atha yaikapañcāśī tasyām eṣa etan madhye vyūhyādhyāhitas tapati
2.6.29	tan na śoko na himo nāśanāyati na pipāsati nāsya kā canāvṛttir asti
2.6.30	na ha vā aśanāyati na pipāsati nāsya kā canāvṛttir bhavati ya evaṃ veda
2.7.1	sa yathā sarpiṣaḥ kumbhaṃ vā madhukumbhaṃ vā jālodditāśayaṃ hriyerann evam evaiṣa etābhir virāḍbhiḥ parigṛhītaḥ
2.7.2	prāñ ca pratyañ ca yata etābhir dhṛtaḥ
2.7.3	tān vā etān eke svarasāmno 'gniṣṭomān eva kurvanti stotrabṛhatīm idaṃ kurma iti vadantaḥ
2.7.4	ye vai trayo 'gniṣṭomāṣ ṣaṭtriṃśat tāni stotrāṇi
2.7.5	dvādaśaikasya dvādaśaikasya dvādaśaikasya tat ṣaṭtriṃśat
2.7.6	ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā vai bṛhatī
2.7.7	bṛhatī svargo lokaḥ
2.7.8	saitaṃ spṛśati
2.7.9	te bṛhatyaitaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ gacchāmeti
2.7.10	te ha te gacchanty eva yathā tv ṛte 'nnād gacched evam
2.7.11	atha yad ukthyā bhavanti
2.7.12	paśavo vā ukthāni
2.7.13	annaṃ paśavaḥ
2.7.14	sa yathānnena saha śreyāṃsaṃ pratinandantam upeyād evam evainam etad ukthyai svarasāmabhir upayanti
2.7.15	atho haitau devatattvāv eva yad viśvajidabhijitau
2.7.16	annam etad yat svarasāmānaḥ
2.7.17	sa yathā sūnāyām annam ādhāya śreyasa upahared evam evāsmā etad viśvajidabhijidbhyām etad annam upaharati
2.7.18	atho haiṣā śāntir eva kriyate
2.7.19	agniṣṭomasāma syād āgnimārutaṃ śastraṃ viṣuvān
2.7.20	ka etāṃs trīn agnīn abhyupetya śobhayataḥ pradagdho haiva śayīta
2.7.21	tad yad ukthāny antareṇa bhavanti
2.7.22	paśavo vā ukthāni
2.7.23	annaṃ paśavaḥ
2.7.24	annenaitam aśamayan
2.7.25	nārmedhenaivainaṃ tac chamayitvāntata upayanti
2.8.1	tā u vā etau viśvajidabhijitau
2.8.2	aṣṭāv anyas satriṃśinīr virājas saṃpadyante 'ṣṭāv anyaḥ
2.8.3	ayaṃ vai loko 'bhijid asau viśvajit
2.8.4	paśava svarasāmānaḥ
2.8.5	tad yad abhijitā stutvā svarasāmabhi stuvate 'sminn evaital loke paśūn pratiṣṭhāpayanti
2.8.6	atha yat svarasāmabhi stutvā viśvajitā stuvate tasmād amutaḥpradānāt paśavo jīvanti
2.8.7	tasya vā etasya vaiṣuvatasyāhno daśa ca pañcaviṃśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti dve ca stotriye
2.8.8	tato yāni daśa pañcaviṃśāni stotrāṇi mahāvrataṃ tat
2.8.9	tair asya vaiṣuvate 'hani mahāvratam upetaṃ bhavati
2.8.10	atha ye dve stotriye āditya eva sa etasminn ahan pratiṣṭhitaḥ
2.8.11	atha ha sma vā etat purā trir mahāvratam upayanty ārambhaṇīye 'han vaiṣuvate mahāvratīye
2.8.12	tasya vā etasyārambhaṇīyasyāhnaś caturdaśa ca pañcaviṃśāni stotrāṇi bhavanti daśa ca stotriyāḥ
2.8.13	tato yāni caturdaśa pañcaviṃśāni stotrāṇi mahāvrataṃ tat
2.8.14	tair asyārambhaṇīye 'hani mahāvratam upetaṃ bhavati
2.8.15	atha yā daśa stotriyā daśākṣarā virāṭ
2.8.16	annaṃ virāṭ
2.8.17	teno hāvasena yanty ā vaiṣuvatād ahnaḥ
2.8.18	atha ye dve stotriye viṣuvato 'tiricyete tad u hānnapānam
2.8.19	dvayam u ha vā annasya rūpaṃ yac caivāśnāti yac ca pibati
2.8.20	sa yathāśnaṃś ca pibaṃś ceyād evam evaitad etābhyāṃ yanty ā mahāvratīyād ahnaḥ
2.8.21	ta etaṃ svargaṃ lokam āgacchanti
2.8.22	etan mahāvratīyam ahaḥ
2.8.23	eṣa vāva svargo loko yan mahāvratīyam ahaḥ
2.8.24	sa ya etad evaṃ veda trirupetam asya mahāvrataṃ bhavati gacchati svargaṃ lokam
2.9.1	tad āhus tam īṃ hinvanty agruva ity evaitasyāhnaḥ pratipat kāryeti
2.9.2	tam arkebhis taṃ sāmabhir iti śīrṣṇas tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham ity ātmanaḥ
2.9.3	tat tad itīva vā etenāhnā caranti
2.9.4	tato ha vai prajāpatiḥ
2.9.5	tato ha vā eṣa sarvāsāṃ devatānām
2.9.6	tat pitaitad ahaḥ prajetarāṇi
2.9.7	sa yathā putraḥ pitaram āgatya tata tateti hvayet tādṛk tat
2.9.8	so vā ubhayarūpā bhavati
2.9.9	tam iti vai puṃso rūpam agruva iti striyai
2.9.10	ubhayam u ha vā etad bhūtvā prajāpatiḥ prajajñe

2.9.13	mano vai prajāpatiḥ
2.9.14	mano vai vāco 'gram
2.9.15	tad enaṃ tat svenaiva rūpeṇārabhante

2.9.17	pavasveti vai puṃso rūpaṃ vāca iti striyai
2.9.18	tad etan mithunaṃ prajananaṃ kriyate
2.9.19	mithunena jāyate ya evaṃ veda
2.9.20	tasmād eṣaiva pratipat kāryā

2.10.1	sanā ca soma jeṣi ceti daśarcaṃ bhavati
2.10.2	ṛṣayo vā etad ṛddhikāmā upotthānaṃ priyaṃ vāco 'paśyan
2.10.3	athā no vasyasas kṛdhy athā no vasyasas kṛdhīti tenāstuvata

2.10.5	sarve haivardhnuvanti ya evaṃ vidvāṃsa etena daśarcena stuvate

2.10.7	tad āhuḥ kṛtrimevaiṣā virāḍ upākāryeva
2.10.8	saṃpadaṃ lobhayati

2.10.10	etad dha vā idaṃ sarvam akṣaram
2.10.11	yathā sūcyā palāśāni saṃtṛṇṇāni syur evam etenākṣareṇeme lokās saṃtṛṇṇāḥ

2.10.14	yaḥ paryāso kāmas sa na upāpto 'sad iti

2.10.17	prājāpatyaṃ mahāvrataṃ tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.11.1	atha ha smāhāryakacit sarvam evaitad ahaś caturviṃśaṃ kāryam
2.11.2	ekam evaitat stotraṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ kuryuḥ
2.11.3	abhyāroho vā eṣa ekasya stotrasya yat sarvaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ kurvanti
2.11.4	tathaitat stotram anabhyārūḍhaṃ bhavatīti

2.11.6	tasya nv eva prāyaścittiṃ vindanti vā na vātha kiṃ yad ekādaśabhyaś chidyate
2.11.7	ko tasya prāyaścittiḥ

2.12.1	suṣamiddho na ā vahety āprīr ājyaṃ bhavati

2.12.3	prajāpatim eva tenāprīṇanti
2.12.4	tā naś śaktaṃ pārthivasyeti maitrāvaruṇam
2.12.5	tadvad aha bhavati
2.12.6	aniruktam u vai prājāpatyam
2.12.7	prājāpatye 'haṃs tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.12.8	mahaṃ indro ya ojasety aindraṃ bhavati
2.12.9	niṣkasya haitan maṇe rūpam
2.12.10	tasmān niṣkaṃ maṇiṃ srajaṃ purastād bibhrati
2.12.11	tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham iti rathasya haitad rūpam
2.12.12	tasmāt tam abhihāyaiva tiṣṭhanti
2.12.13	maha stavāno adriva iti hastino haitad rūpam
2.12.14	tasmāt taṃ pārśvata ivādhirohanti
2.12.15	tāni vā etāni mahadrūpāṇi saṃpadyante
2.12.16	mahadrūpo vai prajāpatiḥ
2.12.17	prājāpatyaṃ mahāvrataṃ tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.12.18	upa hainam etāni rūpāṇy akrītāni tiṣṭhante ya evaṃ veda
2.12.19	iyaṃ vām asya manmana ity aindrāgnaṃ bhavati
2.12.20	indrāgnī pūrvyastutir abhrād vṛṣṭir ivājanīti
2.12.21	ajanīti vā āhur jātam
2.12.22	jāyata u etenāhnā
2.12.23	yathā ha vā idam āṇḍān nirbhidyerann evam evaitasmād ahno nirbhidyante
2.12.24	śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havam indrāgnī vanataṃ giraḥ

2.26.15	sa vaśam eva diva ādatta kṣatraṃ nakṣatrāṇām ātmānam antarikṣasya rūpaṃ vāyor ājñāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cakṣaḥ paśūnām ūrjam apāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ carathaṃ vanaspatīnāṃ śiśnaṃ vayasām arciṣam agner hṛdayaṃ pṛthivyai gandhaṃ hiraṇyasya stanayitnuṃ vācas saṅgamaṃ pitṝṇāṃ bhāṃ candramasaḥ
2.26.16	tad yad eteṣāṃ bhūtānām ādatta tad ādityasyādityatvam

2.27.1	na ha brūyāt sattram āsiṣya iti

2.28.1	yadi ca sa ha sattram āste yadi ca nātha hāsyāsitam eva sattraṃ bhavati
2.28.2	ya u evaṃ vidvāñ chramam upaparaity ete evāsya devate bhāgās sattram āsāte so 'nārtas saṃvatsarasyodṛcaṃ gacchati
2.28.3	asāv eva saṃvatsaro yo 'sau tapati

2.29.1	tad āhuḥ kiṃ saṃvat kiṃ saraṃ kim ayanam iti

2.31.1	ayam eva spṛṣṭyo yo 'yaṃ pavate

2.32.1	tad āhur yad ete pṛṣṭhyasya viṣamā stomās trivṛt pañcadaśas saptadaśa ekaviṃśas triṇavas trayastriṃśa iti katham etat samāt samam upetaṃ bhavatīti
2.32.2	sa brūyād brahma vai trivṛt
2.32.3	kṣatraṃ pañcadaśaḥ
2.32.4	brahma vai kṣatrāj jyāyaḥ

2.32.6	viṭ saptadaśaḥ

2.32.10	vaiśyo vai śūdrāj jyāyān

2.33.1	tad āhur yad idaṃ prāyaṇīyam ahas trivṛd ācakṣate prāyaṇīyam ity adaś caturviṃśaṃ katham etat trivṛtā prayataṃ bhavatīti
2.33.2	sa brūyād yad evaite catvāriṃśat trivṛtas saṃpadyante tena trivṛtā prayataṃ bhavatīti
2.33.3	atho yac caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatrī teno eveti

2.34.1	tad āhur yat ṣaṭkṛtvaḥ purastād viṣuvataḥ pṛṣṭhyāny upayanti viṣvajiti saptamam upariṣṭāt kathaṃ tat sabhāram iti
2.34.2	sa brūyād yad vā arvācīnaṃ viṣuvatas tad ayaṃ loko yad ūrdhvaṃ viṣuvatas tad asau lokaḥ
2.34.3	āsanna iva vā ayaṃ lokaḥ

2.35.1	tad dhaitad eke svarasāmnāṃ svarāṇy eva pṛṣṭhāni kurvanti

2.50.40	yady u vā atirātre ṣoḍaśinam upayanti mohayanty amūṃ virājas saṃpadam

2.51.1	dvayā ha vai pūrva ṛtava āsuḥ prāṇartavo devartavaḥ

2.51.4	vāg grīṣmaḥ
2.51.5	cakṣur varṣāḥ
2.51.6	ārdram iva vai cakṣur ārdrā iva varṣāḥ
2.51.7	śrotraṃ śarat

2.51.14	ādityaś śarat
2.51.15	candramā hemantaḥ
2.51.16	yā amūr divyā āpas sa śiśiraḥ

2.51.18	atha yā vāg grīṣma āsa yo 'gnir grīṣmas so 'yam etarhi grīṣmaḥ

2.51.22	atha yā imāḥ puruṣa āpaś śiśira āsur yā amūr divyā āpas sa śiśiras so 'yam etarhi śiśiraḥ
2.52.1	ta ete ṣaḍ ṛtavaṣ ṣaḍ diśaḥ

2.53.1	keśī ha dārbhyo darbhaparṇayor didīkṣe
2.53.2	atha ha sutvā yājñaseno haṃso hiraṇmayo bhūtvā yūpa upaviveśa
2.53.3	taṃ ha keśī3n iti nāmnābhyuvāda
2.53.4	sa ha cukrodha sthaviro 'smi pañcālānāṃ rājā
2.53.5	sa u vai dīkṣito 'smi
2.53.6	ko nu mā3ṃ heyannāmnaivābhivaditum arhatīti

2.54.1	atha hetara uvāca
2.54.2	brahmaṇe dadad brūyād brahman manas te dadāni tad anena niṣkrīṇāni brahmann idaṃ dadānīti yad dāsyan syāt
2.54.3	sa yan mano dadāti candramā vai manaś candramasam evāsmai tad dadāti
2.54.4	tad yāvac candramā na kṣīyate tāvad asya tad dattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.5	hotre dadad brūyāt dhotar vācaṃ te dadāni tām anena niṣkrīṇāni hotar idam dadānīti yad dāsyan syāt
2.54.6	sa yad vācaṃ dadāty agnir vai vāg agnim evāsmai tad dadāti
2.54.7	tad yāvad agnir na kṣīyate tāvad asya tad dattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.8	adhvaryave dadad brūyād adhvaryo prāṇaṃ te dadāni tam anena niṣkrīṇāny adhvaryo idaṃ dadānīti yad dāsyan syāt
2.54.9	sa yat prāṇaṃ dadāti vāyur vai prāṇo vāyum evāsmai tad dadāti
2.54.10	tad yāvad vāyur na kṣīyate tāvad asya tad dattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.11	udgātre dadad brūyād udgātaś cakṣus te dadāni tad anena niṣkrīṇāny udgātar idaṃ dadānīti yad dāsyan syāt
2.54.12	sa yac cakṣur dadāty ādityo vai cakṣur ādityam evāsmai tad dadāti
2.54.13	tad yāvad ādityo na kṣīyate tāvad asya tad sattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.14	sadasyāya dadad brūyāt sasyātmānaṃ te dadāni tam anena niṣkrīṇāni sadasyedaṃ dadānīti yad dāsya syāt
2.54.15	sa yad ātmānaṃ dadāty ākāśo vā ātmākāśam evāsmai tad dadāti
2.54.16	tad yāvad ākāśo na kṣīyate tāvad asya tad dattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.17	hotrakebhyo dadad brūyād dhotrakā śrotraṃ vo dadāni tad anena niṣkrīṇāni hotrakā idaṃ dadānīti yad dāsyan syāt
2.54.18	sa yac chrotraṃ dadāti diśo vai śrotraṃ diśa evaibhyas tad dadāti
2.54.19	tad yāvad diśo na kṣīyante tāvad asya tad dattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.20	prasarpakebhyo dadad brūyāt prasarpakā lomāni vo dadāni tāny anena niṣkrīṇāni prasarpakā idaṃ dadānīti yad dāsyan syāt
2.54.21	sa yal lomāni dadāty oṣadhivanaspatayo vai lomāny oṣadhivanaspatīn evaibhyas tad dadāti
2.54.22	tad yāvad oṣadhivanaspatayo na kṣīyante tāvad asya tad dattaṃ na kṣīyate
2.54.23	saiṣeṣṭāpūrtasyākṣitiḥ
2.54.24	sa ya evam etām iṣṭāpūrtasyākṣitiṃ veda na hāsyeṣṭāpūrtaṃ kṣīyate
2.54.25	tad u vā āhur vāg vāva dīkṣito vāg dīkṣā vāg idaṃ sarvaṃ kṣiyati
2.54.26	vāci vāvedaṃ sarvaṃ kṣitam iti vāva tau tat saṃprocāte
2.54.27	tad u hovāca śāṭyāyanī rathantareṇa dīkṣe vāmadevyena dīkṣe bṛhatā dīkṣa ity eva dīkṣeta
2.54.28	atha vimuñceta bṛhatā vimuñce vāmadevyena vimuñce rathantareṇa vimuñca iti
2.54.29	saiṣā dīkṣāyai yuktiś ca vimuktiś ca
2.54.30	sa ya evam etāṃ dīkṣāyai yuktiṃ ca vimuktiṃ ca veda vasīyān eva bhavati

2.55.2	atha ha dantālo dhaumyas trayaṃ vedam āprapadaṃ vidāṃ cakāra
2.55.3	tasmād dha sāmavedam anūcya vyājahārasaṃvatsarāya dīkṣiṣya iti

2.60.1	ekaviṃśaṃ ca vā pañca prāṇaṃ cāgnīñ cādityaṃ ca
2.60.2	atha ye dve akṣare te bṛhadrathantare te ahorātre
2.60.3	so 'rdhamāsas sa māsas sa ṛtus sa saṃvatsaraḥ
2.60.4	tad āhur yat prāṇāś chandāṃsi chandāṃsi stomā ity āhuḥ kathaṃ yajamānaḥ prāṇaiś chandāṃsy apyeti
2.60.5	chandobhi stomāṇ stomair bṛhadrathantare bṛhadrathantarābhyām ahorātre ahorātrābhyām ardhamāsam ardhamāsena māsaṃ māsenartum ṛtunā saṃvatsaram
2.60.6	kutas saṃvatsaro jāyate kva pratiṣṭhita iti
2.60.7	sa vidyād aham eva saṃvatsaro 'smi mayi pratiṣṭhita iti
2.60.8	evaṃvido ha vāva saṃvatsaro jāyata evaṃvidi pratiṣṭhitaḥ
2.60.9	atho āhur āditya eva saṃvatsaraḥ
2.60.10	etaṃ hi sarvā śrīs sarvaṃ yaśas sarve devās sametās tasmād āditya eva saṃvatsara iti
2.60.11	tasya yad bhāti tat saṃvad yan madhye kṛṣṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tat sara ity adhidevatam
2.60.12	athādhyātmam
2.60.13	ayam eva saṃvatsaro yo 'yaṃ cakṣuṣi puruṣaḥ
2.60.14	tasya yac chuklaṃ tat saṃvad yan madhye kṛṣṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tat saraḥ
2.60.15	atho āhur āditya eva saṃvac candramās saraḥ

2.60.17	taṃ paurṇamāsyām āpnotīti

2.61.1	tāni vā etāni rauhiṇakāni nāma

2.62.1	eṣa vāva dīkṣito ya eṣa tapati

2.62.4	ahorātre eva kṛṣṇājinasya rūpam

2.65.1	tam adhvaryur abhyajya prapādyaudgrahaṇāni juhoti

2.66.1	taṃ sakāmam abhyaśnuvīta
2.66.2	atha haivaṃvid dīkṣamāna eva sarvān kāmān upāpnoti

2.87.1	athaiṣa ṛṣabhaḥ

2.90.1	te devā etāv udbhidvalabhidāv apaśyan

2.101.1	asya vā etasya gāyatrīm eva prātassavanaṃ saṃpadyate triṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jagatīṃ tṛtīyasavanam
2.101.2	tad yad gāyatrīṃ prātassavanaṃ saṃpadyate 'ṣṭākṣarā gāyatry aṣṭau vasavo gāyatryaiva tac chandasā prajāpatiś cendraś ca vasuṣu deveṣu prātassavane 'dhy apicitim agacchatām
2.101.3	atha yat triṣṭubhaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ saṃpadyata ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub ekādaśa rudrās triṣṭubhaiva tac chandasā prajāpatiś cendraś ca rudreṣu deveṣu mādhyandine savane 'dhy apacitim agacchatām
2.101.4	atha yaj jagatīṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ saṃpadyate dvādaśākṣarā jagatī dvādaśādityā jagatyaiva tac chandasā prajāpatiś cendraś cādityeṣu deveṣu tṛtīyasavane 'dhy apacitim agacchatām

2.133.4	ṣaḍ eva trivṛnti stotrāṇi syuḥ ṣaṭ pañcadaśānīti
2.133.5	yāny evārvāñci mādhyaṃdināt tāny eva trivṛnti syur yāny ūrdhvaṃ tāni pañcadaśānīti
2.133.6	pañcadaśas tv eva mādhyaṃdinaḥ syāt trivṛd dhotuḥ pṛṣṭham
2.133.7	tasmin pañcadaśe mādhyamdine rathantaram avakalpayanti
2.133.8	brahma vai rathantaraṃ kṣatraṃ pañcadaśaḥ
2.133.9	brahmaiva tat kṣatre pratiṣṭhāpayanti
2.133.10	atha yat trivṛd dhotuḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati brahma vai trivṛt kṣatraṃ bṛhat kṣatram eva tad brahman pratiṣṭhāpayanti
2.133.11	tāv etāv evam anyo 'nyasmin pratiṣṭhāya śreṣṭhatām agacchatām
2.133.12	tayor haitayor ajayyam eva
2.133.13	ajayyāṃ ha vai kīrtim ajayyāṃ śriyam ajayyaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda
2.133.14	yad v evaite trivṛtpañcadaśe stotre vyatiṣakte bhavato vyatiṣaktād vai mithunāt prajāḥ paśavaḥ prajāyante prajātyā eva
2.133.15	atho prāṇā vai stomā vyatiṣaktā vā ime prāṇā anirmārgāya
2.133.16	tasmāt trivṛtpañcadaśāny evaitāni stotrāṇi vyatiṣaktāni syur iti

2.134.1	athaiṣo 'gniṣṭut

2.134.7	atho hāsyāgnir eva sakhitama ivāsa deveṣu

2.134.11	sa ha taṃ deveṣu na viveda yenainaṃ sahāyājayiṣyat

2.172.15	eṣa u ha vai śrīḥ
2.172.16	etām eva tac chriyam antato 'bhyārohati

2.173.1	athaiṣa gautamasya catuṣṭomaḥ

2.173.3	sa etaṃ yajñam apaśyat
2.173.4	tam āharat
2.173.5	tenāyajata

2.173.22	tān evaitena kalāśo 'varunddhe

2.174.1	athaiṣo 'pūrvaḥ

2.174.5	tam āharat
2.174.6	tenāyajata

2.174.15	no vai manaso 'nyat kiṃ cana pūrvam asti
2.174.16	tasmād u evāpūrvaḥ

2.175.1	athaiṣa pañcaśāradīyaḥ
2.175.2	maruto vā akāmayantaujiṣṭhā baliṣṭhā bhūyiṣṭhā vīryavattamā devānāṃ syāma jayema svargaṃ lokam iti
2.175.3	ta etaṃ yajñam apaśyan

2.175.5	tenāyajanta

2.176.1	tasya paṇca śaradaḥ pañcokṣāṇaḥ prokṣitāś caranti

2.176.10	marudbhya ujjeṣibhya iti marudbhya svāpibhya iti marudbhya svatavadbhya iti marudbhya eva marudbhya iti marudbhyo 'bhiṣṭibhya iti

2.177.4	tān etān paśūn ālabheta
2.177.5	dīkṣiṣyamāṇa ekam upavasatha ekaṃ prasuta ekam anūbandhyāyām ekam udavasānīyāyām ekam evam etān paśūn ālabheta
2.177.6	atha haika āhuḥ pañcarātra evaiṣa syāt

2.181.1	athaitāny āprīr ājyāni bhavanti
2.181.2	prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata
