2.184.1	prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata
2.184.2	sa etenaiva viśvajitedam asṛjata viśvam
2.184.3	tad yad etā nānārūpāḥ pratipado bhavanti tasmād u hedaṃ viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ nānārūpam
2.184.4	pṛṣṭhānāṃ vāvaiṣa yogaḥ
2.184.5	upavatyaiva rathantaraṃ yujyate
2.184.6	sarasvatā vairājas sārasvatyā mahānāmnayo brāhmaṇaspatyayā vairūpaṃ sāvitryā revataya āgnipāvamānyā bṛhat
2.184.7	tad yad etā nānārūpāḥ
2.184.8	pratipado bhavanti pṛṣṭhāny evaitat prātassavane yuktāni
2.184.9	tāni mādhyaṃdine savane 'bhyārohanti
2.184.10	tad āhur vīva vā ete prāṇair ṛdhyante ye pavasvinībhiḥ pratipadyanta iti
2.184.11	tad yad eṣā vāyavyā pratipad bhavati prāṇo vai vāyuḥ prāṇair eva tat samṛdhyante
2.185.1	athaite sarasvataś ca sarasvatyāś ca
2.185.2	etad vai daivyaṃ mithunaṃ prajananaṃ yat sarasvāṃś ca sarasvatī ca
2.185.3	daivyena mithunena prajāyā iti
2.185.4	tad āhuḥ puṃsaḥ pūrvā kāryā striyā uttarā
2.185.5	tathā yajamānasyānapagalbhyā prajājāyata iti
2.185.6	tad u vā āhur vāyur vai retodhāḥ
2.185.7	prajananaṃ sarasvatī
2.185.8	tau sarasvantaṃ mithunāt prajanayataḥ
2.185.9	atho vāśitā vai pūrvā dhāvaty anvam ṛṣabhaḥ sarasvatyā eva pūrvā kāryeti
2.185.10	etad u haitat sarasvatas tv eva pūrvā kāryā
2.185.11	athaiṣā brāhmaṇaspatyā pratipad bhavati
2.185.12	prajāpatir yā ṛte brahmaṇaḥ prajā asṛjata tā asya sṛṣṭā parābhavan
2.185.13	sa etāṃ brāhmaṇaspatyāṃ pratipadam apaśyat
2.185.14	tayā brahmaṇvatīḥ prajā asṛjata
2.185.15	tā asya sṛṣṭā na parābhavan
2.185.16	tad yad eṣā brāhmaṇaspatyā pratipad bhavati brahmaṇvatīr evaitayā prajās sṛjate tā asya sṛṣṭā na parābhavanti
2.186.1	atha sāvitrīprasavāḥ
2.186.2	yad iha viṣurūpam imā nānārūpāḥ pratipada upāgāma tan nas savitṛprasūtam asad iti
2.186.3	athāgnipāvamānyaḥ
2.186.4	patham iva vā ete yanti ye pāvamānībhiḥ pratipadyanta iti
2.186.5	agnir vai pathikṛd devatānām
2.186.6	yena vai kena cāgninaiti panthānam eva kurvann eti
2.186.7	tad yad eṣāgnipāvamānī pratipad bhavaty agninaiva tat pathikṛtā panthānaṃ paryavayanti
2.186.8	pavamānasya te kava iti paryāso bhavati
2.186.9	etat punaḥ panthānaṃ paryavayanti
2.186.10	yo vai pṛṣṭhānāṃ dhuryaṃ veda dhurya svānāṃ bhavati
2.186.11	vairājaṃ vāva pṛṣṭhānāṃ dhuryam
2.186.12	dhurya svānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
2.187.1	tad āhuḥ pāpavasyasam iva vā etat kriyate yad bṛhadrathantare abhito bhavato madhye pṛṣṭhāni
2.187.2	yathā vai pāpīyāṃsam uparyāsīnaṃ śreyān adhastād upāsīta tādṛk tad yad ete bṛhadrathantare abhito bhavato madhye pṛṣṭhānīti
2.187.3	bṛhadrathantare eva madhye syātām abhitaḥ pṛṣṭhāni pāpavasyasasya vyāvṛttyai
2.187.4	atho yathā śreyāṃsam uparyāsīnaṃ pāpīyān adhastād upāsīta tādṛk tad yad bṛhadrathantare madhye bhavato 'bhitaḥ pṛṣṭhānīti
2.187.5	asarvapṛṣṭho ha tu tathā syāt
2.187.6	sarveṣāṃ vai pṛṣṭhānāṃ vairājam eva pūrvaṃ yogam ānaśe
2.187.7	atho yady api caramaṃ yantaṃ pṛccheyur upa pṛṣṭhāny agūrṇā iti nety eva brūyāt
2.187.8	bṛhadrathantare evābhita syātāṃ madhye pṛṣṭhāni sarvapṛṣṭhatāyai
2.187.9	idaṃ vai rathantaram ado bṛhat
2.187.10	paśavaḥ pṛṣṭhāni
2.187.11	ābhyām evaital lokābhyām ubhayataḥ paśūn parigṛhṇīte 'parāvāpāya
2.187.12	nāsya vittaṃ paropyate ya evaṃ veda
2.188.1	atho yathā pitā mātaivaṃ bṛhadrathantare yathā putrā evaṃ pṛṣṭhāni
2.188.2	yad vai putro 'tipādayati pitā vai tasya śamayitā pitā niṣeddhā
2.188.3	tad yad bṛhadrathantare abhito bhavataś śāntyā eva niṣiddhyai
2.188.4	atho yathā pitarau putrān abhitaḥ pariśayīyātāṃ tādṛk tad yad bṛhadrathantare abhito bhavato madhye pṛṣṭhāni
2.188.5	yathā ha vā idam ṛṣabhā vā parasvanto vā samutkruddhās tiṣṭheyur evam etad yad etāni madhyataḥ pṛṣṭhāni bhavanti tad yac chyaitanaudhase abhito bhavataḥ
2.188.6	brahma vai naudhasam
2.188.7	brahmaṇaivaināṃs tat purastāc chamayitvā śyaitenopariṣṭāv chyetīkurvanti
2.188.8	tasmāt purastād eva naudhasaṃ syād upariṣṭāc chyaitam
2.188.9	tad āhur yat samānanidhanāni pṛṣṭhāni kenājāmi kriyanta iti
2.188.10	vairājaṃ ca mahānāmnayaś ca vairūpaṃ ca revatyaś caitenākhyānenājāmīti
2.188.11	atho yad evaitāni madhyenidhanāni bhavanti teno eveti
2.188.12	tasmiṃs trayas saptadaśā bhavanti
2.188.13	tā ekapañcāśat stotryāḥ
2.188.14	tad goḥ prātassavanam
2.188.15	ekānnanavatiśataṃ rātres sā jyotiṣṭomasya rātriḥ
2.188.16	tad etan mithunaṃ prajananaṃ kriyate
2.188.17	pra mithunena jāyate ya evaṃ veda
2.188.18	tā ubhayī stotryās saṃpadyante dve catvāriṃśacchate
2.188.19	sā virāṭ
2.188.20	annaṃ virāṭ
2.188.21	virājy eva tad annādye yajñasyāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhati
2.189.1	devāsurā aspardhanta
2.189.2	atha ha tarhi prajāpatāv evaitāni śilpāny āsur netareṣu deveṣu
2.189.3	sa indraḥ prajāpatim upādhāvaj jayāmāsurān iti
2.189.4	tasmā eva tac chilpaṃ prāyacchat
2.189.5	tad asmin pratyamuñchat
2.189.6	yathā niṣkaṃ maṇiṃ srajaṃ pratimuñced evaṃ tanvodayacchat
2.189.7	tasmād etac chilpaṃ niramimītaitāni pṛṣṭhāni
2.189.8	atha yad itarat teja āsīd yenaiṣa etat tapati
2.189.9	te 'surā idaṃ rūpaṃ jñātvā so naḥ pitā hanti so naḥ pitā hantīty eva vadantaḥ parājayanta
2.189.10	tato vai devā abhavan parāsurāḥ
2.189.11	bhavaty ātmanā parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda
2.190.1	tad āhur nātiṣṭutyam
2.190.2	yathā vai niṣkaṃ maṇiṃ srajaṃ pratimucya tat punar unmuñcet tādṛk tad yo 'gniṣṭome 'tiṣṭautīti
2.190.3	anyatarad dha tvāva sa viśvayor jayati
2.190.4	ahorātre vai sarvaṃ viśvam
2.190.5	atho yathā mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ rūḍhvā pratyavaroḍhuṃ na vindet tādṛk tad yad agniṣṭomo bhavati
2.190.6	tad yat pratyavarohīṇi stotrāṇi bhavanty eṣā vai kṛtsnā pratiṣṭhā yad atirātras tenaivāsyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati
2.190.7	tad āhuḥ preva vā ete 'smāl lokāc cyavante ye 'tirātram upayantīti
2.190.8	tad yad gāyatrīṣu bṛhad bhavatīyaṃ vai gāyatry asyām evaitat pratitiṣṭhati
2.191.1	atho yathā rathākṣe rathacakraṃ pratimuñced evam evaitāni sarvāṇi śilpāny āhṛtya brahman pratiṣṭhāpayanti ye gāyatrīṣu bṛhad agniṣṭomasāma kurvanti
2.191.2	tasmād gāyatrīṣv eva bṛhad agniṣṭomasāma kāryam iti
2.191.3	tad āhus sahasram eva dadyāt tad eva viśvam iti

2.191.5	tad eva viśvam iti

2.192.1	athaiṣa vājapeyaḥ
2.192.2	vājapeyenānnādyakāmo yajeta
2.192.3	annapeyo ha vā eṣa yad vājapeyaḥ

2.192.5	yadā vai gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo 'nnasya suhito bhavaty atha sa vājī bhavati

2.192.19	kṣatraṃ bṛhat
2.192.20	kṣatriyasyo ayaṃ lokaḥ
2.192.21	asya no lokavatas sāmnaḥ paśavo lokam anūpatiṣṭhāntā iti
2.192.22	triṣṭupsu stuvanti bṛhat sāma
2.192.23	kṣatraṃ vai triṣṭup
2.192.24	kṣatreṇābhiśicyamāno 'bhiṣicyātā iti

2.193.1	tad āhus tisṛṣv evāstutāsu dhāveyuḥ

2.196.11	tad enaṃ tat suṣvāṇam eva pavamānamukhe svārājyena lokena samardhayanti
2.196.12	anuṣṭup pratipad bhavati
2.196.13	vāg vā anuṣṭup

2.196.15	kṣatreṇābhiṣicyamāno 'bhiṣicyātā iti
2.196.16	athaitāḥ pañca saṃbhāryā nānādevatyā bhavanti
2.196.17	pañcānāṃ ha vai puruṣāṇāṃ rājyāyābhiṣicyamāno 'bhiṣicyate rājñe rājanyāya sūtāya grāmaṇye śūdrāya dāsāya
2.196.18	ud atas trivṛtaṃ stomaṃ haranty ud āgneyīṃ saṃbhāryābhyaḥ

2.196.20	yad atra trivṛtaṃ stomaṃ kuryur āgneyīṃ saṃbhāryāsv abrahmajya eva rājanyo brāhmaṇāñ jinīyād abhrūṇāhatyai mārayāt
2.197.1	tad āhur naitad rājanyo vedayeta
2.197.2	yathā vai śreṣṭhī kāmayate tathā karoti
2.197.3	yas sa brūyāt trivṛtam eva stomaṃ kurutāgneyīṃ saṃbhāryāsv ity abrahmajya eva rājanyo brāhmaṇāñ jinīyād abhrūṇāhatyai mārayāt
2.197.4	tad u vā āhur ya evaitad rājanyo vedayeta tam evābrahmajyo jinīyāt
2.197.5	tam abhrūṇahatyai mārayād iti
2.197.6	tad āhur yanti vā ete prāṇebhyo ye trivṛta stomād yantīti
2.197.7	trivṛtāgniṣṭomena purastād yajeta
2.197.8	prāṇo vai trivṛtaḥ
2.197.9	tenaiva prāṇebhyo na yanti
2.197.10	brahma purastād u kṣatraṃ sūyate
2.197.11	atho āhur apicitir iti yajñakratuḥ
2.197.12	tenaiva yajeteti

2.197.14	apacitim u suṣvāṇo 'śnute
2.197.15	tad u vā āhur yad evaiṣā vāyavyā pratipad bhavati prāṇo vai vāyuḥ prāṇair eva tat samṛdhyante
2.197.16	vāyo śukro ayāmi ta iti śukravatī bhavati
2.197.17	jyotir iva ha vā eṣo 'nyeṣu manuṣyeṣv atibhāti yas sūyate 'yaṃ suṣvāṇo jyotir ivāsad iti
2.197.18	madhvo agraṃ diviṣṭiṣv iti tad etan madhavyam evāgryaṃ kurvanti
2.197.19	ā yāhi somapītaya iti saumī

2.197.23	viśo niyutvatīḥ
2.197.24	kṣatrāyaiva tad viśam anuvartmānaṃ kurvanti

2.198.1	athaite sarasvataś ca sarasvatyāś ca
2.198.2	etad vai daivyaṃ mithunaṃ prajananaṃ yat sarasvāṃś ca sarasvatī ca
2.198.3	daivyena mithunena prajāyā iti
2.198.4	tad āhuḥ puṃsaḥ pūrvā kāryā striyā uttarā

2.198.10	etad u haitat sarasvatas tv eva pūrvā kāryā

2.199.1	adha kṣapā pariṣkṛta ity anuṣṭub antyā bhavati

2.199.3	anuṣṭup pratipad bhavati anuṣṭub antyā

2.199.9	ubhe hy atra sāmanī kriyete
2.199.10	tad āhur anyatarāṇy eva kāryāṇi yāny eva bārhatāni

2.199.17	kṣatreṇābhiṣicyamāno 'bhiṣicyātā iti
2.200.1	avabhṛtād udeyuṣe dvādaśapuṣkarāṃ srajaṃ pratimuñcati

2.200.3	tā mithunam aicchanta
2.200.4	tā devā upāyan

2.201.1	athaitās saṃsṛpa iṣṭayo bhavanti
2.201.2	varuṇasya ha vai suṣvāṇasya ṣoḍaśatayair āpo bhargaṃ niraghnan
2.201.3	tad imāṃ diśam apatat

2.201.20	daśamyāṃ hy anvavindan
2.201.21	tad anuvidyāgninā paryaindhata

2.201.24	tac chrāyantīyasya śrāyantīyatvam
2.201.25	tasya yajñāyajñīyasyarkṣu bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati
2.201.26	agnir vai yajñāyajñīyasyarcaḥ
2.201.27	agninaivainat tat parīndhate
2.202.1	śrāyantīyaṃ brahmasāma
2.202.2	sam evainat tac chrīṇanti
2.202.3	yajñāyajñīyam anuṣṭupsu prohanti
2.202.4	vāg vai yajñāyajñīyam
2.202.5	vāg anuṣṭup
2.202.6	vācaivainat tat samardhayanti
2.202.7	vāravantīyam agniṣṭomasāma
2.202.8	indriyaṃ vai vīryaṃ vāravantīyam
2.202.9	indriyeṇaivainat tad vīryeṇa samardhayanti
2.202.10	saptadaśastomo bhavati prajāpatir vai saptadaśaḥ
2.202.11	prajāpatir naṣṭasyānuvettā sa yo naṣṭasyānuvettā tenedaṃ bhargam anuvindāmeti
2.202.12	agniṣṭomo yajñas saṃvatsaro vā eṣa yad agniṣṭomas saṃvatsareṇaivaināṃs tat parigṛhyātmasv adadhata
2.202.13	tasminn etā yathārūpaṃ dakṣiṇā nīyante srag udgātū rukmo hotuḥ prākāśāv adhvaryor dvādaśa paṣṭhauhīr brahmaṇe dhenur maitrāvaruṇāyarṣabho brāḥmaṇācchaṃsine vāsasī neṣṭāpotro sthūri yavācitam acchāvākāyānaḍvān agnīdhaḥ
2.202.14	tad yat srag udgātur bhavati sauryo vai srak saurya udgātā tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.203.1	sā paṭariṇī bhavati
2.203.2	paṭarīva hy asāv ādityaḥ
2.203.3	atha yad rukmo hotur bhavati trīṇi vā etāni samyañci saṃdhīyante
2.203.4	rukma āhavanīyo 'sāv ādityaḥ
2.203.5	tad yad etāni samyañci saṃdhīyante samṛddhyā eva
2.203.6	sam asmā ṛdhyate ya evaṃ veda
2.203.7	atha yat prākāśāv adhvaryor bhavato rūpeṇentatāṃ āhvayantīti vā āhuḥ
2.203.8	atho yad eva tau prakāśenaiva caratas tat tatsalakṣama kriyate
2.203.9	atha yad dvādaśa paṣṭhauhīr brahmaṇe bhavanti prajananaṃ vai paṣṭhauhīḥ prajananaṃ brahmā tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.203.10	atha yad dhenur maitrāvaruṇāya bhavati payasyā vai dhenuḥ payasyābhājasau mitrāvaruṇau tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.203.11	atha yad ṛṣabho brāhmaṇācchaṃsine bhavaty aindro vai brāhmaṇācchaṃsy aindra ṛṣabhas tat tatsalakṣma kriyate
2.203.12	atha yad vāsasī neṣṭāpotror bhavato mārute vai vāsasī mārutau neṣṭāpotārau tat tat salakṣma kriyate
2.203.13	atho bhūmā vai maruto bhūmā tantubhir vāsaḥ

2.204.1	avabhṛtād udetya śmaśrūṇy eva vapate na keśān

2.299.9	yad eṣām mriyate saikā
2.299.10	yad daśa gāvaś śataṃ bhavanti saikā
2.299.11	yac chataṃ gāvas sahasraṃ bhavanti saikā
2.299.12	tena haitena purāyu sthūragṛhapatayaḥ
2.299.13	tān ha trikartānāṃ vā salvānāṃ vāvyādhinīḥ paryutthāya jigyuḥ
2.299.14	tad dhaiṣāṃ gṛhapatiṃ jaghnuḥ
2.299.15	taṃ hemaṃ gṛhapatiṃ hatam abhitaḥ kṛpayamāṇā niṣeduḥ
2.299.16	tam u ha dhruvagopaḥ sāṃkāśinenaiva dravantaṃ nirjajñau
2.299.17	sa āhavanīyād evordhva svargaṃ lokam ācakrame
2.299.18	sa hovāca mā kṛpayadhvam
2.299.19	yaṃ vā imaṃ kṛpayadhve 'yaṃ vai sa āhavanīyād evordhva svargaṃ lokam ākraṃsteti
2.299.20	teṣāṃ yāṃs tatra jaghnus te svargaṃ lokam īyuḥ
2.299.21	atha ye pariśiśiṣire ta ima etarhi paṇāyyatarā iva sthūrāṇām

2.300.1	atha yasyaitasya viśvajidabhijitāv atirātrāv abhito bhavato gaur āyur gaur āyur iti catvāra ukthyā madhye paśukāmā haitad upeyuḥ
2.300.2	ayaṃ vai loko 'bhijid asau viśvajit
2.300.3	athaite catvāro madhya ukthyā bhavanti
2.300.4	paśavo vā ukthāni
2.300.5	teṣāṃ sahasraṃ stotriyāḥ
2.300.6	anena caiva tal lokenāmunā cobhayata etān paśūn parigṛhṇate 'va paśūn rundhate
2.300.7	bahupaśavo ha bhavanti
2.300.8	etena ha vai tad enenendrāgnī marutaḥ sahasraṃ jigyatuḥ
2.300.9	agnir abhijid indro viśvajit
2.300.10	athaite catvāro madhya ukthyā bhavanti
2.300.11	paśavo vā ukthāni
2.300.12	teṣāṃ sahasraṃ stotriyā
2.300.13	etad dha vai tad indrāgnī ubhayatas sahasraṃ parigṛhyājahratuḥ
2.300.14	ābhyāṃ ca ha vā enaṃ tal lokābhyām indrāgnibhyāṃ cobhayataḥ paśavaḥ parigṛhītā upatiṣṭhante ya evaṃ veda
2.300.15	teṣām u teṣāṃ parīṇad iti kurukṣetrasya jaghanārdhe saraskaṃ tad dīkṣāyai

2.300.17	etad vai devānāṃ devayajanaṃ yat kurukṣetram

2.301.1	athaite saptarātrāḥ
2.301.2	sapta vai chandāṃsi

2.301.9	tad yaiḥ prāṇaiḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ parigṛhītā upatiṣṭhante tair mā prāṇaiḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ parigṛhītā upatiṣṭhāntā iti
2.301.10	prāṇair vai devā svargaṃ lokam āyan

2.302.1	te 'harbhāja āsan

2.304.1	tad āhus tatsthānaṃ vā etad ahorātryā agniṣṭomo vā etad ahar iti

2.304.3	saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ
2.304.4	prājāpatyaṃ mahāvratam evāgniṣṭomasāmnaḥ pañcaviṃśāni stotrāṇi syuḥ
2.304.5	athaikaviṃśair ukthyai rātrim upāvaroheyur iti

2.304.16	śiro vā etad yajñasya yan mahāvratam

2.308.1	pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho 'tha yat saptamam ahas tasya caturviṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ trayastriṃśāny uttarāṇi stotrāṇi pañcaviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ catustriṃśam agniṣṭomasāma

2.311.4	tam āharat
2.311.5	tenāyajata
2.311.6	tato vai sa tejasvī brahmavarcasy abhavad yaśo deveṣv agacchat
2.311.7	yaśo hy eṣa tad agacchad yad eṣāṃ purodhām āśnuta
2.311.8	tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavati yaśo deveṣu gacchati ya evaṃ veda
2.311.9	atho āhur āyuṣkāma evainena yajeteti
2.311.10	prāṇo vai gāyatrī
2.311.11	gāyatrīm eṣa yajño 'bhi saṃpannaḥ
2.311.12	tasmād u hainenāyuṣkāmo yajeta
2.311.13	atho āhuḥ paśukāma evainena yajeteti
2.311.14	aṣṭākṣarā vai gāyatrī
2.311.15	aṣṭāśaphāḥ paśavaḥ
2.311.16	paśavo gāyatrī
2.311.17	gāyatrīm eṣa yajño 'bhi saṃpannaḥ
2.311.18	tasmād u hainena paśukāmo yajeta
2.311.19	prajāpatir vā akāmayatāsmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ gaccheyam iti
2.311.20	sa etam aṣṭarātraṃ yajñam apaśyat
2.311.21	tam āharat
2.311.22	tenāyajata
2.311.23	tato vai so 'smāl lokād amuṃ lokam āṣṭa
2.311.24	yad asmāl lokād amuṃ lokam āṣṭa tad aṣṭarātrāṇām aṣṭarātratvam
2.311.25	aṣṭe hāsmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ ya evaṃ veda
2.311.26	tad āhuḥ kim anv aṣṭarātra iti
2.311.27	diśa iti brūyāt
2.311.28	diśo ha vā anv aṣṭarātraḥ
2.311.29	catasro diśaś catvāro 'vāntaradeṣāḥ
2.311.30	ūrdhvā diṅ navamī

2.311.32	diśa evaitenardhnoti dikṣu pratiṣṭhāya svargaṃ lokam eti
2.312.1	atha yasyaitasya jyotir agniṣṭomaḥ pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho jyotir agniṣṭomo yaḥ kāmayeta tejasvī brahmavarcasy asmin loke syāṃ gaccheyaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ tejasvī brahmavarcasy amuṣmin loke syām iti sa etena yajeta
2.312.2	tad yat purastāj jyotir agniṣṭomo bhavati tejo vai brahmavarcasaṃ jyotir agniṣṭomas tenaivāsmin loke tejasvī bramavarcasī bhavati
2.312.3	pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati svargo vai lokaḥ pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaha svargam evaitena lokaṃ gacchati
2.312.4	jyotir agniṣṭoma upariṣṭād bhavati tejo vai brahmavarcasaṃ jyotir agniṣṭomas tenaivāmuṣmin loke brahmavarcasī bhavati
2.312.5	atha yasyaitasya jyotir atirātraḥ pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho jyotir atirātro yaḥ kāmayeta praty asmin loke tiṣṭheyaṃ gaccheyaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ praty amuṣmin loke tiṣṭheyam iti sa etena yajeta
2.312.6	tad yat purastāj jyotir atirātro bhavaty eṣā vai kṛtsnā pratiṣṭhā yaj jyotir atirātras tenaivāsmin loke pratitiṣṭhati
2.312.7	pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati svargo vai lokaḥ pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaha svargam evaitena lokaṃ gacchati

2.314.1	athaiṣa pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ pañcaviṃśaṃ mahāvrataṃ sarvastomo 'tirātraḥ
2.314.2	annādyakāmo haitena yajeta
2.314.3	tad āhur na purā saṃvatsarān mahāvratam upetyam iti
2.314.4	tad yat pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavaty ṛtavo vai pṛṣṭhāni
2.314.5	saṃvatsara ṛtavaḥ
2.314.6	saṃvatsaraḥ kṛtsnam annādyaṃ pacati saṃvatsarābhijitam eva tad annādyam upayanti
2.314.7	pañcaviṃśaṃ mahāvratam annaṃ vai pañcaviṃśam annādyasyaivāvaruddhyai
2.314.8	sarvastomo 'tirātro bhavati sarveṣāṃ lokānām abhijityā abhikrāntyai
2.314.9	sarvaṃ hīdaṃ stomā eva
2.314.10	atho yān imān ekaikān stomān upāgāma tān sārdham ṛddhvā teṣu pratiṣṭhāyodṛcam aśnavāmahā iti
2.314.11	atha yasyaitasya pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya stomāś caturviṃśam ahar viśvajit sarvapṛṣṭho 'tirātro yaḥ kāmayeta parokṣopetaṃ me mahāvrataṃ syād iti sa etena yajeta
2.314.12	tad yac caturviṃśam ahar bhavati tenaivāsya parokṣopetaṃ mahāvrataṃ bhavati
2.314.13	yad v eva tatra hiṃkāro vā prastāvo vā pratihāro vā kiñcid bhavati tenaivāsya pañcaviṃśy upāptā bhavati
2.314.14	viśvajit sarvapṛṣṭho 'tirātro bhavati
2.314.15	śrīr vai varṣma pṛṣṭhāni
2.314.16	śriyam eva tad varṣma pṛṣṭhāny abhyārohanti
2.315.1	atha yasyaitasya pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya jyotir agniṣṭomo madhye bhavati jyotir atirātra upariṣṭād yaḥ kāmayetā me brahmavarcasī prajāyāṃ jāyeteti sa etena yajeta
2.315.2	ātma vai pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ
2.315.3	tejo vai brahmavarcasaṃ jyotir agniṣṭomaḥ
2.315.4	madhyata u vā ātmanaḥ prajananam
2.315.5	tad yan madhye jyotir agniṣṭomo bhavati madhyata evaitad ātmano jyotir dhatta ā hāsya brahmavarcasī prajāyāṃ jāyate
2.315.6	jyotir atirātra upariṣṭād etad vai prajñātaṃ devatīrthaṃ yaj jyotir atirātraḥ prajñātena devatīrthenāriṣṭenāriṣṭā udṛcam aśnavāmahā iti
2.315.7	atha yasyaitasya viśvajidabhijitāv agniṣṭomāv abhito bhavata ubhayato jyotiṣ ṣaḍaho madhye paśukāmo haitena yajeta
2.315.8	catvāra ete madhya ukthyā bhavanti
2.315.9	paśavo vā ukthāni
2.315.10	teṣāṃ sahasraṃ stotriyāḥ
2.315.11	catvāra u vaite 'gniṣṭomā abhito bhavanti
2.315.12	brahma vai jyotir agniṣṭomaḥ
2.315.13	brahmaṇaiva tad ubhayataḥ paśūn parigṛhṇīte 'parāvāpāya
2.315.14	nāsya vittaṃ paropyate ya evaṃ veda
2.315.15	īśvaro ha tu yādṛśa eva san yajate tādṛṅ bhavitoḥ
2.315.16	sa yadaivāntagata iva śriyai manyetātha hainena yajeta
2.315.17	iṣṭvā haiva svargaṃ lokaṃ eti

2.317.1	atha yasyaitasya jyotir gaur āyur iti tryaho jyotir gaur āyur iti tryaho jyotir gaur āyur atirātro yaḥ kāmayeta anantarhitān imān lokān abhyāroheyam iti sa etena yajeta
2.317.2	tad yaj jyotir gaur āyur iti tryaho bhavaty ayaṃ vai loko jyotir ayaṃ gaur asāv āyur anantarhitān evaitenemān lokān abhyārohati
2.317.3	atirātrāv anuttamas tryaho bhavati
2.317.4	evaṃvidhā iva vā ime lokā agniṣṭoma ivāyaṃ loka ukthya ivāyam atirātra ivāsau
2.317.5	tad yathāvidhā ime lokā evam evainān etad abhyārohann eti

2.319.1	tad v etasya paricakṣate yad enat satram eva manyante satraṃ ha smaitat puropayanti
2.319.2	anena ha tvāva satriyāś ca dakṣiṇāvantaś ca stomā vijñāyante
2.319.3	ubhayato 'tirātrā eva satriyā anyatarato 'tirātrā dakṣiṇāvantaḥ
2.319.4	sa ya enena dakṣiṇāvatā yajeta purastād agniṣṭomaṃ kṛtvā yajeta
2.319.5	atha yasyaitasya pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya stomāḥ pañcame 'hani mahāvrataṃ viśvajitstomo 'tirātraḥ

2.319.7	tāṃ daśamenaivāhnā saṃpādayanti

2.320.1	atha yasyaitasya pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya jyotir gaur āyur iti madhye tryaho bhavati prajananakāmo haitena yajeta
2.320.2	ātmā vai pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ
2.320.3	prajananam ete stomāḥ
2.320.4	tad yan madhye jyotir gaur āyur iti tryaho bhavati madhyata evaitad ātmanaḥ prajananaṃ dhatte bahur bhavati prajāyate
2.320.5	atha yasyaitasyordhvaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ pratyaṅ tryaho yaḥ kāmayeta gaccheyaṃ svargaṃ lokaṃ praty asmin loke tiṣṭheyam iti sa etena yajeta
2.320.6	ṣaḍahenaiveta ūrdhva svargaṃ lokaṃ gacchati praty evāmutas tryaheṇāvarohati

2.322.1	athaite daśarātrāḥ
2.322.2	abhicaryamāṇo haitena yajeta yad daśarātraḥ

2.322.5	ahnaiva prāṇaṃ parigṛhṇīte 'hnā prāṇam ahnā prāṇaṃ na tatas tasya sa prāṇo 'tiśaye yam asyābhicaraṃs stṛṇvīta

2.323.1	etad dha vai paramaṃ vācaḥ krāntaṃ yad daśeti
2.323.2	etāvad dha paramaṃ vāk cakrame

2.326.1	athaiṣa pañcayajñakratuḥ

2.332.1	athaiṣa kusurvindadaśarātraḥ

2.337.4	tad u satriṇo bhavanti
2.337.5	tad āhur agram iva vā ete rohanti ya etaṃ pṛṣṭhyaṃ ṣaḍaham upayantīti
2.337.6	yo vai mahāvṛkṣasyāgraṃ rūḍhvā pratyavaroḍhuṃ na veda bhaṅgaṃ vai sa nyety ava vā hi padyate tad vai vopari śuṣyati
2.337.7	tad yat parastāt pratyaṅ tryaho bhavati nihnavāyaivānārtyai śivatvāya śāntyai
2.337.8	jyotiṣo 'dhy ahna uttiṣṭhanti prajñātāj jyaiṣṭhyāt stomāt
2.337.9	prajñāte jyaiṣṭhye stome pratiṣṭhāyodṛcam aśnavāmahā iti
2.337.10	tasya dvādaśa stotrāṇi bhavanti dvādaśa māsās saṃvatsaraḥ
2.337.11	saṃvatsaro jyaiṣṭhyaṃ tasya bhrātṛvyo nāsty abhrātṛvye jyaiṣṭhye stome pratiṣṭhāyodṛcam aśnavāmahā iti
2.337.12	vaiśvānara udayanīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.337.13	vaiśvānarodayanā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.338.1	athaitā dvādaśāhavatīr bhavanti devasatraṃ ha khalu vā etat prajāpatisatraṃ yad dvādaśāhaḥ
2.338.2	etena vai satreṇa prajāpatir ārdhnot tad yena satreṇa prajāpatir ārdhnot tenardhnavāmeti
2.338.3	tad āhuḥ kiṃ varṣma satrāṇām iti
2.338.4	dvādaśāha iti brūyāt
2.338.5	dvādaśāho ha vai varṣma satrāṇāṃ na hy anyasmin satre catuścatvāriṃśa stomo 'sti nāṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ
2.338.6	tad yad varṣma satrāṇāṃ tan na upetam asad iti
2.338.7	iheva ca ha khalu vā eta iheva ca vācaṃ viprayuñjate ye yajante ye satram āsate
2.338.8	tāṃ daśamenaivāhnā saṃpādayanti
2.338.9	saṃpannāyai no vāco 'vikṛṣṭāyai pratiṣṭhitāyā udṛcam aśnavāmahā iti
2.338.10	ekeno ca satreṇa dve satre upayanti dvādaśāhaṃ ca caturdaśarātraṃ ca
2.338.11	vaiśvānara udayanīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.338.12	vaiśvānarodayanā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.339.1	māsyaṃ vā etat satram
2.339.2	tena yarddhis saivarddhiḥ
2.339.3	māso ha khalu vai punaḥpunaḥ palyayamānas saṃvatsaram āpnoti
2.339.4	saṃvatsaraṃ vā etad īrtsanti saṃvatsaram īpsanti yad yajante yat satram āsate
2.339.5	na hi kiṃ cana bahis saṃvatsarād asti
2.339.6	svārājyaṃ vā etā rātrayo yat pañcadaśa
2.339.7	sapta parastād ahāni saptāvastāt
2.339.8	atha yan madhye 'has sa svarāṭ sa svargo lokaḥ
2.339.9	tad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gacchanti tat svārājyaṃ gacchanti
2.339.10	tad anyasyānanuyānā bhavanti
2.339.11	vajro ha khalu vā eṣa yat pañcadaśarātraḥ
2.339.12	pañcadaśarātreṇa vai vajreṇa devā asurān abhyabhavan
2.339.13	te ye pāpmagṛhītā iva manyeraṃs ta etam eva pañcadaśarātram upeyuḥ
2.339.14	pañcadaśarātreṇaiva vajreṇa dviṣantaṃ pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyam abhibhūyottiṣṭhanti
2.339.15	tad u hovāca yāmano bhrātalāyano yām ahaṃ sarasvatīṃ pañcadaśarātreṇa vajreṇājayaṃ kas tasyām ud anyo 'vasātum arhati
2.339.16	vajreṇa vā aham etām ajayam
2.339.17	durapajayyaṃ vai vajrajitam iti
2.339.18	tā vā etā rātrayas saṃpadyante virājaṃ ca gāyatrīṃ ca
2.339.19	ete ha khalu vai chandasāṃ vīryavattame yad virāṭ ca gāyatrī ca
2.339.20	te ye chandasāṃ vīryavattame tayor ṛdhnavāma tayoḥ pratitiṣṭhāma tābhyāṃ na stutam asad iti
2.339.21	upo virājaṃ gacchanti
2.339.22	tad u virājo 'nnādyasyaiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ gacchanti
2.339.23	ekonā virāḍ ūnaṃ tat striyai yatas sā prajāyate teno prajananam
2.339.24	vaiśvānaraḥ prāyaṇīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.339.25	vaiśvānaraprāyaṇā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.340.1	athaite jyotir gaur āyur iti stomā bhavanti
2.340.2	ete ha vai śivāś śāntāḥ pathyā stomā ye jyotir gaur āyur iti
2.340.3	te ye śivāś śāntāḥ pathyā stomās tair na stutam asad iti
2.340.4	ta u virājaṃ saṃpannāḥ
2.340.5	tad u virājam annādyam ārabhante
2.340.6	yo vai śreyāṃsam asaṃvidyopādhirohaty ud vai sa taṃ hiṃsteyayā vai sa tam ārtyā kāmayate tayainaṃ ninayati
2.340.7	atha ya enam anu saṃvidam anusamāsādyopādhirohati na vai sa tam uddhiṃste
2.340.8	tad yad ete jyotir gaur āyur iti stomā bhavanti yathā śreyāṃsam anu saṃvidam anusamāsādyopādhirohet tādṛk tat
2.340.9	athaiṣa trivṛd agniṣṭud agniṣṭomo bhavati
2.340.10	brahma vai trivṛt
2.340.11	kṣatraṃ pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ
2.340.12	tad yat purastāt pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasyāgniṣṭutam upayanti brahmaiva tat kṣatrasya purastād dadhāti
2.340.13	tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyasya purohitaḥ
2.340.14	ekeno ca satreṇa dve satre upayanti dvādaśāhaṃ ca pañcadaśarātraṃ ca
2.340.15	vaiśvānara udayanīyo 'tirātro bhavati

2.341.1	dvimāsyaṃ vā etat satram
2.341.2	tena yarddhis saivarddhiḥ
2.341.3	yau ha khalu vai dvau māsāv ṛtos sarddhiḥ
2.341.4	ṛtur u pratyakṣaṃ saṃvatsarasyarddhiḥ
2.341.5	saṃvatsaraṃ vā etad īrtsanti saṃvatsaram īpsanti yad yajante yat satram āsate
2.341.6	na hi kiṃ cana bahis saṃvatsarād asti
2.341.7	svārājyaṃ vā etā rātrayo yad ekaviṃśatir daśa parastād ahāni daśāvastāt
2.341.8	atha yan madhye 'has sa svarāṭ sa svargo lokaḥ
2.341.9	tad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gacchanti tat svārājyaṃ gacchanti
2.341.10	tad anyasyānanuyānā bhavanti
2.341.11	tā vā etā rātrayas saṃpadyante virājam eva
2.341.12	tad u virājo 'nnādyasyaiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ gacchanti
2.341.13	pañca ca virāṭ ca
2.341.14	tā yāḥ pañca daivīr ācchadas tāsām eṣarddhiḥ
2.341.15	yaḥ pāṅkto yajño ye pāṅktāḥ paśavo yat pāṅktam annādyaṃ ye pañcartavo yat kiṃ ca pañca pañca tasyaiṣā sarvasyarddhis tasyopāptiḥ
2.342.1	daśaitāni parastād ahāni bhavanti daśāvastād viṣuvān ekaviṃśaḥ
2.342.2	daśa vai puruṣasya hastyā aṅgulayo daśa padyā ātmaikaviṃśaḥ
2.342.3	puruṣo ha vā eṣa virājy adhyūḍho 'niṣpādāya
2.342.4	na ha vai gaur nāśvo nāśvataro virājam adhitiṣṭhati
2.342.5	puruṣo ha vāva virājam adhitiṣṭhati
2.342.6	tasmāt puruṣaḥ paśūnām attā
2.342.7	attā paśūnāṃ bhavaty adhi virājaṃ tiṣṭhati ya evaṃ veda
2.342.8	tā haitā rātrīr naidāghīye māsy upeyuḥ
2.342.9	naidāghīye vai māsi prajāpatir ādityāya rucaṃ prāyacchat
2.342.10	tasmād eṣa naidāghīye māsi baliṣṭhaṃ tapaty api dviguṇāś chāyā upasarpanti
2.342.11	tā hāgradevo rājanir brahmavarcasakāma upeyāya
2.342.12	tam u ha brāhmaṇa uvāca yāvad brahmavarcasam avāruddhābhiśveto bhaviṣyatīti
2.342.13	sa yathāśva śveta evam āsa
2.342.14	tāvat tejasvinīs tāvad brahmavarcasinīs tāvad vīryavatīr etā rātrayaḥ
2.342.15	te ya evaṃ vidvāṃsa etā rātrīr upayanti sarva evardhnuvate sarve brahmavarcasino bhavanti
2.342.16	tāsu vāyavyaṃ paśum ālabheran vāyur vai śāntiś śāntyā evānirdāhāya
2.342.17	vaiśvānaraḥ prāyaṇīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.342.18	vaiśvānaraprāyaṇā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.343.1	athaiṣa pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati
2.343.2	śrīr vai pṛṣṭhāni varṣma vai pṛṣṭhāni
2.343.3	tac chriyaṃ varṣma pṛṣṭhāni rohanti
2.343.4	tad u satriṇo bhavanti
2.343.5	athaite saptadaśā svarasāmāno bhavanti prājāpatyāny ahāni trayaḥ parastāt trayo 'vastāt
2.343.6	prajāpatir vā eṣa dvedhā vyūḍha ādityāya rucaṃ prayacchati
2.343.7	tad yo rucaḥ pradātā yena ruk prattā sa no rucaṃ prayacchād iti
2.343.8	athaiṣa ekaviṃśo viṣuvān bhavati
2.343.9	dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśaḥ
2.343.10	etasya vā ete salokatāṃ gacchanty etam abhyārohanti
2.343.11	tad āhu śreyāṃsaṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ya etaṃ ādityam iti
2.343.12	tad yat parastād pratyaṅ pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati nihnavāyaivānārtyai śivatvāya śāntyai
2.343.13	vaiśvānara udayanīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.343.14	vaiśvānarodayanā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.344.1	atha yasyaitasya pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya yan madhye saptadaśam ahas tad upariṣṭāt trayastriṃśasya paryūhanti
2.344.2	prajananakāmā haitad upeyuḥ
2.344.3	prajananaṃ vai pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍahaḥ
2.344.4	ṣaḍuttareṇa vai stomāḥ prajanayanti caturuttareṇa chandāṃsi
2.344.5	athaiṣa ṣaḍuttarai stomais stomas saptadaśo madhye vyavahitaḥ
2.344.6	prajananam antardhāyeva tiṣṭhati
2.344.7	taṃ yad upariṣṭāt trayastriṃśasya paryūhanty anantarhitāt prajananāt prajāyāmahā iti
2.344.8	dvayor u vai saptadaśayos tṛtīyatāyai
2.344.9	athaitau viśvajidabhijitāv abhita stomānāṃ vīryam
2.344.10	vīryeṇa ha vā etau viṣuvantaṃ dādhartuḥ
2.344.11	yajñasya ha khalu vā methyau yad viśvajidabhijitau
2.344.12	etābhyāṃ vai yajño dhṛtaḥ
2.344.13	devatalpo ha khalu vā eṣa yad viśvajidabhijitau kṣatram asāv ādityaḥ
2.344.14	devatalpa eva tat kṣatram adhyūhanti
2.344.15	tasmāt kṣatriyo viśy adhyūḍhaḥ
2.344.16	athaiṣa ekaviṃśo viṣuvān bhavati
2.344.17	dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśaḥ
2.344.18	etasya vā ete salokatāṃ gacchanty etam abhyārohanti
2.344.19	tad āhu śreyāṃsaṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ya etaṃ ādityam iti
2.344.20	tad yat parastād pratyaṅṅ evaṃvidhaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati nihnavāyaivānārtyai śivatvāya śāntyai
2.344.21	vaiśvānara udayanīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.344.22	vaiśvānarodayanā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.345.1	athaitat pañcāhavidhaṃ bhavati
2.345.2	na ha khalu vai sa ekaviṃśatirātro yo viṣuvān

2.345.4	tad yad viśvajidabhijitau bhavataḥ kṛtsnaṃ viṣuvantam ṛdhnavāma kṛtsno no viṣuvān upeto 'sad iti

2.346.5	saṃvatsaraṃ vā etad īrtsanti saṃvatsaram īpsanti yad yajante yat satram āsate

2.346.7	svārājyaṃ vā etā rātrayo yad caturviṃśatir dvādaśa parastād ahāni dvādaśāvastāt
2.346.8	atha yo madhye lokas sa svarāṭ sa svargo lokaḥ

2.346.10	tad anyasyānanuyānā bhavanti

2.346.12	paśavo vai jagatī
2.346.13	tenaitat satraṃ paśavyam
2.346.14	upo virājaṃ gacchanti
2.346.15	tad u virājo 'nnādyasyaiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ gacchanti
2.346.16	dvyūnā virāṭ dve te striyā ūne yatas sā prajāyate teno prajananam

2.346.20	jyaiṣṭyaṃ vai gāyatrī tad v abhrātṛvye jyaiṣṭhye pratitiṣṭhanti
2.347.1	athaite saptāhā bhavanti sapta vai chandāṃsi
2.347.2	chandāṃsi vai svārājyo lokas tad yāvān svārājyo lokas tāvantaṃ svārājyaṃ lokam ṛdhnavāmeti
2.347.3	sapta vai prāṇāḥ
2.347.4	prāṇair vai prajāḥ paśavaḥ parigṛhītā upatiṣṭhante
2.347.5	tad yaiḥ prāṇaiḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ parigṛhītā upatiṣṭhante tair naḥ prāṇaiḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ parigṛhītā upatiṣṭhāntā iti
2.347.6	prāṇair vai devā svargaṃ lokam āyan
2.347.7	tad yaiḥ prāṇair devā svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs taiḥ prāṇai svargaṃ lokam āyāmeti
2.347.8	sapta vai mukhyāḥ prāṇāḥ
2.347.9	ete vā apahatapāpmānaḥ prāṇā yan mukhyāḥ
2.347.10	te ye 'pahatapāpmānaḥ prāṇās teṣāṃ mātrayā yajñaṃ tanavāmahā iti
2.347.11	agniṣṭomā bhūyāṃsa ukthyebhyo bhavanti
2.347.12	brahma vā agniṣṭomaḥ
2.347.13	tad brahmavarcasam ṛdhnuvanti
2.347.14	tad u brahmavarcasino bhavanti

2.347.16	brahma vā agniṣṭomaḥ paśava ukthyāni
2.347.17	brahmaṇaiva tad ubhayataḥ paśūn parigṛhṇanty aparāvāpāya nāsya vittaṃ paropyate ya evaṃ veda

2.348.1	athaite pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya stomā bhavanti
2.348.2	śrīr vai pṛṣṭhāni varṣma vai pṛṣṭhāni
2.348.3	tac chriyaṃ varṣma pṛṣṭhāni rohanti
2.348.4	tad u satriṇo bhavanti
2.348.5	athaitat trayastriṃśam ahar bhavati
2.348.6	trayastriṃśād evādhi trayastriṃśam
2.348.7	sa hy antaḥ
2.348.8	kuto hy anyad āhareyuḥ
2.348.9	tasya catustriṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati
2.348.10	trayastriṃśad vai devatāḥ
2.348.11	prajāpatiś catustriṃśaḥ
2.348.12	ṣaṣṭhāyatano vai prajāpatir devatānām
2.348.13	atha yat saptamam aha svārājyas sa lokaḥ
2.348.14	svārājyam u catustriṃśī
2.348.15	tad yat saptamasyāhnaś catustriṃśaṃ bahiṣpavamānaṃ bhavati tad yāvān svārājyo lokas tāvantaṃ svārājyaṃ lokam ṛdhnavāmeti
2.348.16	trayāṇām u caiva trayastriṃśānām ananūcīnatāyai
2.348.17	proṣṭhasya ha khalu vā etā rūpaṃ rātrayaḥ
2.348.18	ūrdhvo vā ayam itaṣ ṣaḍahas tiryaṅ madhye 'rvāṅ asāv amutaḥ
2.348.19	upariṣadyasyo vā etā rūpaṃ rātrayaḥ
2.348.20	upariṣadyaṃ vai so 'śnute ya śriyam aśnute
2.348.21	upariṣadyaṃ jyaiṣṭhyaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ śriyam aśnavāmahā iti
2.348.22	tasmād etā rātrīr upayanti

2.348.24	tad yat parastād pratyañcaḥ pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya stomā bhavanti nihnavāyaivānārtyai śivatvāya śāntyai
2.348.25	jyotiṣo 'dhy ahna uttiṣṭhanty uktabrāhmaṇāt
2.348.26	vaiśvānara udayanīyo 'tirātro bhavati

2.349.1	atha yasyaitasya sarvam eva catustriṃśam ahar bhavati sarveṇaivāhnā svārājyaṃ lokam ṛdhnavāmeti
2.349.2	trayāṇām u caiva trayastriṃśānām ananūcīnatāyai
2.349.3	atha ha smāha bhāllabeyo na purā saṃvatsarān mahāvratam upetyam
2.349.4	upo ced iyuś caturviṃśatyām evainad rātrīṣūpeyur iti
2.349.5	saṃvatsaro vā etā rātrayo yac caturviṃśatiḥ
2.349.6	caturviṃśatyardhamāsas saṃvatsaraḥ
2.349.7	saṃvatsara evaiṣa ubhayataḥ paryūḍhaḥ
2.349.8	tasya yan madhye saptadaśam ahas tasminn evopetyam iti
2.349.9	saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ
2.349.10	prājāpatyaṃ mahāvratam
2.349.11	madhyāyatano vai prajāpatir devatānām
2.349.12	tad yatrāyatanaḥ prajāpatir devatānāṃ tat prajāpatim ṛdhnavāmeti
2.349.13	madhyato vā annam aśitaṃ dhinoti
2.349.14	tad yad evam upayanti madhyata evaitad aśanayām apahatyottiṣṭhanti
2.349.15	tad āhu śreyāṃsaṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ya etā rātrīr upayantīti
2.349.16	tad yat parastād pratyañcaḥ pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasya stomā bhavanti nihnavāyaivānārtyai śivatvāya śāntyai
2.349.17	jyotiṣo 'dhy ahna uttiṣṭhanty uktabrāhmaṇāt
2.349.18	yad iti ha khalu vā etac chando yad gāyatrī
2.349.19	yad gāyatryā adhy uttiṣṭheyur īśvarā apratiṣṭhitāś caritoḥ

2.362.3	ta etad ayanam apaśyan
2.362.4	tad upāyan
2.362.5	tato vā ādityāḥ pūrve svargaṃ lokam agacchann ahīyantāṅgirasaḥ
2.362.6	sā ha khalu vai śreṣṭharddhīnāṃ sa lokānāṃ puṇyatamo yam etenādityā agacchan
2.362.7	sā yā śreṣṭharddhīnāṃ yo lokānāṃ puṇyatamo yam etenādityā agacchaṃs taṃ gacchāmeti tasmād etā rātrīr upayanti
2.362.8	vaiśvānaraḥ prāyaṇīyo 'tirātro bhavati
2.362.9	vaiśvānaraprāyaṇā hy ahīnās somāḥ
2.363.1	athaite jyotir gaur āyur iti stomā bhavanti
2.363.2	ete ha vai śivāś śāntāḥ pathyā stomā ye jyotir gaur āyur iti
2.363.3	te ye śivāś śāntāḥ pathyā stomās tair na stutam asad iti
2.363.4	ta u virājaṃ saṃpannāḥ
2.363.5	tad u virājam annādyam ārabhante
2.363.6	bṛhadrathantare sāmanī bhavataḥ
2.363.7	sā hy ṛddhis sa panthāḥ
2.363.8	śyaitanaudhase brahmasāmanī bhavataḥ
2.363.9	praspaṣṭam ājim anu śūkaravāmeti
2.363.10	athaite ṣaḍ atirātrā bhavanti
2.363.11	ṣaḍ vai puruṣe pāpmānaṣ ṣaḍ viṣuvanta svapnaś ca tandrī ca manyuś cāśanayā cākṣakāmyā ca strīkāmyā ca
2.363.12	tān evaitair apaghnate tān atitaranti
2.363.13	athaite trayas tryahā bhavanti
2.363.14	navāhāni
2.363.15	nava vai puruṣe prāṇāḥ
2.363.16	prāṇānām evaiṣā saṃmā prāṇānām ṛddhiḥ
2.363.17	athaitad vairājapṛṣṭhaṃ daśamam ahar bhavati
2.363.18	nābhir ha sā tad vā etad ākṣit sad ahar eteṣv ahassu niyuktam
2.363.19	yasmād etad ākṣit sad ahar eteṣv ahassu niyuktaṃ tasmād ākṣit satī nābhiḥ prāṇesu niyuktā
2.363.20	prāṇato hy enām anūdanity apānato 'nvapāniti
2.363.21	tad eteṣām ahnāṃ daśamaṃ bhavati daśākṣarā virāṭ
2.363.22	annaṃ virāḍ virāja evānnādyasyāvaruddhyai
2.364.1	tad vairājapṛṣṭhaṃ bhavaty annaṃ vai vairājam annādyasyaivāvaruddhyai
2.364.2	tad ukthyaṃ bhavati paśavo vā ukthāny annaṃ paśavo 'bhipūrvasyaivānnādyasyāvaruddhyai
2.364.3	tat ṣoḍaśimad bhavati vajro vai ṣoḍaśy annaṃ virāḍ vajreṇaivānnādyaṃ parigṛhṇanti
2.364.4	tad ekaviṃśaṃ bhavati dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavas traya ime lokā asāv āditya ekaviṃśaḥ
2.364.5	etad vai daivyaṃ kṣatram
2.364.6	kṣatriya u vā annādyasya pradātā
2.364.7	sa yo 'nnādyasya pradātā sa no 'nnādyaṃ prayacchād iti
2.364.8	athaite catvāras triyahā bhavanti dvādaśāhāni
2.364.9	dvādaśa vai saṃvatsarasya paurṇamāsyaḥ
2.364.10	paurṇamāsīnām evaiṣā saṃmā paurṇamāsīnām ṛddhiḥ
2.364.11	athaiṣa pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati
2.364.12	śrīr vai pṛṣṭhāni varṣma vai pṛṣṭhāni
2.364.13	tac chriyaṃ varṣma pṛṣṭhāni rohanti
2.364.14	tad u satriṇo bhavanti

2.364.16	dvādaśa vai saṃvatsarasyāmāvāsyāḥ

2.365.1	ādityāś ca vā aṅgirasaś ca svarge loke 'spardhanta

2.366.1	tad ye ha vā eta ādityasyodañco raśmayas ta ādityā ye dakṣiṇās te 'ṅgirasaḥ

2.366.13	māsā eva tad bhūtvā madhyatas saṃvatsaram atītya svargaṃ lokaṃ ruruhuḥ
2.367.1	athaitā dvādaśāhavatīr bhavanti yaivāsau dvādaśāhavatīnāṃ praśaṃsā sā na upāptāsad iti
2.367.2	athaitāni caturuttarāṇi chandāṃsy upayanti
2.367.3	caturuttarā vai vāco rohāḥ
2.367.4	vācam evaite rohanti
2.367.5	atho catuṣpadā vai paśavaḥ
2.367.6	tad yad etāni caturuttarāṇi chandāṃsy upayanti catuṣpadām eva paśūnām avaruddhyai
2.367.7	athaitāni athaitāni dviyantarāṇy upāharanti
2.367.8	caturuttarāṇi dviyantarāṇi
2.367.9	na ha vai tāvac chriyam aśnute yāvad dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ paśūnām aiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ na gacchati
2.367.10	tad yad etāni dviyantarāṇy upāharanti caturuttaradviyantarāṇi dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ paśūnām aiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ gacchāmeti
2.367.11	athaitāny aṣṭāntarāṇy upāharanti caturuttaradviyantarāṇi sarvāṇi catasro diśaś catvāro 'vāntaradeśā diśāṃ sa upariṣṭāl loko yaḥ puṇyas sarvāsu dikṣu pratiṣṭhāya svargaṃ lokaṃ gacchāmeti
2.367.12	athaitāni pañca sandhiṣāmāni bhavanti rathantaraṃ jarābodhīyaṃ śrudhīyaṃ nānadagaurivīte iti
2.367.13	etad dha vā ekaṃ prajñātaṃ sandhiṣāma yad rathantaram / tad yad ekaṃ prajñātam
2.368.1	sandhiṣāma tena na stutam asad iti
2.368.2	atho vāg vai rathantaraṃ vāg āśvinaṃ vāg vai vācaṃ prati vibhavitum arhatīyaṃ vāg vācaṃ prati vibhavād iti
2.368.3	etad u ha vai dvitīyaṃ prajñātaṃ sandhiṣāma yaj jarābodhīyam
2.368.4	tad yad dvitīyaṃ prajñātaṃ sandhiṣāma tena na stutam asad iti
2.368.5	atha śrudhīyaṃ kīrtimat
2.368.6	sāmavṛktir u sandhiṣāmanī
2.368.7	tad yad ābhyāṃ sandhiṣāmabhyām avṛkṣmahi tan no 'sya lokavatas sāmnaḥ paśavo lokam anūpatiṣṭhāntā iti
2.368.8	atha nānadagaurivīte lokavatī sāmanī bhūyāṃsaṃ no lokam anūpatiṣṭhāntā iti
2.368.9	tad āhus trir evāśvinaṃ śastavyam iti triṣatyā vai vāk

2.368.11	yad atirātre 'tirātra āśvinaṃ śaṃsed vikarṣas sa vācaḥ

2.368.13	etad dha vai samṛddham āśvinaṃ yad rathantareṇa saṃpadyate

2.374.12	satrābhijitaṃ hy āsām avaruddhaṃ hy āsām
2.374.13	te ya evaṃ vidvāṃso dvādaśa māsaḥ samāpayanti sarvam evānnādyam avarudhyottiṣṭhanti
2.374.14	ātmadakṣiṇaṃ ha khalu vai satram
2.374.15	lomaiva prathamābhyām upasadbhyāṃ spṛṇvate tvacaṃ dvitīyābhyāṃ māṃsaṃ tṛtīyābhyām asthi caturthībhyāṃ majjānaṃ pañcamībhyām

2.375.1	prajāpatir vāvedam agra āsīt
2.375.2	so 'kāmayata bahuḥ syāṃ prajāyeya bhūmānaṃ gaccheyam iti
2.375.3	sa tapo 'tapyata
2.375.4	sa etaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ prāyaṇīyam atirātram apaśyat
2.375.5	tasmād ahorātre prājanayat
2.375.6	ahorātrayoḥ pratyatiṣṭhat
2.375.7	tad yad eṣa vaiśvānaraḥ prāyaṇīyo 'tirātro bhavaty ahorātre evaitasmāt prajanayanty ahorātrayoḥ pratitiṣṭhanti
2.375.8	so 'kāmayata praiva jāyeyeti
2.375.9	sa etasmād eva vaiśvānarāt prāyaṇīyād atirātrāt tryahaṃ niramimīta agniṣṭomād eva jyotir niramimīta ukthyebhyo gāṃ rātryā āyuḥ
2.375.10	tasmāt tryahāt trīn ṛtūn prājanayat triṣv ṛtuṣu pratyatiṣṭhat

2.375.16	tad yad etau dvau ṣaḍahau bhavato dvādaśaivaitābhyāṃ māsaḥ prajanayanti dvādaśasu māseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
2.375.17	so 'kāmayata praiva jāyeyeti

2.375.21	tad yad ete catvāraṣ ṣaḍahā bhavanti caturviṃśatim evaitebhyo 'rdhamāsān prajanayanti caturviṃśatyām ardhamāseṣu pratitiṣṭhanti
2.376.1	sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhuvanaṃ prajanya pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍahenātmann adhatta
2.376.2	tad yad eṣa pṛṣṭhyaṣ ṣaḍaho bhavati sarvam evaitena bhuvanaṃ prajanyātmasu dadhate
2.376.3	varṣma vai pṛṣṭhāni
2.376.4	varṣmaṇy evaitat pratitiṣṭhanti
2.376.5	śrīr vai pṛṣṭhāni
2.376.6	śriyām evaitat pratitiṣṭhanti
2.376.7	jyaiṣṭhyaṃ vai pṛṣṭhāni

2.376.9	tejo vai pṛṣṭhāni tejasy evaitat pratitiṣṭhanti
2.376.10	paśavo ha khalu vā abhiplavaṣ ṣaḍaha ātmā pṛṣṭhyaḥ
2.376.11	yad abhiplavaṃ ṣaḍaham upetyātha pṛṣṭhyam upayanti puruṣam evaitat paśuṣv adhyūhanti
2.376.12	tasmāt puruṣa upariṣṭāt paśūn adhīva tiṣṭhati
2.376.13	mūlaṃ ha khalu vā abhiplavaṣ ṣaḍaho 'graṃ pṛṣṭhyaḥ
2.376.14	yad abhiplavaṃ ṣaḍaham upetyātha pṛṣṭhyam upayanti tasmād oṣadhayo mūlato jāyante 'grataḥ pacyante

2.377.1	prāyaṇīyam ahar bhavati

2.377.7	caturviṃśatyardhamāso vai saṃvatsaraḥ
2.377.8	ardhamāsaśa eva tat saṃvatsaram āpnuvanti
2.377.9	etad u ha vā eke satriṇo 'har upetyottasthur āpāma saṃvatsaram iti vadantaḥ
2.377.10	te ye kāmaṃkāmaṃ samārebhāṇā iva syus ta etad evāhar upetyotiṣṭheyuḥ
2.377.11	āpto haiṣāṃ saṃvatsaro bhavati
2.377.12	tasya trīṇi ca śatāni stotriyā bhavanti ṣaṣṭiś ca
2.377.13	tāvatīs saṃvatsarasya rātrayaḥ
2.377.14	rātriśa eva tat saṃvatsaram āpnuvanti

2.377.22	triṃśat stutaśastrāṇi bhavanti

2.377.24	māsaśa eva tat saṃvatsaram āpnuvanti
2.378.1	tad āhur īrma iva vā eṣā hotrāṇāṃ yad acchāvāko yad acchāvākam anusaṃtiṣṭheterma iva tuṣṭuvānā syur iti
2.378.2	tasya traikakubhaṃ brahmasāma bhavaty udvaṃśīyam acchāvākasāma
2.378.3	indriyaṃ vai vīryaṃ traikakubhaṃ sarvaṃ pṛṣṭharūpam udvaṃśīyam

2.379.3	ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā vai bṛhatī
2.379.4	bṛhatī svargo lokaḥ sāmrājyam
2.379.5	bṛhatyām eva tat svarge loke sāmrājye pratitiṣṭhanto yanti
2.379.6	bṛhaty u ha vā imān sarvān lokān akṣarair vyāpnoti daśabhir evākṣarair imaṃ lokaṃ vyāpnoti daśabhir antarikṣaṃ daśabhir amuṃ caturbhir diśo dvābhyām ahorātre

2.379.8	tasmāt ṣaḍ eva ṣaṭtriṃśāni stotrāṇi kuryuṣ ṣaṭ caturviṃśānīti

2.379.15	etasyāṃ vai sarvāṇirūpāṇi
2.379.16	ubhe pratipadau bhavata ubhe hy atra sāmanī kriyete
2.379.17	tarhi yathaujiṣṭhau baliṣṭhau vahiṣṭhau saṃpārayiṣṇū mahāntam adhvānaṃ saṃyujyopapreyāt tādṛk tat

2.394.4	etāsāṃ vai devatānāṃ savanāni bhājanaṃ tan na savanenaibhyo yanti na devatā antaryanti
2.394.5	prajāpatir eṣa yat saṃvatsaraḥ
2.394.6	tasyaite prāṇāpānā yat paurṇamāsyaś cāmāvāsyāś ca
2.394.7	tad yat paurṇamāsīś cāmāvāsyāś cotsṛjyante prajāpater eva tat prāṇāpānān utsṛjante
2.394.8	tam etam upariṣṭāt saṃvatsarasya caturviṃśatirātram upayanti
2.394.9	atho āhuḥ paurṇamāsīr evotsṛjyā iti
2.394.10	prāṇābhājanā vai paurṇamāsy apānabhājanāmāvāsyā
2.394.11	bahir vai santaṃ prāṇam upajīvanty antas santam apānam
2.394.12	tad yat paurṇamāsīr utsṛjante bahis santaṃ prāṇam upajīvāmāntas santam apānam iti
2.394.13	tam etam upariṣṭād dvādaśarātram upayanti
2.395.1	tad u hovācāruṇir aṣāḍhaṃ sāvayasam utsasṛjānaṃ hotā chidre saṃvatsara āsta iti
2.395.2	sa hovāca mā na evaṃ bravīr upa vai vayaṃ tam upariṣṭād dvādaśarātram aimeti
2.395.3	taṃ ha tad upajagau
2.395.4	jyāyo vā hi kanīyo vā na hi vā tena tat samam
2.395.5	kapālam anyathā saty achidra upadhīyate
2.395.6	iti vā aham etad dhotur manye
2.395.7	chidraṃ vā ahaṃ teṣāṃ saṃvatsaraṃ manye ya utsṛjante
2.395.8	atho haiṣāṃ tad anyatheva satram upetaṃ bhavati
2.395.9	yathā vai śaśa evaṃ yajñaḥ
2.395.10	yo vai śaśam utsargaṃ lipsate nainaṃ sa gṛhṇāti
2.395.11	atha ya enam anutsargaṃ lipsate sa evainaṃ gṛhṇāti
2.395.12	utsargam evaital lipsante ya utsṛjante
2.395.13	tasmān naivotsṛjyam iti
2.396.1	atha ha smāha kusurbinda auddālakir utsṛjyaṃ caiva na neti
2.396.2	yad evādyāhar utsṛjeraṃs tac chvo bhūte pratisaṃkhyāyopaprastuyuḥ
2.396.3	tenaivotsṛṣṭaṃ ca na ceti
2.396.4	atho yāvanty evāhāny utsṛjeraṃs tāni saṃkhyāyopariṣṭād atirātrasyopeyuḥ
2.396.5	teno evotsṛṣṭaṃ ca na ceti
2.396.6	atha ha smāha bhāllabeya ukthāny evotsṛjyānīti
2.396.7	prajā vai paśava ukthāni
2.396.8	prajā eva tat paśūn utsṛjante
2.396.9	atho yathā dṛtim padocchvāsayet tādṛk tat
2.396.10	tad āhur utsṛjyam eveti
2.396.11	prajāpatir eṣa yat saṃvatsaraḥ
2.396.12	tasyaite prāṇāḥ parvāṇi yat paurṇamāsyaś cāmāvāsyāś ca
2.396.13	yathā ha vā idaṃ dṛtir abhidhmātaś śoced evaṃ ha vā eṣa prajāpatiḥ paśūñ chocayaty anutsṛjyamānaḥ
2.396.14	tad yat paurṇamāsīś cāmāvāsyāś cotsṛjante 'ṅgāny evāsya tat prāṇān parvāṇi prasārayanti nen nas saṃvatsaraś śuśucāno hinasad iti
2.396.15	tam īṃ hinvanty agruva iti śvo bhūte pratipadaṃ kurvīran
2.396.16	tad yathā dṛtim ucchvāsitaṃ punar abhidhamet tādṛk tat
2.396.17	dhamanti bākuraṃ dṛtiṃ tridhātu sāraghaṃ madhv iti saṃvatsaro vai bākuro dṛtir yajñas tridhātur brāhmaṇās saraghās ta evaitan madhu kurvanti
2.397.1	atha ha smāha sirindaḥ pālālir amāvāsyāyām evotsṛjyam iti
2.397.2	amāvāsyāyāṃ vā etad devatā udasṛjanta
2.397.3	devatānām utsṛṣṭim anūtsṛjāmahā iti
2.397.4	ete u ha vai saṃvatsarasya medhye rātrī yat paurṇamāsī cāmāvāsyā ca
2.397.5	tad yat paurṇamāsīṃ cāmāvāsyāṃ cotsṛjeran saṃvatsaraṃ medhenavyardhayeyuḥ
2.397.6	trivṛd evāgniṣṭomaḥ kārya iti
2.397.7	tasya yan nyūnāni stotrāṇi bhavanti tenaivotsṛṣṭaṃ ca na ceti
2.397.8	atha ha smāha nagarī jānaśruteya ekatrika evopetya iti
2.397.9	tasya yac chvāṅkṣitānīva stotrāṇi bhavanti tenaivotsṛṣṭaṃ ca na ceti
2.397.10	atha ha smāhāruṇir yāv evaitau goāyuṣī stomau tābhyām evotsṛṣṭaṃ ca na ceti
2.397.11	tayor yasya nyūnāni stotrāṇi tenotsṛṣṭaṃ yasyātiriktāni tenānutsṛṣṭam
2.397.12	tasmād etāv evopetyāv iti
2.398.1	adhvaryur grahaṃ gṛhītvā dravati
2.398.2	sa āhopāvartadhvam iti
2.398.3	te hiṃkṛtyaiva prāñco niṣkramyāgreṇāgnīdhraṃ tiṣṭhanto viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ vratena stuvate
2.398.4	viśvebhya eva tad devebhyo nivedayante 'rātsmeti
2.398.5	te prāñco 'bhikramya cātvālam avekṣamāñāḥ krośena stuvate
2.398.6	devānāṃ vā antaṃ jagmuṣām indriyaṃ vīryam apākrāmat
2.398.7	tat krośenaivāvarundhata
2.398.8	antam ivaite gacchanti ye saṃvatsarasyodṛcam aśnuvate
2.398.9	tad yat krośena stuvata indriyasyaiva vīryasyāvaruddhyai
2.398.10	athānukrośam
2.398.11	devā vai yatra tryaheṇa svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tad dhaiṣām etat tṛtīyam ahar vairūpaṃ vyāra
2.398.12	tasyaiṣa ślokaḥ
2.398.13	vairūpaṃ devā abhisaṃvasānās tad ātasthus tad u haiṣāṃ vyāra
2.398.14	te hiṃkṛtya punar āruhya sarva avādhūnvata jarasaṃ tanūnām
2.398.15	iti
2.398.16	tasya evaiṣā ślokaḥ
2.398.17	yad vairūpa upahate vyaddhve hiṃkṛṇvantas samatiṣṭhanta yāman
2.398.18	tad devasthānam asṛjanta sāma tena devāso amṛtatvam āyan
2.398.19	iti
2.398.20	te yatra svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tad vidhātā putrān abravīn mā yūyam ādṛḍhvam ihaivāhaṃ yuṣmān vidhāsyāmīti
2.399.1	so 'syāṃ prācyāṃ diśi puraṃ vaidhātram adadhāt
2.399.2	tasya prācīna āhuryāyaṇaḥ purohitaḥ
2.399.3	so 'syāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy adharāhiṃ vaidhātram adadhāt
2.399.4	tasya dakṣiṇa āhuryāyaṇaḥ purohitaḥ
2.399.5	so 'syāṃ pratīcyāṃ diśi paścaṃ vaidhātram adadhāt
2.399.6	tasya pratīcīna āhuryāyaṇaḥ purohitaḥ
2.399.7	so 'syām udīcyāṃ diśy uttarāhiṃ vaidhātram adadhāt
2.399.8	tasyodīcīna āhuryāyaṇaḥ purohitaḥ
2.399.9	te devā vidhātāram abruvann evam u cet tvam etad adhithās tathāsmān anvīkṣasva yathā vayaṃ svasti svargaṃ lokaṃ gacchemeti
2.399.10	tān etena krośenānvaikṣata
2.400.1	indrāsuteṣu someṣu hoyehūho ity evainān prāsedhat
2.400.2	te 'bruvan satrā vai no 'tyudasītsaḥ
2.400.3	tathā no 'nvīkṣasva yathā na etasmin loke anvābhajā iti
2.400.4	tān etenaivānukrośenendrā ho iha veho ity evāsmin loke 'nvābhajat
2.400.5	tato vai ta ubhayor anayor lokayoḥ pratyatiṣṭhan
2.400.6	krośenaiva svargaṃ lokam agacchann anukrośenāsmin pratyatiṣṭhan

2.401.1	agner apipakṣaṃ prati satrasyarddhyā stuvate
2.401.2	agnaya eva tad devebhyo nivedayante 'rātsmeti
2.401.3	vratapakṣābhyām abhito havirdhāne
2.401.4	svargāya vā ete lokāya dīkṣante ye saṃvatsarāya
2.401.5	tad yad vratapakṣābhyāṃ stuvate ātmann eva tat pakṣau pratidadhate svargasya lokasya patanāya
2.401.6	tasmād ātman pakṣau pratihitau
2.401.7	prāṇāpānābhyām stuvate
2.401.8	prāṇena purastād apānena paścāt
2.401.9	tad āhur vīva vā ete prāṇāpānābhyām ṛdhyante ye yajñiyasya karmaṇo 'tipādayanti yadi vā nātipādayanti
2.401.10	ko hi tad veda yadi te 'ti vā pādayanti na vā
2.401.11	tad yat prāṇāpānābhyāṃ stuvate prāṇāpānābhyām eva tat samṛdhyante
2.402.1	ślokānuślokābhyāṃ stuvate
2.402.2	ślokena purastād anuślokena paścāt
2.402.3	tad yac chlokena stuvate puṇyaṃ ślokam avaruṇadhāmahā iti
2.402.4	atha yad anuślokena puṇyo 'nuśloka uttasthuṣo 'nūttiṣṭhād iti
2.402.5	nihnavābhinihnavābhyāṃ stuvate
2.402.6	nihnavena purastād abhinihnavena paścāt
2.402.7	tad āhu śreyāṃsaṃ vā ete 'bhyārohanti ye saṃvatsaram iti
2.402.8	tad yan nihnavena stuvate śreyasa eva tan nihnuvate 'bhy evābhinihnavenārohanti
2.402.9	yad u cehākarma tad u ca māpahnoṣmahā iti
2.402.10	tathā haiṣāṃ tad anumoditaṃ bhavati
2.402.11	aṅgirasāṃ ṣaḍviṃśatyakṣaraṇidhanenāntassadasaṃ stuvate
2.402.12	jaghanenaudumbarīm aṅgirobhya etad devebhyo nivedayante 'rātsmeti
2.403.1	tat pañcaviṃśaṃ kṛtvā stuvate vratasyānatiṣṭavāya yad v eva prati bhūtecchandasāṃvratena stuvate
2.403.2	harī ta indra śmaśrūṇy uto te haritā harī
2.403.3	taṃ tvā stuvanti kāravaḥ puruṣāso vanargavaḥ
2.403.4	ṛddhyāsa indra bhuṅṅ iti maghavann indra bhuṅṅ iti
2.403.5	indras trasarapūtaḥ
2.403.6	sphigi punaḥpunas trasarasphigir iti
2.403.7	etāvad dha vā asyaikam aṅgam anāstutam āsa yat sphigau
2.403.8	anāstutenainam aṅgena stuvanti
2.403.9	ṛddhiṣṇavo ha bhavanty enena tuṣṭuvānāḥ
2.403.10	tad āhuḥ kasmai kaṃ parimādaḥ kriyanta iti
2.403.11	yathā ha vai śārada ukṣaivaṃ mahāvratam
2.403.12	sa yathā śāradam ukṣāṇaṃ vāgarābhiḥ paritatyālabherann evam evaitat parimādbhir mahāvratam ālabhante vratasyāprakṣayāya
2.403.13	atho yathaivedaṃ puruṣasya keśā nakhā lomāni śmaśrūṇi tathaivāsyaitad iti
2.403.14	atho yad evedaṃ puruṣam abhito gaur aśvo 'jāvir vrīhayo yavās tad evāsyaitad iti
2.404.1	saptāśītir mahāvratasya stotryā bhavanti trayodaśa parimādaḥ
2.404.2	tac chatam
2.404.3	śatāyur vai puruṣaś śatendriyaś śatavīryas tasyaivendriyasya vīryasyāvaruddhyai
2.404.4	athaitā vācaḥ pravadanti
2.404.5	kṣudrāḥ parimādaḥ karkarī cālābuś ca vakrā ca kapiśīrṣṇī caiṣīkī cāpāghāṭalīkā ca vīṇā ca kaśyapī ca bhūmidundubhiś cārṣabheṇa carmaṇābhivihato vāṇaś ca śatatantrīḥ
2.404.6	antarikṣe dundubhayo vitatā vadanti
2.404.7	adhikumbhāḥ paryāyanti
2.404.8	etā vācaḥ pravadanti sarvasyai vāco 'varuddhyai kṛtsnāyai vācaḥ kṛtsnāṃ vācam avaruṇadhāmahā iti
2.404.9	tad yad bhūmidundubhir ārṣabheṇa carmaṇābhivihato vadati paramā vā ṛṣabho vāk paramasyā eva vāco 'varuddhyai
2.404.10	antarikṣe dundubhayo vitatā vadanti yaivāntarikṣe vāk tām eva tenāvarundhate
2.404.11	adhikumbhāḥ paryāyanty etad vai pratyakṣaṃ divo rūpaṃ yan mūrdhā yaivāmuṣyāṃ vāk tām eva tenāvarundhate
2.404.12	vāṇaṃ śatatantrīm āghnanti śatāyur vai puruṣaś śatendriyaś śatavīryas tasyaivendriyasya vīryasyāvaruddhyai
2.405.1	māgadhaṃ ca puṃścalūṃ ca dakṣiṇe vedyante mithunīkārayanti mithunatvāya prajananāya
2.405.2	pra mithunena jāyate ya evaṃ veda
2.405.3	āryaṃ ca varṇaṃ śaudraṃ coparyupari cātvālaṃ bastājine vyāyamayanty ārṣabhe vā carmaṇi
2.405.4	tayor antarvedy āryo varṇo bhavati bahirvedi śaudraḥ
2.405.5	tayor āryeṇa varṇena śaudraṃ varṇaṃ jyāpayanti
2.405.6	devāś ca vā asurāś cāmuṣminn āditye 'spardhanta
2.405.7	taṃ devā asurāṇām avṛñjata
2.405.8	tad yad āryeṇa varṇena śaudraṃ varṇaṃ jyāpayanty etam eva tad dviṣato bhrātṛvyasya vṛñjate
2.405.9	tayor ānyaḥ krośati prānyaś śaṃsati

2.405.14	saṃnaddhā bhavanti

2.405.16	paramām eva tat tviṣim ātmasu dadhate
2.405.17	pūrṇakumbhā mārjālīyaṃ paryāyanti pūrṇasyaivāvaruddhyai

2.406.1	te stoṣyanto viparāyanti

2.407.1	te sakṛd eva sarve hiṃkurvanti

2.407.11	tasmād idaṃ śiro na medyato 'numedyati na kṛśyato 'nukṛśyati

2.407.15	parācībhir apunarabhyāvartam

2.420.6	atha yad vo 'vācaṃ ṣaḍbhya sma haritmatībhyo metetīḍāvibhaktir eva vas tad avocam iḍābhi sma bṛhatīr ārabhadhvam ity eva vas tad avocam iti

2.420.8	sa yathā ṣaḍ ḍharitmatīr aśvatarīs saṃyujya yatra jigamiṣet tad gacched evam evaitābhir iḍāvibhaktibhi svargaṃ lokam abhyaśnuvate
2.420.9	tasmād iḍābhir eva bṛhatīr ārabhyāḥ
2.421.1	atha yad vo 'vocaṃ catuścakraṃ sma pārayiṣṇuṃ samārohateti pra soma devavītaye parīto ṣiñcatā sutam abhi somāsa āyavaḥ punānas soma dhārayety etā eva vas tac catasro bṛhatīr avocam iti
2.421.2	eṣa ha vai catuścakraḥ pārayiṣṇur yad etā bṛhatyaḥ
2.421.3	sa yathā catuścakreṇa pārayiṣṇunā yatra jigamiṣet tad gacched evam evaitābhir bṛhatībhi svargaṃ lokaṃ gacchanti
2.421.4	atho eṣa vāva devarathaḥ

2.422.1	atha yad vo 'vocaṃ saṃvatsarasya sma vyāptam atiplavadhvam ity abhīvartaṃ vā sma pavamāne kurudhvaṃ plavaṃ vety eva vas tad avocam iti
2.422.2	etad dha vai saṃvatsarasya vyāptaṃ yad ṛtavo yan māsā yad ṛtusandhayaḥ
2.422.3	tad u vā āhur ya ṛtavo ye māsā ya ṛtusandhayo 'horātre vāva tad bhavataḥ
2.422.4	ahorātre vāva saṃvatsarasya vyāptam iti

2.427.5	tayor yad adhastāc chuklaṃ tad ahno rūpaṃ yad upariṣṭāt kṛṣṇaṃ tad rātrer nakhāny eva nakṣatrāṇām imāny eva catvāry ūrvaṣṭhīvāni ārambhaṇīyam ahar ayam abhiplavo 'yaṃ pṛṣṭhyo 'yam ito 'rvācīno 'bhijid ayaṃ viśvajid ime traya svarasāmāna ime trayo 'yaṃ viṣuvān idaṃ mahāvratīyam ahar ayam udayanīyo 'tirātraḥ

2.433.1	tasya gāyatram eva hiṃkāro rathantaraṃ prastāvo vāmadevyam udgītho bṛhat pratihāro yajñāyajñīyaṃ nidhanam

3.2.9	tam āharata

3.2.11	sa māsāṃś cartūṃś cābravīd yājayata meti
3.2.12	taṃ māsā nābruvan
3.2.13	sa vā asmāsv eva satyā bhunajāsā iti
3.2.14	tasmād etā māsy eva sarvāḥ paurṇamāsyaṣṭakāmāvāsyāḥ
3.2.15	tad ṛtavaḥ prasute paścevānvabudhyanta pra haibhyo 'dād iti
3.2.16	tam abruvann asmabhyam api dakṣiṇāṃ prayaccheti
3.2.17	tebhyo 'nnādyaṃ prāyacchat
3.2.18	tad etad yathartv annādyaṃ pacyate

3.2.20	sa yo haivaṃ vidvān dvādaśāhena yajata etām eva svadhām ūrjam annādyam akṣitim avarunddhe
3.2.21	praty ṛtavo 'gṛhṇan na māsāḥ pratigraham akāmayanta
3.2.22	tasmān māsā ākhyātatarā iva

3.3.1	puro indrāya devā śraiṣṭhyāya nātiṣṭhanta
3.3.2	sa prajāpatim upādhāvat pra ma imā yaccheti
3.3.3	tasmā ete dve prāyacchat paurṇamāsīṃ cāmāvāsyāṃ ca
3.3.4	asminn evāṣṭakām adhatta
3.3.5	tato vā indrāya devā śraiṣṭhyāyātiṣṭhanta

3.4.1	te 'yajanta / te māsāś catravaś ca saṃvatsare pratyatiṣṭhan saṃvatsara ṛtuṣu ca māseṣu ca
3.4.2	tasmād āhus samāvan mātriyevarddhir yaṃ ca yājayanti ye ca yājayantīti
3.4.3	samāvan mātriyeva mamānenarddhir iti hekṣeta

3.4.8	yaṃ kāmayerann imaṃ yajñasya vyṛddhir anviyād iti taṃ haiva yajñasya vyṛddhir anveti

3.15.1	atha somasāma
3.15.2	somo vai rājā sadhamādam ivānyābhir devatābhir āsīt
3.15.3	so 'kāmayata sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ rājyāya sūyeyeti
3.15.4	sa etat sāmāpaśyat
3.15.5	tenāstuta
3.15.6	tato vai sa sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ rājyāyāsūyata
3.15.7	sūyate svānāṃ śreṣṭhatāyai ya evaṃ veda
3.15.8	tebhyas tiro 'bhavat
3.15.9	tad anvaicchan
3.15.10	tebhya etena rūpeṇādṛśyata yad etac candramasaḥ
3.15.11	tam abhisamagacchantādarśy adarśīti
3.15.12	tasmād yadā darśayate 'thābhisaṃgacchante 'darśy adarśīti
3.15.13	tam etad abhyaṣiñcanta
3.15.14	sa etad abhavat
3.15.15	tad etac chrīssavas sāma
3.15.16	aśnute śriyaṃ gacchati rājyaṃ ya evaṃ veda
3.15.17	yad u somo rājā apaśyat tasmāt somasāmety ākhyāyate
3.15.18	atha vajram
3.15.19	vajra āṅgirasaḥ paśukāmas tapo 'tapyata
3.15.20	sa etat sāmāpaśyat tenāstuta
3.15.21	sa etām iḍām upait
3.15.22	paśavo vā iḍā
3.15.23	tato vai sa paśūn avārundhata
3.15.24	tad etat paśavyaṃ sāma
3.15.25	ava paśūn runddhe bahupaśur bhavati ya evaṃ veda
3.15.26	yad u vajra āṅgiraso 'paśyat tasmād vajram ity ākhyāyate
3.15.27	atha yaudhājayaṃ triṇidhanaṃ savanānāṃ kḷptyai
3.15.28	athauśanam antyaṃ sāmāntyena sāmnāntyaṃ svargaṃ lokam aśnavāmahā iti
3.15.29	atha rathantaram
3.15.30	brahma vā agniṣṭomo brahma rathantaram
3.15.31	brahmaṇy evaitat pratitiṣṭhanto yanti
3.15.32	atha vāmadevyam
3.15.33	paśavo vai vāmadevyam
3.15.34	paśumanta eva bhavanty enena tuṣṭuvānāḥ
3.15.35	atha naudhasam
3.15.36	saloke vai kāleyaṃ ca rathantaraṃ ca
3.16.1	pra somāso madacyuta ity ārbhavasya pavamānasya pravatīr gāyatryo bhavanti rāthantare 'han
3.16.2	praṇinīṣeṇyaṃ vā etad ahaḥ
3.16.3	preti gāyatryai rūpam
3.16.4	gāyatryā evaitad rūpeṇa prayanti
3.16.5	tā madvatīr bhavanti
3.16.6	raso vai madaḥ
3.16.7	dhītam ivaitad yat tṛtīyasavanam
3.16.8	tad yad etā madvatīr bhavanti rasam evāsminn etad dadhati
3.16.9	aivainad etena pyāyayanti
3.16.10	tāsu gāyatram uktabrāhmaṇam
3.16.11	atha saṃhitaṃ dvyakṣaraṇidhanaṃ pratiṣṭhāyai
3.16.12	dvipād vai yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai
3.16.13	ayā pavasva devayuḥ pavate haryato harir ity uṣṇikkakubhau bhavataḥ
3.16.14	gāyatryau rūpeṇa rāthantare sabhaṃ pūrvasyāṃ vijityā eva
3.16.15	athākṣaraṃ padanidhanam apariṣṭobhaṃ rāthantaram
3.16.16	tasmād rāthantare 'han kriyate
3.16.17	prajāpatir vā etaṃ yajñam asṛjata yad dvādaśāham
3.16.18	tasya tṛcair anyāny ahāny akalpantaikarcair etat
3.16.19	tad asya sam ivāplīyata
3.16.20	sa ete sāmanī apaśyat
3.16.21	tābhyām enad yathā śāṃkubhyāṃ carma vihanyād evam evābhyām etad ahar vyahan
3.16.22	āśvena purastād ākṣāreṇopariṣṭāt
3.16.23	tad yad ete sāmanī bhavato 'hna eva dhṛtyai
3.16.24	pra sunvānāyāndhasa iti pravatīr anuṣṭubho bhavanti rāthantare 'han
3.16.25	praṇinīṣeṇyaṃ vā etad ahaḥ
3.16.26	preti gāyatryai rūpam
3.16.27	gāyatryā evaitad rūpeṇa prayanti
3.17.1	tāsu gaurivītam
3.17.2	yathā ha vā idam avasānadarśāvavasānaṃ vindata evam etau gaurivītasyodāsau devebhya śvastanaṃ vindataḥ
3.17.3	śvastanaṃ no 'sad iti vai satram āsate
3.17.4	śvastanaṃ haivaibhyo bhavati
3.17.5	etad dha vā adyaśvaṃ devānāṃ yad gaurivītam
3.17.6	akṣitam asyādyaśvaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda
3.17.7	avasānadarśo vā etayor udāso 'nyataro 'vasāyayitānyaḥ
3.17.8	sa yathā pra spaṣṭaṃ tṛṇodakam anvavasyet tādṛk tat
3.17.9	yathā ha vā idaṃ somapravākas somaṃ prāhaivam etau gairivītasyodāsau devebhyas somaṃ prāhatuḥ
3.17.10	proktasomo ha sa tāṃ rātriṃ vasati yasminn ahani gaurivītaṃ bhavati
3.17.11	atho hainaṃ devā īkṣante dhāvata śvo yaṣṭeti
3.17.12	tad yad ekāhe gaurivītaṃ na kurvanti ned devān lāpayāmahā iti
3.17.13	yathā ha vā idaṃ vṛkṣasyākramaṇāni kṛtāny evam etāni gaurivītasyākramaṇāni kṛtāni svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
3.17.14	pra svargaṃ lokam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda
3.17.15	yathā ha vā idam abhīyāyam upa vimokaṃ yāyād evam etad yad gaurivītam
3.17.16	tat tathaiva geyam
3.18.1	śāktyās tarasapuroḍāśās satram āsata
3.18.2	sa gaurivītiś śāktyo mṛgam ahan
3.18.3	tam tārkṣyas suparṇa upariṣṭād abhyavāpatat
3.18.4	tasmā upapratyadhatta
3.18.5	tam abravīd ṛṣe mā me 'sthaḥ
3.18.6	śvastanaṃ te vakṣyāmi
3.18.7	adya vāva tvaṃ vettha na śva iti
3.18.8	tasmā etad gaurivītam abravīt
3.18.9	tato vai sa śvastanam apaśyat
3.18.10	tat prajā vai śvastanaṃ paśava śvastanaṃ svargo loka śvastanam
3.18.11	tad yad gaurivītaṃ bhavati etasyaiva sarvasyāvaruddhyā etasyopāptyai
3.18.12	vāco vai raso 'tyakṣarat
3.18.13	tad gaurivītam abhavat / yad anvahaṃ gaurivītaṃ bhavati anvaham evaitad vāco rasaṃ dadhato yanti
3.18.14	ye gaurivītam ahīne 'vasṛjeyus tān brūyād aśvastanā aprajaso bhaviṣyatheti
3.18.15	aśvastanā haivāprajaso bhavanti
3.19.1	atha tvāṣṛtīsāma madhyenidhanaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai
3.19.2	samudraṃ vā etenārambhaṇaṃ praplavante ya ārbhavaṃ pavamānam upayanti
3.19.3	tad yan madhyenidhanaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhityā eva
3.19.4	tasya purastān nidhanasya pratihāram upayanti
3.19.5	prastāvapratihārābhyāṃ vai yajamāno dhṛtaḥ
3.19.6	pradrutam ivaitad ahar yat trivṛt
3.19.7	tad yat purastān nidhanasya pratihāram upayanty aprasraṃsāyaiva
3.19.8	indro vṛtraṃ vajreṇādhyasya nāstṛṣīti mayamāno gāḥ prāviśat
3.19.9	tā akāmayantendraṃ janayemeti
3.19.10	tā etāni sāmāny apaśyaṃs tvāṣṭrīsāmāni
3.19.11	tair indram ajanayan
3.19.12	tāni vā etāni vīrajananāni sāmāni
3.19.13	āsya vīro jāyate ya evaṃ veda
3.19.14	atho paśavo vai tvāṣṭryaḥ
3.19.15	tad yad etāni sāmāni bhavanti paśūnām evāvarudhyai
3.19.16	tad aiḍaṃ bhavati paśavo vā iḍā paśūnām evāvaruddhyai
3.19.17	yad u tvāṣṭryo 'paśyaṃs tasmāt tvāṣṭrīsāmety ākhyāyate
3.19.18	abhi priyāṇi pavate canohita ity abhīti bhavati rathantarasya rūpam
3.19.19	rāthantaram etad ahaḥ
3.19.20	tāsu kāvam uktabrāhmaṇam
3.19.21	atha yajñāyajñīyam uktabrāhmaṇam
3.20.1	pavasva vāco agriya iti pratipado bhavanti
3.20.2	bṛhadrathantare yad asṛjyetāṃ bṛhat pūrvam asṛjyatātha rathantaram
3.20.3	tasmāt pavasva vāco 'griya iti pratipado bhavanti
3.20.4	prety anya ṛṣayo 'paśyann ety anye
3.20.5	athaitan na preti neti sthitam
3.20.6	vāco bārhataṃ rūpaṃ bharadvāja ṛṣir apaśyat
3.20.7	bharadvājasya vā etad ārṣeyaṃ yad bṛhat
3.20.8	mano bṛhat
3.20.9	prajāpatir bṛhat
3.20.10	prajāpatitām evāśnute ya evaṃ veda
3.20.11	soma citrābhir ūtibhir abhi viśvāni kāvyā tvaṃ samudriyā apa iti
3.20.12	tvam iti bhavati bṛhato rūpam
3.20.13	bārhatam etad ahaḥ
3.20.14	agriyo vāca īrayann ity agraṃ vā etad ahaḥ
3.20.15	dvitīyaṃ vā etad ahas sat tad agram ity ākhyāyate
3.20.16	tubhyemā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthira iti
3.20.17	pradrutam iva vā ita etad ahar yad bārhatam
3.20.18	ado hi bṛhat
3.20.19	tad yan mahimne soma tasthira ity ahna evopasthityai
3.20.20	tubhyaṃ dhāvanti dhenava iti samaṣṭyai
3.21.1	tā etā bhavanti gāyatryas triṣṭubvarṇā ahno rūpeṇa samṛddhāḥ
3.21.2	yatra vā ahārūpeṇa samardhayanti saṃ tatrardhyante
3.21.3	sam asmā ṛdhyate ya evaṃ veda
3.21.4	pavasvendo vṛṣā suta iti vṛṣaṇvān anurūpo bhavati
3.21.5	bārhataṃ vā etad ahaḥ
3.21.6	traiṣṭubhaṃ kṣatrasya rūpam
3.21.7	tad āhur ahna eva rūpaṃ stotriyeṇārabhante 'nurūpeṇa sāmna iti
3.21.8	stotriyānurūpau bhavataḥ
3.21.9	prāṇo vai stotriyeṇārabhante 'nurūpeṇa sāmna iti
3.21.10	stotriyānurūpau bhavataḥ
3.21.11	prāṇo vai stotriyo 'pāno 'nurūpaḥ
3.21.12	prāṇāpānābhyām evaitat samṛdhya prayanti
3.21.13	mano vai stotriyo vāg anurūpaḥ
3.21.14	sāma vai stotriya ṛg anurūpaḥ
3.21.15	ahar vai stotriyo rātrir anurūpaḥ
3.21.16	iyaṃ vai stotriyo 'sāv anurūpaḥ
3.21.17	ātmā vai stotriyaḥ prajānurūpaḥ
3.21.18	stotriyānurūpayor ha khalu vai tad rūpaṃ yasmād yāṃ śreṣṭhīṃ vācaṃ vadati tāṃ pāpīyān anuvadati yasmāt kartā ca karaṇaś ca sadṛśau santau vijñāyete
3.21.19	stotriyānurūpayor vai hetoḥ prajā anurūpā ājāyanta
3.21.20	ā hāsyānurūpaḥ prajāyāṃ jāyate ya evaṃ veda
3.21.21	tad āhur vīva vā ete prāṇair ṛdhyante ye prāyaṇīyasyāhnas tṛcān vicchindantīti
3.21.22	saṃtatān atra pañca tṛcān upayanti prāṇānām eva saṃtatyā avyavacchedāya
3.21.23	sarve vṛṣaṇvanto bhavanti
3.21.24	bārhataṃ vā etad ahaḥ
3.21.25	traiṣṭubhaṃ kṣatrasya rūpam
3.21.26	paryāso bhavati prajānāṃ dhṛtyai paśūnām upasthityai
3.21.27	pañcadaśastomo bhavati indriyaṃ vai vīryaṃ pañcadaśa indriya evaitad vīrye pratitiṣṭhanto yanti
3.22.1	agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmaha ity āgneyaṃ ājyam bhavati

3.22.3	athaitan na preti neti sthitam

3.22.5	bharadvājasya vā etad ārṣeyaṃ yad bṛhat
3.22.6	mano bṛhat

3.23.1	vṛṣā pavasva dhārayeti mādhyandinasya pavamānasya vṛṣaṇvatīr gāyatryo bhavanti
3.23.2	bārhataṃ vā etad ahaḥ
3.23.3	traiṣṭubhaṃ kṣatrasya rūpam
3.23.4	marutvate ca matsara iti marutvatīr bhavanti
3.23.5	marutvad vai madhyaṃdinasya rūpam
3.23.6	madhyandinasyaiva tad rūpān na yanti
3.23.7	taṃ tvā dhartāram oṇyor ity ahna eva dhṛtyai
3.23.8	ayā citto vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayeti harivatīr bhavanti
3.23.9	harivad vai triṣṭubho rūpam
3.23.10	traiṣṭubham etad ahaḥ
3.23.11	tāsu gāyatram uktabrāhmaṇam
3.23.12	atha yauktāśvaṃ pariṣṭobhavad bahirnidhanaṃ bārhatam
3.23.13	tasmād bārhate 'han kriyate
3.23.14	vasiṣṭho vai sudāsaḥ paijavanasyaikṣvākasya rājñaḥ purohita āsa
3.23.15	sa sudāḥ paijavano vasiṣṭhe vaḍavān nyadhatta yathā purohite nidadhate tathā
3.23.16	vasiṣṭhas saniṃ prayann abravīd yuktāśvaṃ kanīyāṃsaṃ bhrātaram eteṣāṃ no bhāryāṇām adhyakṣaḥ syā iti
3.23.17	sa yuktāśvo rājavaḍavānāṃ śiśūñ jātān viparyaharat
3.23.18	ye kalyāṇā āsaṃs tān ātmane 'kṛta
3.23.19	ye pāpīyāṃsas tān rājavaḍavāsu
3.23.20	te tad anvabudhyanta śiśūn ha jātān viparyahārṣīd iti
3.23.21	tam abādhanta steno 'sy anṛṣir iti
3.23.22	so 'kāmayata śraddhāṃ vindeyopa mā hvayerann iti
3.23.23	sa etat sāmāpaśyat
3.23.24	tenāstuta
3.24.1	sa o i jvarety eva nidhanam upait
3.24.2	tato vai sa śraddhām upahavam avindata
3.24.3	śraddhāṃ vindāmahā iti satram āsate
3.24.4	śraddhām eva vindante
3.24.5	etad dha vai vācas satyaṃ yad o i jvareti
3.24.6	jvaretīva ha vai cācas satyam
3.24.7	satyena vai sa tad vācaś śraddhām upahavam avindata
3.24.8	śraddhānīyo bhavati vindata upahavaṃ ya evaṃ veda
3.24.9	tad u prajaniṣṇu paśavyaṃ sāma
3.24.10	o i jvareti nidhanaṃ bhavati
3.24.11	ajyata iti paśuṃ pravīyamāṇam āhuḥ
3.24.12	ajvarā hāsya paśavaḥ prajaniṣṇavo bhavanti ya evaṃ veda
3.24.13	yad u yuktāśvo 'paśyat tasmād yauktāśvam ity ākhyāyate
3.24.14	punānas soma dhārayety ubhayarūpā bṛhatī bhavati
3.24.15	eṣā ha vā ubhe sāmanī udyayāma
3.24.16	tasmād etāṃ kurvanty eva bṛhatsāmnaḥ kurvanti rathantarasāmnaḥ
3.24.17	tāsu somasāmanī pariṣṭobhavatī bārhate
3.24.18	tasmād bārhate 'hani kriyete
3.24.19	vṛṣā vai somo vṛṣendra aindram etad ahaḥ
3.24.20	kṣatraṃ vai somaḥ kṣatram indra aindram etad ahaḥ
3.24.21	reto vai somaḥ prajananam etad ahaḥ
3.24.22	tad yad ete sāmanī etasminn ahani kriyete prajanana evaitad retas sicyate
3.24.23	anuṣṭhyāsya retas siktaṃ prajāpate ya evaṃ veda
3.24.24	ūrdhveḍam anyad bhavati bṛhato rūpaṃ bārhate 'han
3.24.25	bārhatam anyat triṇidhanaṃ mādhyandinasya rūpaṃ pavamānasya dhṛtyai
3.24.26	yad u somo rājā 'paśyat tasmāt somasāmanī ity ākhyāyete
3.24.27	vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā iti vṛṣaṇvatīr bhavanti
3.24.28	bārhataṃ vā etad ahas traiṣṭubhaṃ kṣatrasya rūpam
3.25.1	tāsu pārthaṃ dviyabhyāsaṃ dvitīyasyāhno rūpaṃ pariṣṭobhavad bārhatam
3.25.2	tasmād bārhate 'han kriyate
3.25.3	pṛthur vai vainyo 'kāmayata sarveṣāṃ paśūnāṃ rājyāya sūyeyeti
3.25.4	sa etat sāmāpaśyat
3.25.5	tenāstuta
3.25.6	tato vai sa sarveṣāṃ paśūnāṃ rājyāya sūyeyata
3.25.7	sa etac chrīssāma
3.25.8	sarveṣāṃ paśūnāṃ rājyāya sūyate ya evaṃ veda
3.25.9	tad u stobhaprastāvaṃ sv raṃ bhavati svarāṇāṃ vibhaktyai
3.25.10	etad dhy etasyāhna svāraṃ yat stobhaprastāvam
3.25.11	svāram ūrdhvam ivaitad ahar ūrdhvam ivaitat sāma

3.25.13	yad u pṛthur vainyo 'paśyat tasmāt pārtham ity ākhyāyate
3.26.1	vāsiṣṭhaṃ tu kāryataram āhuḥ
3.26.2	kṣatram etad yat pārthaṃ kṣatram etad yat somasāmanī kṣatram etad ahaḥ kṣatraṃ tena yad aindraṃ kṣatraṃ tena yat traiṣṭubhaṃ kṣatraṃ tena yad bārhataṃ kṣatraṃ tena yat pañcadaśastomaḥ
3.26.3	ekadhaiva kṣatraṃ bhavati
3.26.4	tad yat purastād yauktāśvaṃ bhavati vāsiṣṭham upariṣṭād ṛṣisāmanī brahmaṇa eva sa vivadhatāyai
3.26.5	brahma kṣatreṇa samadyāmyasad iti
3.26.6	vasiṣṭho vai jīto hataputro 'kāmayata bahuḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyeyeti
3.26.7	sa etat sāmāpaśyat
3.26.8	tenāstuta
3.26.9	tato vai sa bahuḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prājāyata
3.26.10	tad etat prajananaṃ sāma
3.26.11	bahuḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāyate ya evaṃ veda
3.26.12	yad u vasiṣṭho 'paśyat tasmād vāsiṣṭham ity ākhyāyate
3.26.13	atha bṛhat
3.26.14	varṣma vai bṛhat
3.26.15	varṣmaṇy evaitat pratitiṣṭhanto yanti
3.26.16	atha vāmadevyam
3.26.17	paśavo vai vāmadevyam
3.26.18	paśumanta eva bhavanty enena tuṣṭuvānāḥ
3.26.19	atha śyaitaṃ sāmnor vivāho yajñasya santatiḥ
3.26.20	ekaṃ vāvāhas tad yat tvām idā hyo nara iti bhavati

3.28.1	yas te mado vareṇya ity ārbhavasya pavamānasya madvatīr gāyatryo bhavanti
3.28.2	raso vai madaḥ
3.28.3	dhītam ivaitad yat tṛtīyaṃ savanam

3.28.20	tābhyām astuvatām

3.31.1	tāsu sujñānaṃ
3.31.2	devān vā asurā vyavaṃhvāram ajighāṃsan yad rūpaṃ devānām āsīt tena rūpeṇānupraviśya teṣāṃ ha devānāṃ ye 'raṇye svādhyāyaṃ ceruḥ
3.31.3	ye grāma āsus teṣāṃ tān rūpeṇa jighāṃsāṃcakruḥ
3.31.4	atha ye grāma āsur ye 'raṇye svādhyāyaṃ cerur teṣām u tān rūpeṇa jighāṃsāṃcakruḥ

3.31.14	teṣām u yo ya eva pṛṣṭo na pratyamanuta tasyaitad eva prāghnan

3.56.1	śrudhī havaṃ tiraścyā iti tairaścam

3.66.1	pavasva dakṣasādhana iti mādhyandinasya pavamānasya dakṣavatīr gāyatryo bhavanti

3.117.1	asurāṇāṃ ha vā agra ime lokā āsuḥ

3.121.1	taṃ tuṣṭuvānaṃ śaryāto mānavo grāmeṇādhyavāsyat

3.145.1	payo vai revatayaḥ

3.146.1	vatsaiḥ paśūn saṃvāśayanti
3.146.2	yadā vai paśavo vatsais saṃvāśante 'tha kāmān duhre

3.230.1	atha rayiṣṭhaṃ madhyenidhanaṃ bhavati pratiṣṭhāyai

3.231.1	tāsu dharma

3.311.1	prajāpatiṃ prajās samṛjānaṃ mukhataḥ pāpmāsinot

3.314.1	te gāyatrīm eva dakṣiṇāṃ yugyām akurvata triṣṭubhaṃ savyāṃ yugyāṃ jagatīṃ savyāṃ praṣṭim

3.315.1	yā ha khalu vai sapadā chandas sā prathamam ahar udyacchati vipadā dvitīyaṃ nānāpadā tṛtīyam anupadā caturtham atipadā pañcamam abhipadā ṣaṣṭham

3.316.1	prajāpatir yad bṛhadrathantare 'sṛjata sa mana evāgre bṛhad apaśyad vācaṃ rathantaram abhi vyāharat

3.323.24	sāṣṭākṣaraiva bhūtvai[t]
3.323.25	tasmād etat patir yathākāmaṃ jāyāṃ nenīyate
3.324.1	tau pañcadaśaṃ caikaviṃśaṃ ca vyūhya madhye samabhavatām
3.324.2	sa evaiṣa prajāpatis saptadaśo 'nnāda stomo 'bhavat
3.324.3	tasmai trivṛtpañcadaśāv ita stomau baliṃ kuruta ekaviṃśas triṇavas trayastriṃśaḥ parastāt
3.324.4	tām abravīt saṃbhavaṃ chandāṃsi tvaṃ prajanayatāt stomān ahaṃ prajanayiṣyāmīti
3.324.5	so 'yaṃ trivṛt stomaś catuṣṭomaṃ caturdaśaṃ ṣoḍaśam aṣṭādaśaṃ navadaśaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśam ity etān mṛgastomān prājanayat
3.324.6	atha gāyatrī ekapadāṃ dvipadām akṣarapaṃktiṃ viṣṭārapaṃktiṃ virājam aticchandasam amitaṃ chanda ity etāni mṛgacchandasāni prāyāyata
3.324.7	saiṣā stomānāṃ ca chandasāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
3.324.8	tad dha śaunakaṃ kāpeyaṃ caikatāneyaḥ papraccha yat ṣaḍuttareṇa vai stomāḥ prajanayanti caturuttareṇa chandāṃsy atha kau 'yam aṣaḍuttarī stomas saptadaśa ākṣis san madhye vyavahita iti
3.324.9	sa hovāca stomāś ca chandāṃsi ca yan na prajāyanta sa evaiṣa prajāpatis saptadaśo madhye vyavakramya prajanayann atiṣṭhat
3.324.10	sa yo vā etam ākṣitaṃ vedākṣid vai sa sarvatraiva bhavati
3.324.11	anākṣid vā eṣa yat prajāpatiḥ
3.324.12	sarvaṃ hīdaṃ prājāpatyam iti
3.324.13	te haita ākṣita iva caikitāneyāḥ
3.324.14	tānīmāni chandāṃsi stomair akalpanta
3.325.1	trivṛtā gāyatry akalpata pañcadaśena triṣṭup saptadaśena jagaty ekaviṃśenānuṣṭup triṇavena paṃktis trayastriṃśena virāṭ pañcaviṃśena bṛhaty aṣṭādaśanavadaśābhyām uṣṇikkakubhau
3.325.2	tā yā nava gāyatryaś caturviṃśatis te trivṛtaḥ
3.325.3	atha yā pañcadaśa triṣṭubhaś catuścatvāriṃśat te pañcadaśāḥ
3.325.4	atha yās saptadaśa jagatyo 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśat te saptadaśāḥ
3.325.5	atha yā ekaviṃśatir anuṣṭubho dvātriṃśat ta ekaviṃśāḥ
3.325.6	atha yās saptaviṃśatiḥ paṃktyaś catvāriṃśat te triṇavāḥ
3.325.7	atha yās trayastriṃśad virājas triṃśat te trayastriṃśāḥ
3.325.8	atha yāḥ pañcaviṃśatir bṛhatyaṣ ṣaṭtriṃśat te pañcaviṃśāḥ
3.325.9	atha yā aṣṭādaśanavadaśoṣṇikkakubho 'ṣṭāviṃśatis te 'ṣṭādaśanavadaśāḥ
3.326.1	ekaṃ vāvedam agre 'kṣaram āsīd vāg eva
3.326.2	sākāmayata bahvy asāni prajāyeya bhūmānaṃ gacchāni yajñaṃ tanavā iti
3.326.3	sā svāhā svāhā svāhety eva dvādaśakṛtvo 'juhot
3.326.4	sā triṃśatam triṃśatam evāsinot
3.326.5	triṃśadakṣaro evātmanābhavat
3.326.6	tasyai paścevākṣare upodasarpatām
3.326.7	saivaiṣānuṣṭub abhavat
3.326.8	tasmād etad yoṣitaḥ paśceva stanāv upotsarpataḥ
3.326.9	saiṣā virāḍ eva staninī
3.326.10	sā yat tad dvādaśakṛtvo 'juhod etān eva tad dvādaśa māso 'sṛjata
3.326.11	tāny evaitāni dvādaśāhasya dvādaśāhāny abhavaṃs ta eva caturviṃśatir ardhamāsā abhavaṃs tāny eva sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiṃ cāhorātrāṇy abhavan
3.326.12	saitaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yajñam asṛjata
3.326.13	eṣa ha vāva yajño yas saṃvatsaraḥ
3.326.14	sā nāved yajñaṃ vā asṛkṣīti
3.326.15	kim u cid asṛkṣīty evāmanyata
3.326.16	tāṃ modaḥ pratyāgacchat
3.326.17	tato 'ved yajñaṃ vā asṛkṣīti
3.326.18	saikṣata yam idaṃ yajñam asṛkṣi hantainam ātmana evādhi tanavā iti
3.327.1	sāṣṭābhir evākṣaraiḥ prathamam ahar atanuta ekādaśabhir dvitīyaṃ dvādaśabhis tṛtīyam
3.327.2	akṣaram eva tryakṣaraṃ paryaśiṣyata
3.327.3	tad evottaraṃ tryaham anuvyadadhāt
3.327.4	saitaṃ pṛṣṭhyaṃ ṣaḍaham atanuta
3.327.5	saitaṃ pṛṣṭhyaṃṣaḍahaṃ tatvaikṣata kena nv imaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tryahaṃ tanviyeti
3.327.6	svātmānam evāpaśyad yo nvāva me 'sāv ātmā so 'yam
3.327.7	hantainam ātmana evādhi tanavā iti
3.327.8	sāṣṭābhir evākṣarais saptamam ahar atanutaikādaśabhir aṣṭamaṃ dvādaśabhir navamam
3.327.9	atha yad akṣaraṃ paryaśiṣyata tad evaitad dvādaśāhasya daśamam ahar abhavat
3.327.10	saiṣā śrāntā vikṛṣṭāśaye vāg yajñam ūhiṣī kālilimattā yathā siṃhī vā vijātā syād vyāghrī vā śiṃśumārī vaivam
3.327.11	tāṃ yad etarhi pratyakṣam ālabheran vyāptam asyā āpadyeran
3.327.12	yady u vā sā iyur etasmāt sarvasmād iyuḥ
3.327.13	tām etāṃ parokṣam anuṣṭubhaṃ kurvanti
3.328.1	na hotā canānuṣṭubhaś śaṃsati virāja eva sa śaṃsati
3.328.2	te devā abruvann iyam iyaṃ yajñam asṛṣṭaitānana yajāmahā iti
3.328.3	te bṛhatīm abruvann idaṃ nas tvaṃ tṛtīyam ahar vaha
3.328.4	abhijitaṃ vai nas sat tad avyāptam iti
3.328.5	sad dha vai bṛhatī bhavati yat sā pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati
3.328.6	saitad bṛhatī tṛtīyam ahar ūḍhvā nākāmayata voḍhum
3.328.7	ta iyam eva lokaṃ rathantareṇājayann antarikṣaṃ bṛhatyāmuṃ bṛhatā
3.328.8	ta etena tryaheṇa vyajayanta
3.328.9	tad yathā vijitena yanti saindhavān ajanti hastinaṃ vahanti dhūrgṛhītaṃ rathaṃ yāti hulubhyāṃ yāti vicchidvahābhyām evaṃ gardabharathena
3.328.10	evam etaṃ dvitīyaṃ tryahaṃ devā atyāyan
3.329.1	te bṛhadrathantare etāni rūpāṇi pratyauhatāṃ vairūpaṃ vairājaṃ mahānāmnī revatīr iti
3.329.2	atha bṛhatī pratyauhad virājaṃ śakvarīṃ revatīm iti
3.329.3	tānīmāny atyāyan
3.329.4	tāni devā anvapaśyan yathā matsyam ūrmyā yantam anupaśyed evam
3.329.5	tāni saptame 'han samudamajjan yathā matsyās samunmajjayur evam
3.329.6	tāny etāni chandomeṣu sarvāṇi saṃsṛjyante
3.329.7	etad bṛhatyāṃ bṛhad bhavati bṛhatyāṃ rathantaram
3.329.8	sa yathogragādhe saṃrabhyātīyād evam evaitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ triyahaṃ devā atyāyan
3.329.9	ta etaṃ svargaṃ lokam āgacchann etad daśamam ahaḥ
3.329.10	eṣa vāva svargo loko yad daśamam ahaḥ
3.329.11	tac caturviṃśaṃ bhavati
3.329.12	tato yā viṃśatir virāṭ sā
3.329.13	atha yāś catasras tad eva bradhnasya viṣṭapam
3.329.14	tasminn etad devās sarvān kāmān duhre
3.329.15	upasṛjan dharuṇaṃ mātre mātaraṃ dharuṇo dhayan rāyas poṣam iṣam ūrjam asmāsu dīdharat svāhe ti juhoti
3.329.16	sa yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayeta taṃ dhyāyet
3.329.17	etasyāṃ hutāyāṃ sa haivāsmai kāmas samṛdhyata evaṃvide
3.329.18	kim u naivaṃvide samṛdhyeteti ha smāha śāṭyāyaniḥ
3.330.1	eti prety āśumad vītīmad rukmavat tejasvad yuñjānaṃ prathamasyāhno rūpaṃ trivṛta stomasya gāyatryai chandaso rathantarasya sāmnaḥ
3.330.2	vṛṣavad vṛtrahavad rayimad viśvavad upasthitaṃ dvitīyasyāhno rūpaṃ pañcadaśasya stomasya triṣṭubhaś chandaso bṛhatas sāmnaḥ
3.330.3	udvat trivad digvad gatavat purāṇavat tṛtīyasyāhno rūpaṃ saptadaśasya stomasya jagatyai chandaso vairūpasya sāmnaḥ
3.330.4	rājanvaj janadvad virāṭsūryavac caturthasyāhno rūpam ekaviṃśasya stomasya anuṣṭubhaś chandaso vairājasya sāmnaḥ
3.330.5	citravac chiśumat paṃktyaś śakvaryo vyūnākṣarā gomad vṛṣabhavad vajryabhimat pañcamasyāhno rūpaṃ triṇavasya stomasya paṃkteś chandasaś śākvarasya sāmnaḥ
3.330.6	parivat prativat saptapadā dvipadā vinārāśaṃsaṃ gomad vṛṣabhavad vajryabhimat ṣaṣṭhasyāhno rūpaṃ trayastriṃśasya stomasyāticchandasaś chandaso raivatasya sāmnaḥ
3.331.1	yasmād eṣā samānā satī ṣaḍahavibhaktir atha nānā bhavati tasmān nānārūpas saṃvatsaro nānārūpam enam anu prajāyate
3.331.2	agna iti prathamasyāhno vibhaktir agnim iti dvitīyasyāgnineti tṛtīyasyāgnir iti caturthasyāgner iti pañcamasyāgna ity eva punaṣ ṣaṣṭhasya
3.331.3	tāv etāv antau saṃdhatta
3.331.4	etad anv anantas saṃvatsaraḥ
3.331.5	tasyaitāv antau yad dhemantaś ca vasantaś ca
3.331.6	etad anu grāmasyāntau sameta etad anu niṣkasyāntau sameta etad anv ahir bhogān paryāhṛtya śaye
3.331.7	tad etad annam
3.331.8	taṃ devacakram akṣitaṃ punarnavam ā ca parā ca parivartate
3.331.9	sa ya etad evaṃ vedaitām evānantatām etām akṣitim etāṃ punarnavatām jayati
3.331.10	agna ā yāhi vītaya iti hvayanty evainam etena agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti vṛṇata evainam etena
3.331.11	agnināgnis sam idhyata iti sam evainam etad indhate
3.331.12	agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṃghanad iti vy evaitenaitaj jayante
3.331.13	tava śriyo carṣyasyeva vidyuta iti śriyam evāsminn etad dadhati
3.331.14	yo vai ṣaṣṭhasyāhno vibhaktiṃ veda sarvam āyur eti
3.331.15	jātavedasa iti vai ṣaṣṭhasyāhno vibhaktir agna iti ca
3.331.16	sarvam āyur eti ya evaṃ veda
3.332.1	devā vai pṛṣṭhye ṣaḍahe śriyam aicchan
3.332.2	tām agna iti prathame 'han nānvavindan
3.332.3	tām agnim iti dvitīya 'han nānvavindan
3.332.4	tām agnineti tṛtīye 'han nānvavindan
3.332.5	tām agnir ity eva caturthe 'hann anvavindan
3.332.6	bhūtam evottare 'nvavadatām
3.332.7	yasmād eṣā samānā saty agnivibhaktir atha nānā bhavati ya ete praviṣṭāḥ
3.332.8	atho hāmyaitair evāgnibhis sarva ṛtavo 'gnimanto bhavanti
3.332.9	prasṛteḍā prathamasyāhna ūrdhveḍaṃ dvitīyaṃ pariṣṭubdheḍaṃ tṛtīyam iḍābhir iḍaṃ caturtham adhyardheḍaṃ pañcamam ihakāreṇābhyasteḍaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ca
3.332.10	atho ha vāsyasko naimiśīyān papraccha kiṃ prathamenāhnā kurudhvam iti
3.332.11	praimeti
3.332.12	kiṃ dvitīyeneti
3.332.13	avasaṃ kurmahā iti
3.332.14	kiṃ tṛtīyeneti
3.332.15	pari vā plavāmahā iti
3.332.16	kiṃ caturtheneti
3.332.17	satā sad apyadadhmeti
3.332.18	kiṃ pañcameneti
3.332.19	paśūn vicchindanta aimeti
3.332.20	kiṃ ṣaṣṭhenati
3.332.21	āgacchāmeti hocuḥ
3.332.22	atho tebhya eaitat paśubhyo bhiṣajyāmeti
3.332.23	tad yat praimeti prava vā etat sāryate yat praiti
3.332.24	prasṛteḍā prathamasyāhnaḥ
3.333.1	atha yad avasaṃ kurma ity uparatyeva vā upavimucyevāvasaṃ kurvate
3.333.2	uparatyeva hi dvitīyasyāhna iḍā nidhanaṃ gacchati
3.333.3	atha yat pari vā plavāmahā iti pariplutyeva hi tṛtīyasyāhna iḍānidhanaṃ gacchati
3.333.4	atha yat satā sad apyadadhmetīḍābhir iḍāḥ paśubhiḥ paśūṃs tat
3.333.5	tad etat satā sad apihitam
3.333.6	atha yat paśūn vicchindanta aimeti vicchinneva vā eṣā yad adhyardheḍānnakṛtā
3.333.7	paśavo vā iḍā
3.333.8	tasmāt paśūn vicchedaṃ vikāraṃ bhuñjate
3.333.9	atha yad āgacchāmetīhetyasyām evaitat pratyatiṣṭhan
3.333.10	atho tebhya evaitat paśubhyo bhiṣajitam
3.333.11	yajmād eṣā samānā satīḍāvibhaktir atha nānā bhavati tasmān nānārūpāḥ paśavaḥ
3.333.12	nānārūpam enān anu prajāyate
3.333.13	yad ṛcārabhate tat prathamasyāhno rūpam
3.333.14	pariṣṭubdhaṃ dvitīyasyobhayataḥpariṣṭubdhaṃ tṛtīyasyānutunnaṃ caturthasyābhyastaṃ pañcamasyehakāreṇābhyastaṃ ṣaṣṭhasya
3.333.15	yasmād eṣā samānā satī svaravibhaktir atha nānā bhavati tasmād ayaṃ vāyur yathartu pavata śīto hemantam uṣṇo grīṣmam
3.333.16	indreti prathamasyāhno vibhaktir indram iti dvitīyasyendreṇeti tṛtīyasyendra iti caturthasyendrād iti pañcamasyendra ity eva punaṣ ṣaṣṭhasya
3.333.17	yasmād eṣā samānā satīndravibhaktir atha nānā bhavati tasmād asāv ādityo yathartu tapati śīto hemantam uṣṇo grīṣmam
3.334.1	iti haivedam agra āsa
3.334.2	tad akāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya bhūmānaṃ gaccheyam iti
3.334.3	tan mano 'manuta
3.334.4	tasya dvitīyaṃ vitvāvitarāhvayam ait
3.334.5	tasmād dvitīyaṃ vitvāvitarāhvayam eti
3.334.6	tad anena manasā sahātapyata
3.334.7	mano ha vāva tapaḥ
3.334.8	tat tapyamānaṃ vācam asṛjata
3.334.9	tābhyām astuta sto me sto ma iti
3.334.10	yat sto ma ity abravīt tat stomasya stomatvam
3.334.11	stuvata enena svā ayaṃ na śreṣṭha iti ya evaṃ veda
3.334.12	tāv evaitau stomāv abhavatāṃ parāṅ ca pūrvāṅ ca
3.334.13	tau prāṇāpānau te 'horātre tau pūrvapakṣāparapakṣau tāv imau lokau tāv indrāgnī tau mitrāvaruṇau tāv aśvinau tad daivyaṃ mithunaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃ ca dvandvaṃ tad abhavatām
3.334.14	tau ha sma prajāpatāv evāntas saṃbhavataḥ
3.334.15	tad idaṃ mano vācam askandat
3.334.16	sa hiraṇmayo garbho 'dhīyatāmṛtaḥ
3.334.17	eṣa vai mṛtyur yad agniḥ
3.334.18	tasmin yad dhiraṇyaṃ prāsyanti kalyāṇataraṃ bhavati
3.334.19	so 'yaṃ garbho 'jāyata
3.334.20	taṃ jātam amṛjan yathā vatsaṃ jātaṃ mātā lohyād evam
3.335.1	tasya yat prathamam ulbam apālumpaṃs tat kṛṣṇāyas samabhavat
3.335.2	yad dvitīyam ulbam apālumpaṃs tad rajatam abhavat
3.335.3	yat tṛtīyam ulbam apālumpaṃs tad dharitam abhavat
3.335.4	tasmāt tat tviṣimattamam
3.335.5	tat tad dhy asyādhyātmam āsīd atha yaj jarāyu nāḍyām āsīt
3.335.6	tal loham abhavat
3.335.7	tasmāt tad durgandhitamam
3.335.8	tāni saptadaśaivākṣarāṇy ajāyanta
3.335.9	tāni dvedhā vyauhan navānyāny aṣṭāv anyāni
3.335.10	sa eva trivṛc ca stomo 'bhavat gāyatrī ca chandaḥ
3.335.11	sa aikṣatāyaṃ stoma idaṃ chanda imau vāva tasmā alaṃ yat prajanayetām
3.335.12	hantaimāv eva prajanayatam iti bravāṇīti
3.335.13	sa trivṛtā stutvābravīd gāyatrīṃ vibhava yāvaty asi tāvaty edhīti
3.335.14	sāṣṭākṣarā saty akṣarāṇi tryakṣarāṇy akuruta
3.335.15	tāni caturviṃśatir abhavan
3.335.16	so 'syai gāyatryai caturviṃśatyakṣarāyai ṣaḍ akṣarāṇy ādatta
3.336.1	sa pañcadaśa stomo 'bhavat
3.336.2	apare dve ādatta
3.336.3	sa saptadaśa stomo 'bhavat
3.336.4	aparāṇi catvāry ādatta
3.336.5	sa ekaviṃśa stomo 'bhavat
3.336.6	tad ardhena gāyatrī viṣuvantam agacchat
3.336.7	aparāṇi ṣaḍ ādatta
3.336.8	sa triṇava stomo 'bhavat
3.336.9	aparāṇi ṣaḍ ādatta sa trayastriṃśa stomo 'bhavat
3.336.10	so 'taḥ parācīnaṃ na prāvindat
3.336.11	sa aikṣatemāny eva vīryāṇi saṃstutāni pratyapadhāvāni dve dve 'hanī samasyānīti
3.337.1	sa trivṛc ca pañcadaśaṃ ca samāsyat
3.337.2	tad eva caturviṃśaṃ saptamam ahar abhavat gāyatrī chandasām
3.337.3	tasmād atrobhe bṛhadrathantare kriyete
3.337.4	ubho hy etau bārhatarāthantarau stomau
3.337.5	rathantaraṃ vai mātrāyām atra syād atha bṛhat pṛṣṭhaṃ kriyate
3.337.6	saptadaśaṃ ca triṇavaṃ ca samāsyat
3.337.7	tad eva catuścātvāriṃśam aṣṭamam ahar abhavat triṣṭup chandasām
3.337.8	tasmād atra rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kriyate
3.337.9	ekaviṃśaṃ ca trayastriṃśaṃ ca samāsyat
3.337.10	tataṣ ṣaḍ akṣarāṇy atyaricyanta
3.337.11	atha yāny aṣṭācatvāriṃśat paryaśiṣyanta tad eāṣṭācatvāriṃśaṃ navamam ahar abhavat jagatī chandasām
3.337.12	tasmād atra bṛhat pṛṣṭhaṃ kriyate
3.337.13	ubhau hy etau bārhatau stomau rathantaraṃ vai mātrāyām atra syād atha bṛhat pṛṣṭhaṃ kriyate
3.338.1	tānīmāni ṣaḍakṣarāṇy abhihiṃṅakarot
3.338.2	tataṣ ṣaṇ ṇiramimīta

3.363.1	atha jyṛgbhyām ārcchat

3.364.1	tā etā devatā sṛṣṭā stomā chandāṃsy ṛtavo grahāḥ

3.369.1	chandāṃsi yad ayajanta teṣāṃ bṛhaty evodagāyat

3.369.3	amitacchando gṛhapatir virāḍ brahma gāyatrī maitrāvaruṇā jagatī hotā paṃktir adhvaryuḥ
3.369.4	tasya yat pañcamaṃ padaṃ sa pratiprasthātā triṣṭub brāhmaṇācchaṃsy uṣṇikkakubhau chandasī neṣṭāptotārāv anuṣṭub acchāvāko dvipadonnetā akṣarapaṃktir grāvastud ekapadā subrahmaṇyo 'ticchandā āgnīdhraḥ

3.370.1	tad āhuḥ kasmin stome kasmiṃś chandasi kasyāṃ devatāyāṃ dvādaśāho 'ntataḥ pratiṣṭhita iti
3.370.2	sa brūyāt trivṛti stome gāyatryāṃ chandasy agnau devatāyāṃ dvādaśāho 'ntataḥ pratiṣṭhita iti
3.370.3	trivṛtā hy eva stomena prayanti gāyatryā chandasāgninā devatayā
3.370.4	tair u evodyanti
3.370.5	tad āhuḥ ka stoma ekaḥ kiṃ chanda ekaṃ kā devataikā dvādaśāhaṃ vahatīti
3.370.6	sa brūyāt trivṛt stoma eko gāyatrī chanda ekaṃ vāg devataikā dvādaśāhaṃ vahatīti
3.370.7	trivṛto hy eva sarve stomāḥ prajātā gāyatryās sarvāṇi chandāṃsi

3.386.4	tad āhus sa vādya dvādaśāhaṃ vidyāt sa vā vedeti manyeta ya enaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaṃ vidyād iti
3.386.5	māsā vai dvādaśāhasyāhāni ta eva lokā eta eva devalokāḥ
3.386.6	phālguno vai māso dvādaśāhasya prathamam ahaś caitro dvitīyaṃ vaiśākhas tṛtīyam āṣāḍhāpaurṇamāsaś caturthaṃ śroṇāśraviṣṭhaḥ pañcamaṃ śātabhiṣajaṣ ṣaṣṭhaṃ proṣṭhapadaḥ saptamam āśvayujo 'ṣṭamaṃ kārtiko navamam mārgaśīrṣo daśamaṃ taiṣa ekādaśaṃ māgho dvādaśaṃ prāyaṇīya evātirātras trayodaśo māsa udayanīyas saṃvatsaraś caturdaśaḥ
3.386.7	sa eṣa dvādaśāhas sarveṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
3.386.8	sa ya evam etaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhitaṃ veda sarveṣu lokeṣu pratitiṣṭhati
3.386.9	sa eṣa vāva dvādaśāho ya eṣa tapaty eṣa indra eṣa prajāpatir eṣa evedaṃ sarvam ity upāsitavyam
3.386.10	eṣa evedaṃ sarvam ity upāsitavyam
